original: vāgdevī vadane mama sphuratu yā dhvanyātmanollāsinī varṇavyaktimupāgatā ca tadanu sthānaprayatnādibhiḥ /

original: bhāvānāṃ padasaṃjñayā vidadhatī tredhā samullekhanāny ānandānanusaṃdadhāti viduṣāṃ prāptā mahāvākyatām // Ckc_1.1 //
analyzed: bhāvānām pada saṃjñayā vidadhatī tredhā samullekhanāni ānandān anusaṃdadhāti viduṣām prāptā mahāvākya tām

original: nānālaṅkaraṇojjvalā rasavatī sarvatra nirdeṣatāṃ śayyāmañcati kāminīva kavitā kasyāpi puṇyātmanaḥ // Ckc_1.2 //

original: yāyādādaraṇīyatāṃ kṛtadhiyāṃ grantho 'yamasmatkṛto nāhaṃ yadyapi tādṛśo 'smyayamasau rājā hi tādṛgguṇaḥ // Ckc_1.4 //

original: akāraḥ prītidāyī syānniṣedhe tu viparyayaḥ // Ckc_1.19 //

ikāra ādi catupkam tu kuryāt tuṣṭi manorathau
ṛkāra ādīni catvāri saṃtati stambha hetavaḥ

original: chajakārau raugaharau jhajau tu maraṇapradau // Ckc_1.22 //

ṭa ṭhakārau kheda karau ḍaḥ śubhaḥ ḍhaḥ tu akāntikṛt

thakaraḥ yuddha kārī syāt dadhakārau dhṛti pradau
nakāraḥ tāpa kṛt kaśvid aniṣedhe śubhaḥ smṛtaḥ
rakṣā dāyī pakāraḥ syāt phakāraḥ sādhvasa pradaḥ
ārogya kṛt bakāraḥ syāt bhakāraḥ smṛti bhāgya kṛt

original: gaṇo na dūpyo varṇaśva devatādhiṣṭitāśmavat // Ckc_1.42 //

daiva ānukūlya saṃpādana caturaḥ iti arthaḥ

yathā

original: vāgdevyāḥ prabhaviṣyatā prabhavatā gāḍhaṃ prabhutena ca śreyaḥpākabhareṇa siṅganṛpate bhāvajñacūḍhāmaṇim /
analyzed: vāgdevyāḥ prabhaviṣyatā prabhavatā gāḍham prabhu tena ca śreyaḥ pāka bhareṇa siṅga nṛpate bhāva jña cūḍhāmaṇim

original: tvāṃ jetāramajījanat prasavitā sargasya nocediyaṃ satye vā viphalāyuṣāṃ kṛtadhiyāṃ śāpe na jīveta vim // Ckc_1.*8 //
analyzed: tvām jetāram ajījanat prasavitā sargasya no ced iyam satye vā viphala āyuṣām kṛta dhiyām śāpe na jīveta
atra jīveta iti ātmanepadi tvam anuśāsana viruddham
tena jīvet katham iti sādhīyān pāṭhaḥ
tad api anukṛtau guṇaḥ

original: rājā saṃskṛtavādiṣu praṇayavānityāśayā guṇbhitaṃ tadbhṛtyatra bhavāmahe padarajairedhema maulisthitaiḥ //
analyzed: rājā saṃskṛta vādiṣu praṇayavān iti āśayā tad bhṛtī atra bhavāmahe pada rajaiḥ edhema mauli sthitaiḥ

original: itthaṃ paṇḍitamānināṃ kṣitibhujāṃ dussaṃskutaṃ vācināṃ taiḥ sākaṃ supadīkaroti kṛpayā śrīsiṅganārāyaṇaḥ // Ckc_1.*9 //
analyzed: ittham paṇḍita māninām kṣitibhujām dussaṃskutam vācinām taiḥ sākam supadīkaroti kṛpayā śrī siṅganārāyaṇaḥ
atra bhṛtyatna itya sarvanāmnaḥ bhṛtya śabdāt tral pratyayaḥ

original: bhavāmahe ityātmanepadam padarajairityakārāntatvam edhemetyedhateḥ parasmaipaditvaṃ cāpabhraṃśāḥ /
analyzed: bhavāmahe iti ātmanepadam pada rajaiḥ iti akāra anta tvam edhema iti edhateḥ parasmaipadi tvam ca apabhraṃśāḥ
tathā api avyutpanna jana vacana anukaraṇāt na doṣaḥ
a prayuktam śiṣṭam api kavibhiḥ yat an ādṛtam
yathā
padmāḥ tyaktāḥ mahīpāla sa mukha lotupayā śriyā
na ced eṣām alakṣmīkaiḥ kumudaiḥ na sa hāsikā
atra vā puṃsi padmam nalinam

original: ityanuśāsane 'pi kavibhiḥ puṃliṅge prāyeṇa na prayujyata iti padmā ityaprayuktamidam /
analyzed: iti anuśāsane kavibhiḥ puṃliṅge prāyeṇa na prayujyate iti padmāḥ iti aprayuktam idam
padmam tyaktam iti prathama ardhe

original: na cedasya gataśrīkairiti dvitīyārghe ca pāṭho ramaṇīyaḥ //
analyzed: na ced asya gata śrīkaiḥ iti dvitīya arghe ca pāṭhaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ
guṇa ātvam iṣyate yamaka ādiṣu
yathā
yā paṅktiḥ brāhnaṇā indrāṇām āśāste sā va daivatāḥ
śrī siṅga bhūpa dadhatām āśāḥ te sarva daivatāḥ

original: atra daivataśabdasya puṃliṅge kavibhiranādṛtasyāpi heyatvād āvṛttiyamake prayogo na duṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: atra daivata śabdasya pum liṅge kavibhiḥ an ādṛtasya api heya tvāt āvṛtti yamake prayogaḥ na duṣṭaḥ
pāda pūraṇa mātram yat aviśeṣa karam ca yat
tat nirarthakam iti uktam pada upaskāra vedibhiḥ
yathā

original: adhyāste sarvavandyā vai mukhaṃ śrī siṅgabhūpateḥ // Ckc_1.*12 //
analyzed: adhyāste sarva vandyā vai mukham śrī siṅga bhūpateḥ
atra vai iti

original: kṣiyaḥ sarvavandyeti viśeṣaṇaṃ saśaṅkāyāmadhyāsanakriyāyāṃ viśeṣaṃ nopapādayatīti taddvayaṃ nirarthakam /
analyzed: kṣiyaḥ sarva vandyā iti viśeṣaṇam sa śaṅkāyām adhyāsana kriyāyām viśeṣam na upapādayati iti tat dvayam nirarthakam
adhyāste sarvadā ramyam
iti dvitīya argha pāṭhaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ
āhuḥ asya api sārtha tvam yamaka ādiṣu sūrayaḥ
yathā yā praṅktiḥ brāhnaṇā indrāṇām āśāste iti pūrva udāhṛtam
atra nirarthaka tvāt eva kārasya pāda pūraṇa mātra tve pi yamaka nirvāhaka tvāt eva sārtha tvam
viruddha artha tvam

original: viruddhārtha hi tadyatra viruddhārthaḥ pratīyate // Ckc_1.68 //
analyzed: hi tat yatra viruddha arthaḥ pratīyate
indrāṇī natha bhogaḥ yam guhya keśa nibhaḥ śriyā
rājate pāṇḍya bhūpālaḥ gopāla sama vaibhavaḥ

original: purātanakaviproktaḥ so 'pi doṣāya no bhavet // Ckc_1.69 //
analyzed: purātana kavi pra uktaḥ doṣāya no bhavet
yathā
dhanuṣi janaka putrī nāyaka prauḍi bhājā vidalita nija dharmaiḥ siṅga bhūpālakena
vapuṣi kṛta jaubhiḥ varma celaiḥ jaṭālaiḥ radhi gata mari bhūpaiḥ ambikā nātha sāmyam

original: atra janakaputrīnāyako raghurāma iti vivakṣāyāmapi pitṛsutāpatiriti yadyapi viruddhārthaḥ;
analyzed: atra janakaputrī nāyakaḥ raghu rāmaḥ iti vivakṣāyām api pitṛ sutā patiḥ iti yadi api viruddha arthaḥ

original: ambikānātha ityatra ca pārvatīpatiriti vivakṣāyāṃ jananīpatiriti pratīyate tathāpi na virodhaḥ /
analyzed: ambikānāthaḥ iti atra ca pārvatīpatiḥ iti vivakṣāyām jananīpatiḥ iti pratīyate tathā api na virodhaḥ
indrāṇīnātha ādīnām doṣa tvam iti katham vyavasthā iti ced
ucyate prāyika prayoga rūpeṇa śiṣṭānām parigraheṇa eva
kai punar atra siṣṭāḥ

original: yatra prathamaṃ mārgamupadiśanti tatra ta eva siṣṭā iti sthitirarocakinaḥ /
analyzed: yatra prathamam mārgam upadiśanti tatra te eva siṣṭāḥ iti sthitiḥ arocakinaḥ

original: purātanāḥ kavīndrā eva śiṣṭāḥ na punaḥ satṛṇābhyavahāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: purātanāḥ kavi indrāḥ eva śiṣṭāḥ na punar sa tṛṇābhyavahāriṇaḥ
atas dinakara kula ratnam iti
tat iti janakaputrī śikṣitā ca iti
janaka tanayā snāna puṇya udakeṣu iti
pāyāt vaḥ saḥ mbikāramaṇaḥ iti
ambikā nitamba vimba sparśa lampaṭa kara ambujāḥ iti
tām apāyayata pānam ambikām
iti ca mahā kavibhiḥ aṅgīkṛtāḥ guṇa prayogāḥ
janaka putrī nāyaka ambikā ramaṇa ādīnām guṇa tvam sva kapola kalpitānām punar indraṇī nātha ādīnām ārūḍheḥ asundara tvam iti saḥ yam sarasa sāhitya tīrthakara saṃmataḥ
ghaṇṭāpathaḥ
yat tuccha artham ati sthūlam tat apuṣṭa artham ucyate
yathā
īśāna garima aiśvarya pratīpa aiśvarya yogya tām
bhajante ripu bhūpālāḥ tava śrī siṅga bhūpate
atra lāghava yogya tām iti vaktavye garima aiśvartha pratīpa aiśvaryam iti śabda gauravam
utkarṣa ādi vivakṣāyām asya api guṇa tā
yathā nāyakasya eva vaṃśābalalyām
tasya pāda ambujāt jātaḥ varṇaḥ vigata kalmaṣaḥ
yasya sodara tām prāptam bhagīratha tapaḥ phalam
atra gaṅgā iti arthe kanīyasi bhagīratha tapaḥ phalam iti pada ādhikyam
tathā api tasya sagara kutapa abana kriyā sūcaka tvena gaṅgā śabdāt ati utkarṣa āpādaka tvam iti guṇa tvam
veda śāstra eka vikhyātam apratītam iha ucyate
yathā śrī siṅgadharaṇī pāla bhavataḥ sphyena bhūyate
mitra śrī rāma manunā garva vṛddhi kitā dviṣām
atra sphyasya khaḍga ākāra vastu vācaka tvam vede eva
manoḥ mantra vācaka tvam āgamaḥ eva
vṛddhi nirāsaka tvam śabda śāstre eva prasiddham iti tat apratītam
tad vidyā krama nirvāha pravṛttau tat idam guṇaḥ
yathā

original: īḍāpiṅgalayoḥ pidhāya vadanaṃ baddhvā triśṭaṅgāṭikāṃ sauṣumnopari saṃkramayya sarutaḥ ṣaḍgranthigandhacchidaḥ /
analyzed: īḍā piṅgalayoḥ pidhāya vadanam baddhvā tri śṭaṅgāṭikām sauṣumna upari saṃkramayya sa rutaḥ ṣaṣ granthi gandha chidaḥ

original: prātyagjyotiṣarociṣā prasaratā saṃdrāvya cāṃdrīṃkalāṃ tanniṣṭhyūtaparāmṛtaiḥ paricito yogī ciraṃ jīvati // Ckc_1.*18 //
analyzed: prātyagjyotiṣa rociṣā prasaratā saṃdrāvya cāṃdrīṃkalām tad niṣṭhyūta para amṛtaiḥ paricitaḥ yogī ciram jīvati
atra īḍā piṅgalā ādīnām yoga śāstra mātra prasiddha tvāt apratīta tve pi abhyāsa yoga prakārasya sarvatas nirvāhāt guṇa tvam
aniśvitam tat yatra syāt an utkarṣāya saṃśayaḥ
yathā

original: atropamātā dhātrī dharitrī vā dhātrīti saṃśayapratīteridamaniścitam /
analyzed: atra upamātā dhātrī dharitrī vā dhātrī iti saṃśaya pratīteḥ idam aniścitam
bhūmi bhogāya iti pāṭhaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ
idam prakaraṇa ādibhyaḥ viśeṣa avagame api ca

original: utkarṣe vāviroghe ca doṣakakṣyāṃ na gāhate // Ckc_1.74 //
analyzed: utkarṣe vā aviroghe ca doṣa kakṣyām na gāhate
yathā

original: recarlānvayamaulimaṇḍanamaṇe śrīsiṅgabhūpālaka tvatkhaḍgasya ghanadyuteḥ sa mahimā loke kathaṃ varṇyate /
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpālaka tvad khaḍgasya ghana dyuteḥ sa mahimā loke katham varṇyate

original: yasmin kampitamātra eva samitikṣoṇībhṛtāṃ maṇḍalaṃ sāntatyena vimānavartanakathāmāpnoti mitraissamam // Ckc_1.*20 //
analyzed: yasmin kampita mātre eva samiti kṣoṇībhṛtām maṇḍalam sāntatyena vimāna vartana kathām āpnoti mitraiḥ samam
atra ghana dyuteḥ iti asya ghanā sāndrā dyutiḥ asya iti

original: ghanasya meghasyeva dyutirasyeti vā saṃśaye 'pyavirodhānna duṣṭatvam /
analyzed: ghanasya meghasya iva dyutiḥ asya iti vā saṃśaye pi avirodhāt na duṣṭa tvam

original: vimānavarta nakathāmityatra vigatābhimānavartanasya vā vyomayānavartanasya veti saṃśayepyatyantotkarṣānna doṣaḥ /
analyzed: vimāna varta na kathām iti atra vigata abhimāna vartanasya vā vyoma yāna vartanasya vā iti saṃśaye pi atyanta utkarṣāt na doṣaḥ

original: kṣoṇībhṛtāmityatra rājñāṃ girīṇāṃ vetisaṃśaye nāyakakhaḍgavarṇanaprakaraṇāt pratirājalakṣaṇaviśeṣāvagamānna doṣaḥ /
analyzed: kṣoṇībhṛtām iti atra rājñām girīṇām vā iti saṃśaye nāyaka khaḍga varṇana prakaraṇāt pratirāja lakṣaṇa viśeṣa avagamāt na doṣaḥ
evam saṃyoga viprayoga ādibhiḥ api viśeṣa avagame draṣṭavyam
dūra dūraḥ bhavet yasmāt arthaḥ kliṣṭam tat ucyate
yathā
keyūra vetanaka yāna vilocanānām
śrī siṅgabhū vara virodhi nṛpa aṅganānām vanyasthalī samabhavat nija rājadhānī
atra vārāsimitram mainākaḥ
tasya jankaḥ himavān
tad prabhavā pārvatī
tad sahāyaḥ maheśvaraḥ
tad keyūrāṇi sarpāḥ
teṣām vetanakam jīvana kāraṇam vāyuḥ

original: tasya yānaṃ vāhanaṃ mṛgaḥ tasya locane iva locane yāsāṃ tāḥ,
analyzed: tasya yānam vāhanam mṛgaḥ tasya locane iva locane yāsām tāḥ
iti ati vyavahita artha tvāt kliṣṭam idam
prakramasya ca nirvāhe mahatām hainya sūcane

original: prayuktasya vkacit kāvye kliṣṭasya guṇathā bhavet // Ckc_1.76 //
analyzed: prayuktasya vkacid kāvye kliṣṭasya guṇathā bhavet
prakrama nirvāhe yathā

original: śrīsiṅganṛpo vibhave dhanuṣi naye vapuṣi rañjane jiṣṇum /
analyzed: śrī siṅga nṛpaḥ vibhave dhanuṣi naye vapuṣi rañjane jiṣṇum

original: tatputraṃ tanmitraṃ tatputraṃ jayati tanmitram // Ckc_1.*22 //
analyzed: tat putram tat mitram tat putram jayati tat mitram
vibhave jiṇum deva indram
dhanuṣi tad putram devendra putram arjunam
naye deva indra putra mitram vāsudevam
vapuṣi deva indra putra mitra putram pradyumnam

original: rañjane devendraputramitramitraputramitraṃ candramiti vyavadhānāda durvitarkapratyayamapi tacchabdaprakramanirvāhād guṇatvam //
analyzed: rañjane deva indra putra mitra mitra putra mitram candram iti durvitarka pratyayam api tad śabda prakrama nirvāhāt guṇa tvam
mahā puruṣa hainya sūcane yathā
śrī bhartuḥ āyata suvarṇakara ākṛteḥ yat aṃśāḥ tad āyata suvarṇa karāḥ dviṣaḥ te

original: śrī siṅgabhūpa nagarārgaladīrgabāho tacve 'pyanāyatasuvarṇakaro 'si citram // Ckc_1.*23 //
analyzed: śrī siṅgabhūpa nagara argala dīrga bāho citram

original: atra āyato dīrghabhūtaḥ suvarṇaḥ sukāro yasyeti āyatasuvarṇaḥ tādṛśaḥ karaśabdo yasya saḥ āyatasuvarṇakaraḥ sūkara ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atra āyataḥ dīrgha bhūtaḥ suvarṇaḥ su kāraḥ yasya iti āyata suvarṇaḥ tādṛśaḥ kara śabdaḥ yasya saḥ āyata suvarṇa karaḥ sūkaraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: āyatasuvarṇakarākṛtiḥ sūkarākṛtiriti viṣṇostiryaktvakathanabhayena vaktrā dūrārthapratyayaḥ śabdaḥ prayukta iti guṇatvam /
analyzed: āyata suvarṇa kara ākṛtiḥ sūkara ākṛtiḥ iti viṣṇoḥ tiryaktva kathana bhayena vaktrā dūra artha pratyayaḥ śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ iti guṇa tvam
haṭha artha pratītyā ca yathā

original: śaṃbhoḥ sthitā bhūṣaṇapeṭikāyāṃ śriyaḥ sapatnīmabhitaḥ sphurantī /
analyzed: śaṃbhoḥ sthitā bhūṣaṇa peṭikāyām śriyaḥ sapatnīm abhitas sphurantī

original: viṣṇoḥ padaṃ madhyamamāviśantī virājate siṅganṛpālakīrtiḥ // Ckc_1.*24 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ padam madhyamam āviśantī virājate siṅga nṛpāla kīrtiḥ
atra śaṃbhu bhūṣaṇa peṭikā pātālam
śrī sapatnī bhūmiḥ
madhyama viṣṇu padam ākāśam iti na ati durbodha tvāt akleśa karam iti guṇa tvam
deśa prasiddham vyutpatti rahitam deśyam ucyate
yathā
pekā parīta kamanīya nitamba bimbā hālā mada dbiguṇa pāṭala gaṇjerakhā

original: śrīsiṅgabhūpa bhavato mṛgayāvihāre kā vānuyāti yavanī paricārikeva // Ckc_1.*25 //
analyzed: śrī siṅgabhūpa bhavataḥ mṛgayā vihāre kā vā anuyāti yavanī paricārikā iva
atra pekā paridhāna bhastrā
halā madirāḥ ime deśye nanu
bhastrā peṭikayoḥ sāmyāt peṭikā madhya lopinī

original: pekā halā ca halinaḥ priyā deśyā na hīti cet // Ckc_1.78 //
analyzed: ca halinaḥ priyāḥ deśyāḥ na hi iti ced
iti kandāṭṭa ādeḥ adeśyat
ittham nirukta nirvāhā damaryādā praśasyate
tat idam mārga saṃkṣobha prajñā kaṇḍūti rujjhyām

original: aṅkopālambanāmādau na deśyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ bhavet // Ckc_1.80 //
analyzed: aṅka upālambana āmādau na deśyam dūṣaṇam bhavet
aṅkaḥ birudam
tatra yathā
cala marti gaṇḍa birudaḥ jayati pratigaṇḍabhairavaḥ rājā
sauma kula paraśu rāmaḥ pāṇḍaya vibhālaḥ pyagāyi gopālaḥ
atra cala marti gaṇḍa ādīnām deśya tve biruda tvāt guṇa tvam
upārambhe yathā

original: kiṃ dāruṇā koṃkaravaṃkareṇa kiṃ vāsasā cīṃgirimāṃgireṇa /
analyzed: kim dāruṇā koṃkara vaṃkareṇa kim vāsasā
śrī siṅga bhūpāra vilokanāya vaiduṣyam ekam sudhiyām sahāyaḥ
atra koṅkara vaṃkareṇa iti dūṣaṇam padam deśyam
tādṛśena dāruṇā āndolikayā iti arthaḥ
nānā varṇa vicitre padam deśyam
tādṛśena vāsasā kim paṭṭāṃśukena iti arthaḥ

original: atra kaścidāndolikāpaṭṭāṃbarādyāḍaybara mativyayena sampādya nānādiganteṣu rājāsthānāni
analyzed: atra kaścid āndolikā paṭṭa aṃbara ādi āḍaybara mati vyayena sampādya nānā diś anteṣu rāja āsthānāni

original: vigāhya tadvyayamātramapyalabhamātaḥ ṛṇādhikatayā klisyannāḍhambaraṃ vināpi nāyakamālokya
analyzed: vigāhya tad vyaya mātram api alabham atas ṛṇa adhika tayā klisyan āḍhambaram vinā api nāyakam ālokya
tad karuṇā kaṭākṣa samagrībhūta nānā vaibavassana kasmaicid āḍambara rahitena bhavatā katham

original: sampadīdṛśī sampāditeti pṛcchete janāya kevalaṃ vyayakāriṇāndolikāpaṭṭapaṭādibāhyāḍambaravihmbanāpuraḥsaramuttaraṃ vadati /
analyzed: sampad īdṛśī sampāditā iti pṛcchete janāya kevalam vyaya kāriṇā āndolikā paṭṭa paṭa ādi bāhya āḍambara vihmbanā puraḥsaram uttaram vadati
tat atra koṃkara vaṃkara ādeḥ upālambana tvāt deśya tve
pi sundara tvam
nāmni yathā nāyakasya eva vaṃśāvalyām
tayoḥ abhūvan kṣiti kalpavṛkṣāḥ putrāḥ trayaḥ trāsiḥ avairi vīrāḥ
vīra agraṇī
atra siṅgama
vednama
śabdānām avyutpattimat vāt deśya tve pi nāma pada tvāt aduṣṭa pada tvam
ātmanā neyārtham iti gīyate
yathā
vyatyasta pātra rahitāḥ medinīpāla śātravāḥ
līyante hanta kāntāre vyāvṛtta pika saṅkule
atra pātra śabdaḥ varṇa prātilomyena trapām vadati
tathā eva vyāvṛttaḥ
pikaḥ kapiḥ iti sva saṅketita tvāt neyatvam
prahelikā ādau tat abhyanujñāyate budhaiḥ
yathā

original: yogināṃ bhogināṃ kiṃ syādiṣṭametanna vetti yaḥ /
analyzed: yoginām bhoginām kim syāt iṣṭam etat na vetti yaḥ

original: viparīto harastena na jñāto medinīpate // Ckc_1.*30 //
analyzed: viparītaḥ haraḥ tena na jñātaḥ medinīpate

original: atra yogināṃ bhogināñca kiṃ priyamiti praśne raha ityuttare vaktavye viparīto hara ityuktam /
analyzed: atra yoginām bhoginām ca kim priyam iti praśne rahaḥ iti uttare vaktavye viparītaḥ haraḥ iti uktam
tasya sva saṅketita tve pi prahelikā tvāt aduṣṭa tvam
sva paryāya pada jñāna sādhanam pratihastakam
yathā
śyāma daṃṣṭrā karālena karavālena khaṇḍitāḥ

analyzed: atra bale prabhāve ca iti sāmānya dharma parigaṇana krama vaśāt upamānayoḥ api tad dharmiṇoḥ krameṇa uktiḥ eva yuktā iti kīcaka darpa kārī iti vaktavye vyutkameṇa
bhaṇanāt śabda vyutkamam idam

original: atraiva rāghavādapi bhārgavasyābhyarhitatvād bhārgavarāghavāviti vaktavye tadatikramya nirdeśādarthavyutkramamidama /
analyzed: atrā eva rāghavāt api bhārgavasya abhyarhita tvāt bhārgava rāghavau iti vaktavye tat atikramya nirdeśāt artha vyutkramam idam

original: ubhayatrāpi kīcakadarpakārī bhārgavarāghavāviti ca pāṭho ramaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: ubhayatra api kīcaka darpa kārī bhārgava rāghavau iti ca pāṭhaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ
niḥ viśeṣa vivakṣāyām duḥśaṅkā vyapanodane
ukti śaṃkoca saukarye
pyasya api samupāsya tā
nirviśeṣa vivakṣāyām yathā

original: ghaṭāmaḥ svīyaṃ vā puratatimanarghyānapi maṇī-nakharvāmuvīṃ vāvisṛja gatiranyā na mahatā /
analyzed: ghaṭāmaḥ svīyam vā pura tatim anarghyān api maṇīn akharvām uvīm vā a visṛja gatiḥ anyā na mahatā

original: tvayā grāhyaṃ siṅgakṣitibhuji na vairaṃ priyatam priyāṇāmasmākaṃ vacanamucitaṃ māsma paribhūḥ // Ckc_2.*11 //
analyzed: tvayā grāhyam siṅga kṣitibhuji na vairam priyāṇām asmākam vacanam ucitam mā āsma paribhūḥ
atra pura deśa gaja aśva ratnānām abhyarhita tvāt pūrva pūrvam nirdeśaḥ
athavā na visarjana kriyā sambandhāt anabhyarhitānām pūrva pūrvam uddeśaḥ kartavyaḥ

original: evaṃ satyuktaprakāreṇātikrame 'pi prāṇeśvara sakalamapi dhanaṃ svāmine samarpya prāṇā rakṣaṇīyāḥ /
analyzed: evam sati ukta prakāreṇa atikrame pi prāṇeśvara sakalam api dhanam svāmine samarpya prāṇāḥ rakṣaṇīyāḥ
kṛtam abhyahita anabhyarhita vivekena iti vivakṣayā śatru kāntābhiḥ ukta tvāt duṣṭa tvam
duḥśaṅkā parihāre yathā nāyakasya eva vaṃśāvalyām

original: yasyādyo viditaḥ kumāratilakaḥ śrīyannavoto guṇairekasyāgrajamātmarūpavibhave cāpe dvayoragrajam /
analyzed: yasya ādyaḥ viditaḥ kumāra tilakaḥ guṇaiḥ ekasya agra jam ātma rūpa vibhave cāpe dvayoḥ agra jam

original: ārūḍhe tritayāgrajaṃ vijayate durvāradorvikrame satyoktau caturagrajaṃ vitaraṇe kiñcāpi pañcāgrajam // Ckc_2.*12 //
analyzed: ārūḍhe tritaya agrajam vijayate durvāra dos vikrame satya uktau catur agrajam vitaraṇe kiñca api pañca agrajam
atra karṇa ādīnām abhyarhita tvāt pañcānām agra jam trayāṇām agra jam dvayoḥ ha agra jam ekasya agra jam iti
vaktavye pi saṃkhyā apacaya sūcita apraśasti pratīti parihārāya saṃkhyā upacaya tva āropeṇa
ttarottara abhivṛddhi dyotanāt apakrape pi kramāt ati sundaraḥ iti guṇa tvam
ukti saṃkoca saukarye yathā
rāmāḥ śrī kiṅga bhūpāla catvāraḥ oṃśāḥ hareḥ

original: samau tatra mahodāttau viṣamau tu mahoddhatau // Ckc_2.*13 //
analyzed: samau tatra mahā udāttau viṣamau tu mahā uddhatau

original: atra kṛtatretādvāparakaliyugeṣu bhārgavo rāghavo yādava iti trayo rāmāḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpālaśceti catvāro lokarakṣāpekṣayā śrīviṣṇoraṃśā ityuktāḥ
analyzed: atra kṛta tretā dvāpara kali yugeṣu bhārgavaḥ rāghavaḥ yādavaḥ iti trayaḥ rāmāḥ śrī siṅga bhūpālaḥ ca iti catvāraḥ loka rakṣā apekṣayā śrī viṣṇoḥ aṃśāḥ iti uktāḥ

original: teṣu caturṣu prathama uddhato dvitīya udāttaḥ tṛtīyaścoddhataśvaturtha udātta iti
analyzed: teṣu caturṣu prathamaḥ uddhataḥ dvitīyaḥ udāttaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca uddhataḥ śvaturthaḥ udāttaḥ iti
vaktavye paṭhita prakāreṇa vyutkrame samau iti dvitīya caturthayoḥ daśa ratha annava uta saṃbhūtayoḥ raṃśayoḥ
viṣamau iti reṇukā rohiṇī garbha saṃbhūtayoḥ prathama tṛtīyayoḥ aṃśayoḥ ca dhīra udātta dhīra uddhata tva guṇa sāmya saṃbandha anusandhāyinā saṃkṣopa ukti saukarye
cāru tā samunmīlati iti guṇa tvam
padam padārtha sva abhinne yatra tat punaruktimat
hāstikam āstika sevya tava idam durjana tarjana siṅgha nṛpāla
tarjita garjita ḍambaram āste śambara ḍambaram eti mada ambu
atra ḍamabarayoḥ eka rūpa tvāt pada punaruktiḥ
bhāva utkarṣa vivakṣā ādau asya api ādaraṇīya tā

original: yathā dayodadhe tvaṃ naḥ pāhi pāhi naḥ karuṇāṃbudhe /
analyzed: yathā dayā dadhe tvam naḥ pāhi pāhi naḥ karuṇā aṃbudhe

original: poṣyā vayaṃ na vidveṣyāḥ siṅgabhūpāla pālaya // Ckc_2.*15 //
analyzed: poṣyāḥ vayam na vidveṣyāḥ siṅga bhūpāla pālaya
atra karuṇā aṃbudhe dayā dadhe iti artha punaruktiḥ

original: pāhi naḥ pāhi na iti śabdapunaruktiḥ /
analyzed: pāhi naḥ pāhi naḥ iti śabda punaruktiḥ

original: tadubhayamapi śatṛsaṃbandhikā vigrahakārigatadainyātiśayavivakṣāyāṃ na duṣyati kintu svārthātiśayaṃ puṣyatīti guṇatvam /
analyzed: tat ubhayam api vigraha kāri gata dainya atiśaya vivakṣāyām na duṣyati kintu svārtha atiśayam puṣyati iti guṇa tvam
dūra tā anvaya yogyānām yatra syāt tat duranvayam
yathā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitipālasaṅgarataleṣvaṅgāni dṛṣṭvā dviṣāmātaṅkena samantataḥ kilakilārāveṇa vaitālikāḥ /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipāla saṅgara taleṣu aṅgāni dṛṣṭvā dviṣām ātaṅkena samantataḥ kilakilā rāveṇa vaitālikāḥ

original: kāntāḥ khaṇḍavikhṇḍatāṃ parigatānyuccaṇḍakhaḍgāhateḥ ghorāḥ kaṅkakulākuleṣu cakitāśvinvanti minvanti ca // Ckc_2.*16 //
analyzed: kāntāḥ khaṇḍa vikhṇḍa tām parigatāni uccaṇḍa khaḍga āhateḥ ghorāḥ kaṅka kula ākuleṣu cakitāḥ vinvanti minvanti ca

original: atra kaṅkakulākuleṣu saṅgareṣvityanayorātaṅkena cakitā ityanayoḥ kilakilārāveṇa ghorā ityanayorvaitālikā duṣṭvetyanayoratipratyāsattikāṅkṣiṇoḥ  #
analyzed: atra kaṅka kula ākuleṣu saṅgareṣu iti anayoḥ ātaṅkena cakitāḥ iti anayoḥ kilakilā rāveṇa ghorāḥ iti anayoḥ vaitālikāḥ duṣṭvā iti anayoḥ ati pratyāsatti kāṅkṣiṇoḥ
dūra dūrā vighaṭanā dṛśyate
sā iyam anvaya avasare sa rasa mānasam duḥkhākaroti iti duranvayam duṣṭam
guṇa kakṣyā parikṣepaḥ dṛśyate
yathā
dogdhāraḥ kecid gopālāsu akrire gavām

original: sā paraṃ siṅgabhūpena caritārthā vasundharā // Ckc_2.*17 //
analyzed: sā param siṅga bhūpena caritārthā vasundharā

original: atra pālayāñcakrire iti vaktavye pālayāṃ kecid gopālāśvakrire iti dūrānvaytve 'pi vyavahitamapīcchanti keciditi viśeṣāvyutvādanād guṇatvam
analyzed: atra pālayāñcakrire iti vaktavye kecid iti vyavahitam api icchanti kecid iti guṇa tvam
smṛtam vākya aṅga saṅkīrṇam anya vākya aṅga saṅgatam
yathā
khaḍgān āpṛchya niryānti vadhūḥ ākṛṣṭa dhunvate

original: divaṃ muñcanti yānti kṣmāṃ siṅgabhūpālavidviṣaḥ // Ckc_2.*18 //
analyzed: divam muñcanti yānti kṣmām siṅga bhūpāla vidviṣaḥ

original: atra vadhūrāpṛcchya niryānti khaḍgānākṛṣya dhunvate kṣmāṃ muñcanti divaṃ yānti iti vaktavye vākyayoḥ parasparapadasaṅkaraḥ kṛta iti vākyāṅgasaṅikīrṇamidam
analyzed: atra vadhūḥ āpṛcchya niryānti khaḍgān ākṛṣya dhunvate kṣmām muñcanti divam yānti iti vaktavye vākyayoḥ paraspara pada saṅkaraḥ kṛtaḥ iti vākya aṅga saṅikīrṇam idam

original: vākyaṃ vākyādike tacca guṇībhāvena bhāvyate // Ckc_2.17 //
analyzed: vākyam vākya ādike tat ca guṇībhāvena bhāvyate
yathā

original: vācāmīśa sureśa daivataguro tvāmapyajaiṣītkila prajñāyāmanavotasiṅganṛpatiḥ sacve tadairāvatam /
analyzed: vācām īśa sureśa daivata guro tvām api ajaiṣīt kila prajñāyām anavota siṅga nṛpatiḥ sacve tat airāvatam

original: dāne kalpatarūn jitā vayamamī tatsāṃprataṃ sāṃprataṃ bhoge svāmini nirjite tvayi yathā rājā tathā hi prajāḥ // Ckc_2.*19 //
analyzed: dāne kalpatarūn jitāḥ vayam amī tat sāṃpratam sāṃpratam bhoge svāmini nirjite tvayi yathā rājā tathā hi prajāḥ
atra vācām īśa daivata guro tvām api ajaiṣīt iti ekam vākyam
sureśa vayam jitāḥ iti apararam prativākyam
tayoḥ aṃśa bhūta sambuddhi pada saṅkare pi vākya upavākya tvāt na doṣaḥ
tad vākya garbhita yasya garbhe vākya antara sthitiḥ
yathā
kṛtānta daṃṣṭra akrūrāya khaḍgāya tava bhūpate

original: kā hi śaṅkā madāndhānāṃ tiṣṭhanti śatrubhūvarāḥ // Ckc_2.*20 //
analyzed: kā hi śaṅkā mada andhānām tiṣṭhanti śatru bhū varāḥ

original: atra nāyaka tava khaḍgāya śatrubhūpāstiṣṭhantīti vākyasya garbhe kā hi śaṅkā madāndhānāmiti vakyāntaramavikalaṃ sthitamiti tadidaṃ vākthagabhitam
analyzed: atra nāyaka tava khaḍgāya śatru bhūpāḥ tiṣṭhanti iti vākyasya garbhe kā hi śaṅkā mada andhānām iti vakya antaram avikalam sthitam iti tat idam
yathā

original: sakhyaśvandramukho niṣiñca caraṇe mandākine candanaṃ padmākṣaḥ sakhi padmakī madhukarau padmena nirvāpaya /
analyzed: niṣiñca caraṇe mandākine candanam padma akṣaḥ sakhi padmakī madhukarau padmena nirvāpaya

original: smeraśrīr naya śārikāṃ caturikāṃ dūraṃ durālāpinīṃ śrīsiṅge hṛdayaṅgamo mama paraḥ kiṃ jalpitaiḥ kalpitaiḥ // Ckc_2.*21 //
analyzed: smera śrīḥ naya śārikām caturikām dūram durālāpinīm śrīsiṅge hṛdayaṅgamaḥ mama paraḥ kim jalpitaiḥ kalpitaiḥ

original: atra he sakhyaḥ candramukhaḥ padmākṣaḥ smeraśrīḥ nāyako me hṛdayaṅgamo nāyaka iti vākyasya niṣiñca caraṇāvityādinā sakhi padmake mametyādinā  #
analyzed: atra he sakhyaḥ candra mukhaḥ padma akṣaḥ smera śrīḥ nāyakaḥ me hṛdayaṅgamaḥ nāyakaḥ iti vākyasya niṣiñca caraṇau ityādinā sakhi padmake mama ityādinā  /
naya śārikām ityādinā

original: vākyatrayeṇa pratipāditaṃ garbhitatve 'pi nāyikāyāḥ nāyakaguṇa saṅkīrtanakramasamārūḍhasaṃtāpodvegādilakṣaṇakāmāvasthātiśayasūcakatvena sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādanād  #
analyzed: vākya trayeṇa pratipāditam garbhita tve pi nāyikāyāḥ nāyaka guṇa saṅkīrtana krama samārūḍha saṃtāpa udvega ādi lakṣaṇa kāma avasthā atiśaya sūcaka tvena sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādanāt
guṇa tvam
yatra upamā bhinna liṅgā bhinna liṅgam tat īritam
tat bhinna vacanam yatra vibinna vacana upamā
yathā

original: śāstrādeva sitā prajñā haṃsīva viśadaṃ yaśaḥ /
analyzed: śāstrāt eva sitā prajñā haṃsī iva viśadam yaśaḥ

original: tava siṅgamahīpāla śaśīva rūcirā tanūḥ // Ckc_2.*22 //
analyzed: tava siṅga mahīpāla śaśī iva rūcirā tanūḥ
atra upamāna upameyayoḥ bhinna vacana tvam bhinna liṅga tvam ca spaṣṭam
guṇībhavet dayam idam yatra udvegaḥ na dhīmatām
yathā
prajñā api tava sūkṣma artha darśinī locane iva
śrī siṅga bhūpa dhāṭī iva kīrtiḥ laṅghinī

original: atra locane iva prajñā ityupamānopameyayorliṅgavacanabhede 'pi sūkṣmārthagrāhiṇīti viśeṣāvacanaśleṣavaicitrya kṛtisāmarthyena sahṛdayānāmudvego  #
analyzed: atra locane iva prajñā iti upamāna upameyayoḥ liṅga vacana bhede sūkṣma artha grāhiṇī iti viśeṣa avacana śleṣa vaicitrya kṛti sāmarthyena sahṛdayānām udvegaḥ
na bhavati iti guṇa tvam
yatra nyūna tvam ādhikyam upamāna viśeṣaṇaiḥ

original: lakṣyete te krameṇaiva jñeye nyūnādhikopame // Ckc_2.22 //
analyzed: lakṣyete te krameṇa eva jñeye nyūna adhika upame
nyūna upamam yathā
nibhāti siṅga kṣitipasya mauliḥ chatreṇa cāmīkara kumbhakena
māna unnatam śṭaṅgam iva udayādreḥ sampūrṇa bimbena sudhākareṇa
atra cāmīkara kalaśa upamānasya kasyacid api dharmasya sudhākara viśeṣaṇa tvena anukṛta tvāt nyūnopamam idam
adhika upamam yathā
siṃhāsane rājati siṅga bhūpaḥ bhujāntare cañcala tāra hāraḥ
nava pravāla ujjvala dīrgha gucchaḥ taṭe sūmeroḥ iva kalpavṛkṣaḥ
atra upameya padmarāgeṣu anukteṣu tad upamānasya nava pravālasya ādhikyāt adhika upamānam
prasiddheḥ anumānāt ca guṇatām anayoḥ viduḥ
nyūna upama guṇībhāvaḥ yathā
bhujaga ākampita uttāla karāla karavālayā
bhāsate siṅga bhūpālaḥ bhadra śrīḥ iva śākhayā

original: atra karavālopamānasya kṛṣṇāheranupādānān nyūnopamatve 'pi vasanti candane kṛṣṇasarpā iti rūḍheranatikleśena tatpratītiriti na duṣṭatvam /
analyzed: atra karavāla upamānasya kṛṣṇa aheḥ anupādānāt nyūnopama tve vasanti candane kṛṣṇa sarpāḥ iti rūḍheḥ anatikleśena tad pratītiḥ iti na duṣṭa tvam
adhika upamasya yathā
hara āvalī vilasitāḥ vilasat dukūlāḥ vārāṅganāḥ kṣitipateḥ vaśayanti cetaḥ

original: jyotsnāvisāraviśadā vikacotpalābhā rākāniśā iva virājitalolatārāḥ // Ckc_2.*27 //
analyzed: jyotsnā visāra viśadāḥ vikaca utpala ābhāḥ rākā niśāḥ iva virājita lola tārāḥ
atra nīlotpala grahaṇāt adhika upama tve vāravilāsinī kaṭākṣa vikṣepayoḥ avinābhāva vijñāna pariṇata antaḥkaraṇānām upamānaḥ

original: ddhāṭanānumānādanati prayāsena kuvalayopameyānāṃ kaṭākṣavikṣepāṇāṃ pratītiriti guṇatvam /
analyzed: ddhāṭana anumānāt anati prayāsena kuvalaya upameyānām kaṭākṣa vikṣepāṇām pratītiḥ iti guṇa tvam
chandaḥ yati kriyā ādyaiḥ tu vikalam vikalam viduḥ
tatra chandaḥ vikalam yathā
kalā vidām vareṇyam tu siṅga bhūpāla śekharam
atra tṛtīya akṣara vikala tvāt chandaḥ vikalam idam
anyatra saṃskaṭa tāt asya guṇa tā alpā api gaṇyate
yathā
siri siṃga bhūmi vihuṇaḥ jasa bharagaṃga ppavāha majjhammi

original: pariṇhauṇa samaddhaṃ tellokkaṃ hoi parisuddham // Ckc_2.*29 //
analyzed: samaddham tellokkam hoi parisuddham

original: atra tṛtīyapāde dvitīyavarṇasya saṃyogapūrvatvādgurutvena chandovaikalye 'pi prākṛtādiṣu
analyzed: atra tṛtīya pāde dvitīya varṇasya saṃyoga pūrva tvāt guru tvena chandaḥ vaikalye prākṛta ādiṣu

original: saṃyuktavarṇānāṃ hvāṇvākāralpakāradīnāṃ tīvraprayatnoccāraṇena pūrvalaghutvaṃ kaiścidiṣṭamiti guṇatvam /
analyzed: saṃyukta varṇānām tīvra prayatna uccāraṇena pūrva laghu tvam kaiścid iṣṭam iti guṇa tvam
yativikalam yathā

original: nityaṃ toyadhimaṇimekhalāṃ dharitrīṃ śrīsiṅgakṣitibhujī rakṣitaṃ pravṛtte /
analyzed: nityam toyadhi maṇi mekhalām dharitrīm śrī siṅga kṣiti bhujī rakṣitam pravṛtte

original: vidveṣṭān bhajati vanipatāvanīpān mitrāṇi sphuṭamavanipatāvanīpāt // Ckc_2.*30 //
analyzed: vidveṣṭān bhajati vanipata avanīpāt mitrāṇi sphuṭam avanipata avanīpāt

original: atra tṛtīyasthāne yatau kartavyāyāṃ prathamapāde tathā na kṛtamiti yativikalamidam /
analyzed: atra tṛtīya sthāne yatau kartavyāyām prathama pāde tathā na kṛtam iti yati vikalam idam
svara sandhi anubhāvena guṇībhūtam idam matam
yathā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitipāla tāvakacamūdhāṭībhayāṭīkitānākārairapi śābarairapi hitān ghorāṅgame phakkaṇe /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipāla tāvaka camū dhāṭī bhayāṭīkitān ākāraiḥ api śābaraiḥ api hitān ghora aṅgame phakkaṇe

original: ātmīyaiva hi paśyatāṃ piśunayatyābālagopālakaṃ bhūpālān kuliśātapatrakaraśīcihnā padānāṃ tatiḥ // Ckc_2.*31 //
analyzed: ātmīyā eva hi paśyatām piśunayati ā bāla gopālakam bhūpālān kuliśa ātapatra karaśī cihnā padānām tatiḥ

original: atra dvādaśasthāne kartavyāyāṃ yatau dṛtīyapāde tathā na kṛtamiti vaikalye 'pi svarasandhinimittatvānna doṣaḥ /
analyzed: atra dvādaśa sthāne kartavyāyām yatau dṛtīya pāde tathā na kṛtam iti vaikalye svara sandhi nimitta tvāt na doṣaḥ
kriyāvikalam yathā
catur aṅga ripu pyūha nibarhaṇa paṭīyasā

original: bhūpāla tava khaḍgena vipado mānagarvitāḥ // Ckc_2.*32 //
analyzed: bhūpāla tava khaḍgena vipadaḥ māna garvitāḥ
atra nāma śeṣa kriyā antaḥ iti na vidyate
tena kriyā vikalam idam
evam kāraka ādi vikalam api ūhyam
idam asti ādi sāpekṣam samartham vā guṇībhavet
yathā

original: samau tatra mahodāttau viṣamau tu mahoddhatau // Ckc_2.*33 //
analyzed: samau tatra mahā udāttau viṣamau tu mahā uddhatau

original: atra prathamārthe bhavantītyapekṣāyāṃ tadantarbhāvena vaikalye 'pi yatrānya kriyāpadaṃ nāsti tatrāsirbhavatirhi prathamapuruṣe prayujyata ityanuśāsanād  #
analyzed: atra prathamā arthe bhavanti iti apekṣāyām tad antarbhāvena vaikalye na asti tatra asiḥ bhavatiḥ hi prathama puruṣe prayujyate iti anuśāsanāt
guṇa tvam

original: dvītīyārdhe kriyābhāvepyudāttādi guṇasaṃbandhadyotakaniṣṭhāntatvena nirākāṅbhatvāt samarthakatvamiti guṇatvam /
analyzed: dvītīya ardhe kriyā abhāve pi udātta ādi guṇa saṃbandha dyotaka niṣṭha anta tvena nirākāṅbha tvāt samarthaka tvam iti guṇa tvam
kevalam tu anabhivyakta camatkaraṇa kāraṇam
yathā

original: striyaḥ paśyanti rājānaṃ puraḥ paścātparicchadam // Ckc_2.*34 //
analyzed: striyaḥ paśyanti rājānam puras paścāt paricchadam

original: atra guṇādīnāṃ camatkārakāraṇānāmasphuṭatvena pratīteḥ jātimātravattiṣṭhatīti kevalamidam /
analyzed: atra guṇa ādīnām camatkāra kāraṇānām asphuṭa tvena pratīteḥ jāti mātra vat tiṣṭhati iti kevalam idam
tat kevalam chāndasānām āsīḥ ādau guṇībhavet
yathā
sarve grahāḥ sa nabhatrāḥ tava śrī siṅga bhūpate
bhavantu ekādasa sthāna phala dāḥ vara dāḥ sadā
yathā ca

original: amī vediṃ paritaḥ kluptadiṣṇyāḥ samidvantaḥ prāntasaṃstīrṇadarbhāḥ /
analyzed: amī vedim paritas klupta diṣṇyāḥ samidvantaḥ prānta saṃstīrṇa darbhāḥ

original: avaghnanto duritaṃ havyagandhair- vaitānāstvāṃ vahnayaḥ pālayantu // Ckc_2.*36 //
analyzed: avaghnantaḥ duritam havya gandhaiḥ vaitānāḥ tvām vahnayaḥ pālayantu
ityādau asphuṭa camatkāra hetu tvena kevala tve pi śuddha śrotriyasya kaṇva mahā ṛṣeḥ āśīrvākya tvāt grāhya tvam
iti vākya doṣa guṇa vicāraḥ śrīḥ

original: iti sarasasāhityacāturīdhurīṇaviśveśvarakavīndracandra praṇītāyāṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpālakīrtisudhāsāraśītalāyāṃ camatkāracandrikāyāṃ dvitīyo vilāsaḥ
analyzed: iti sarasa sāhitya cāturī dhurīṇa viśveśvara kavi indracandra praṇītāyām śrī siṅga bhūpāla kīrti sudhā sāra śītalāyām camatkāracandrikāyām dvitīyaḥ vilāsaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ vilāsaḥ

original: artho vācyaśva lakṣyaśva vyaṅgayo 'pi ca vivicyate /
analyzed: ca vivicyate
abhidhā vṛtti gamyaḥ ūrthaḥ jāti ādiḥ vācyaḥ īritaḥ

original: yathā dānena karṇo dayayā dilīpo nayena kāvyo vinayena rāmaḥ /
analyzed: yathā dānena karṇaḥ dayayā dilīpaḥ nayena kāvyaḥ vinayena rāmaḥ

original: yadi prasiddhiṃ dadatāmamībhiḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpo nikhilaiḥ prasiddhaḥ // Ckc_3.*1 //
analyzed: yadi prasiddhim dadatām amībhiḥ śrī siṅga bhūpaḥ nikhilaiḥ prasiddhaḥ

original: atra sarveṣāṃ padānāṃ jātyādivācakatvādarthasya vācyatvaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: atra sarveṣām padānām jāti ādi vācaka tvāt arthasya vācya tvam pratīyate
lakṣyārthaḥ tu caturdhā vācya artha ananvayena tatra eva

original: samavetaḥ saṃyuktaḥ sambandhī sadṛśa ṅatyuktaḥ // Ckc_3.3 //
analyzed: samavetaḥ saṃyuktaḥ sambandhī sadṛśaḥ ṅati uktaḥ

original: tatra samaveto lakṣyārtho yathā rājanyake pratibhaṭaṃ pratijanyaraṅge rudraṃ prakāśayati te saravālarekhā /
analyzed: tatra samavetaḥ lakṣya arthaḥ yathā rājanyake pratibhaṭam pratijanya raṅge rudram prakāśayati te saravāla rekhā

original: śrīsiṅgabhūpacakite śaraṇāgate 'smin padmekṣaṇaṃ vivṛṇute hi kaṭākṣarekhā // Ckc_3.*2 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpa cakite śaraṇa āgate smin padma īkṣaṇam vivṛṇute hi kaṭākṣa rekhā
atra rudra śabdaḥ mukhya arthe skhalat gatiḥ

original: tena rudreṇāvinābhūtasya śatṛsaṃharaṇasāmarythasya lakṣaṇayā vivakṣitatvāt samavetalakṣyārthatvam /
analyzed: tena rudreṇa avinābhūtasya śatṛ saṃharaṇa sāmarythasya lakṣaṇayā vivakṣita tvāt samaveta lakṣya artha tvam
nānā diganta jayinam sva pura praveśe kṣīsiṅga bhūpam anubhāvita rāja śabdam
saudha aṅgaṇāni paritas jaya śabda pūrvam ācāra lāja kusuma añjalim utkiranti

original: atra saudhāṅgaṇānāmacetanānāṃ puṣpāñjaliparikṣepāsaṃbhavāt pure ca saudhabāhulyavivakṣayā tatsaṅgatāḥ paurāṅganāḥ lakṣyanta iti saṃyuktalakṣyārthatvam
analyzed: atra saudha aṅgaṇānām acetanānām puṣpa añjali parikṣepa asaṃbhavāt pure ca saudha bāhulya vivakṣayā tad saṅga tāḥ paura aṅganāḥ lakṣyante iti saṃyukta lakṣya artha tvam
virodhya virodhaka bhāva ādiḥ amukhyaḥ sambandhaḥ
tadvān sambandhī
yathā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitipālakaḥ prayatate yadyatsamāṭīkituṃ tattatpūrayituṃ cireṇa niyatirbaddhavratā tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipālakaḥ prayatate yat yat samāṭīkitum tat tat pūrayitum cireṇa niyatiḥ baddha vratā tiṣṭhati

original: asmāsu pratikūlatā tu jahatī bhūyāḥ kṛtārthodyamāḥ jāyethā śvirajīvanī pravasatā masmākamālirgirā // Ckc_3.*4 //
analyzed: asmāsu pratikūla tā tu jahatī bhūyāḥ kṛtārtha udyamāḥ jāyethāḥ śvis ajīvanī pravasatā

original: atra niyatyā bhinnānāṃ ripubhūpatīnāṃ vanaṃ prati cirajīvinī bhūyā ityāśīrāśaṃsāsaṅgaterabhāvāt taddvirūddhaḥ śāparupārtho lakṣyate /
analyzed: atra niyatyā bhinnānām ripu bhūpatīnām vanam prati cira jīvinī bhūyāḥ iti āśīḥ āśaṃsā saṅgateḥ abhāvāt tad dvis ūddhaḥ śāpa rupa arthaḥ lakṣyate
ādi śabdāt avayava avayavi bhāva saṃbandha ādiḥ yathā

original: grīṣmo niḥśvasiteṣu locanayuge varṣāśśaradgaṇḍyor hemantassvasakhīmukheṣu śiśiro 'pyālepane vastuni /
analyzed: grīṣmaḥ niḥśvasiteṣu locana yuge varṣāḥ śarad gaṇḍyoḥ hemantaḥ sva sakhī mukheṣu śiśiraḥ pi ālepane vastuni

original: caitrastalpavikalpanāsu vasati śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate tvāṃ saṃsevitumāgateṣu dharaṇīpāleṣu tadyoṣitām // Ckc_3.*5 //
analyzed: caitraḥ talpavikalpanāsu vasati śrī siṅga pṛthvīpate tvām saṃsevitum āgateṣu dharaṇī pāleṣu tad yoṣitām

original: atrāvayavibhūtartuprakramabhaṅgarūpānupapatteḥ tatparihārāya caitra iti pūrvāvayavenāvayavī vasanto lakṣyate /
analyzed: atra avayavi bhūta ṛtu prakrama bhaṅga rūpa anupapatteḥ tad parihārāya caitraḥ iti pūrva avayavena avayavī vasantaḥ lakṣyate
sādaśyāt lakṣya arthaḥ yathā nāyakasya eva

original: kānte kṛtāgasi puraḥ parivartamāne sakhyaṃ sarojaśaśinoḥ sahasā babhūva /
analyzed: kānte kṛta āgasi puras parivartamāne sakhyam saroja śaśinoḥ sahasā babhūva

original: rūkṣākṣaraṃ sudṛśi vaktumapārayantyām indīvaradvayamavāpa tuṣāradhārām // Ckc_3.*6 //

original: atra sarojādīnāṃ mukhyārthānanvayena tatsadṛśaḥ karatalādilakṣaṇārthaḥ sādṛśyanibandhanayā lakṣaṇayā lakṣyate /
analyzed: atra saroja ādīnām mukhya artha ananvayena tad sadṛśaḥ kara tala ādi lakṣaṇa arthaḥ sādṛśya nibandhanayā lakṣaṇayā lakṣyate

atra ādyaḥ yathā

original: līlālokanalolupaṃ mṛgakulaṃ gantā guhāntānimāṃ- statkpyagrasanavratīha bhavitā dvīpī ruṣīddīpitaḥ /

original: yātā tanmṛgayā ratevanamidaṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpo rayād ityādirbhaya mādiśantyarinṛpāḥ strīṇāmanībhāvratam // Ckc_3.*7 //

original: atra parilīnaśatrubhūvarā giriguhānāyakena nākrāntā iti yattadidaṃ durgaṃbuddhyā na bhavati kintu palāyitā nānuyātavadhyā iti manīṣayeti vastu  #
analyzed: atra parilīna śatru bhū varāḥ giri guhā nāyakena na ākrāntāḥ iti yat tat idam durgaṃ buddhyā na bhavati kintu palāyitāḥ na anuyāta vadhyāḥ iti manīṣayā iti vastu
vyajyate

original: pṛthvīṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpe vahati phaṇavatāmīśitāraṃ pramodā- dākalpaṃ kelitalpaṃ kalayitumanasoradipuṃso nirodhe /

original: bhūmau bhāraprasaṅgātpunarapi patitā kelitalpāpadeśā- dākalpatvaikayogyaṃ bhujaga iti padaṃ gāyate khyātapūrvam // Ckc_3.*8 //

original: atra nāyakasya sarveṣu rājasu sevakeṣu raṇābhāvādalabdhanavakapālasya kapālino jīrṇakapālamālikāsthāne bhūbhāraviyuktaṃ śeṣāhiṃ niveśayitukāmasya  #
analyzed: atra nāyakasya sarveṣu rājasu sevakeṣu raṇa abhāvāt alabdha nava kapālasya kapālinaḥ jīrṇa kapāla mālikā sthāne bhū bhāra viyuktam śeṣa ahim niveśayitu kāmasya
vā iti utprekṣā alahkāraḥ vyajyate

original: kiñca nāyakenaiva jagattrāṇabāra nirvahaṇādāśvastasya nārāyaṇasya nidrāmākāṅkṣata iveti ca tenaiva pratīyate /
analyzed: kiñca nāyakena eva jagat trāṇa bāra nirvahaṇāt āśvastasya nārāyaṇasya nidrām ākāṅkṣate iva iti ca tena eva pratīyate
rasa rūpaḥ tṛtīyaḥ yathā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitināyakasya ripavo dhāṭīkṣaterākulāḥ śuṣyattālupuṭaṃ skhalatpadatalaṃ vyālokayanto diśaḥ /

original: dhāvitvā kathamapyupetya tamasā gāḍhopagūḍhāṃ guhām anviṣyanti tadantare 'pi karasaṃsparśena gartāntaram // Ckc_3.*9 //
analyzed: dhāvitvā katham api upetya tamasā gāḍha upagūḍhām guhām anviṣyanti tad antare pi kara saṃsparśena garta antaram

original: atra nāyakavirodhisamāśrayo bhayānako raso nijavibāvādibhirasaṃlakṣyakramatayā vyajyate /

analyzed: atra maugdya ityādau viruddha gaṇa ghaṭanayā lāsya ityādau viruddha kriyā ghaṭanayā dāmpatyam iti atra
viruddha jāti ghaṭanayā
vaktuḥ bhakti bhāvaḥ vyajyate
evam anye pi ādi śabda grāhyāḥ rasa bhāva ādi rūpāḥ vyaṅya arthāḥ tatra tatra udāharaṇe draṣṭavyāḥ
atha artha doṣāḥ
apārtham vyartham ekartham sa saṃśayam apakramam
paruṣam virasam bhinnam atimātram anujjvalam

original: aślīlaṃ ca viruddhaṃ ca doṣāḥ kāvyārthagocarāḥ // Ckc_3.6 //

atra apārtham ityādau bhāva pradhāna nirdeśāt napuṃsaka tvam avagantavyam
samudāya artha śūnyam yat tat apārtham iti īritam

original: caitye śaṃbhorvadanadaśake vīkṣya dīrghaṃ karāgram matvā durgaṃ lavaṇadhanuṣe kāmadevāya huṃ phaṭ /
analyzed: caitye śaṃbhoḥ vadana daśake vīkṣya dīrgham kara agram matvā durgam lavaṇadhanuṣe kāmadevāya hum phaṭ

original: ityārādhya praṇavamukhare prāñjalau pāraśīke tuṣṭā lakṣmīrvitarati śubhaṃ siṅgabhūpālakāya // Ckc_3.*11 //
analyzed: iti ārādhya praṇava mukhare prāñjalau pāraśīke tuṣṭā lakṣmīḥ vitarati śubham siṅga bhūpālakāya
atra samudāya artha śūnyatā spaṣṭā eva
vyākula unmatta vākya ādau tat guṇībhūya bhūṣayet
vyākula bhāve yathā

original: ko vā jeṣyati somavaṃśatilakānasmān raṇaprāṅgaṇe hantāsmāsu parāṅmukho hatavidhiḥ kiṃ durgamadhyāsmahe /
analyzed: kaḥ vā jeṣyati soma vaṃśa tilakān asmān raṇa prāṅgaṇe hantā asmāsu parāṅmukhaḥ hata vidhiḥ kim durgam adhyāsmahe

original: asmatpūrvanṛpānayaṃ nihatavān dīrghān dhigasmadbhujān kiṃ vākyairanavotasiṅganṛpateḥ sevaiva kṛtyaṃ padam // Ckc_3.*12 //
analyzed: asmad pūrva nṛpān ayam nihatavān dīrghān dhik asmad bhujān kim vākyaiḥ anavota siṅga nṛpateḥ sevā eva kṛtyam padam

original: atra vākyārthanāṃ parasparāsaṅgatatve 'pi nāyakajaitrayātrāsamākarṇanavyākulānāṃ pratyathibhūpānāṃ nānābhāvaśābalyasūcakatvād guṇatvam /
analyzed: atra vākya arthanām nāyaka jaitra yātrā samākarṇana vyākulānām pratyathi bhūpānām nānā bhāva śābalya sūcaka tvāt guṇa tvam
unmatta bhāve yathā

original: autsukyādanavotasiṅganṛpaterākāramālikhya sā nirvarṇyāyamasau mama priya iti premābhiyogabhramāt /
analyzed: autsukyāt anavota siṅga nṛpateḥ ākāram ālikhya sā nirvarṇya ayam asau mama priyaḥ iti prema abhiyoga bhramāt

original: āśūtthāya tatopasṛtya tarasā kiṃcidvivṛttānanā sāsūyaṃ sadarasmitaṃ sacarasmitaṃ sacakitaṃ sākāṅkṣamālaukate // Ckc_3.*13 //
analyzed: āśu utthāya tata upasṛtya tarasā kiṃcid vivṛtta ānanā sa asūyam sa dara smitam sa cara smitam sa cakitam sa ākāṅkṣam ālaukate
atra citram uddiśya āśu utthāna apasaraṇa dṛṣṭi vikāra ādīnām arthānām asaṅga tatvena samudāya tva śūnyatve pi rāga utkarṣa pratipādaka samasta kāma avasthā sūcaka tvāt
guma tvam
vyartham āhuḥ gatārtha yat yat ca syāt aprayojanam
yathā

original: netrābhyāmavalokya siṅganṛpatiṃ dvābhyāṃ raṇe vidviṣaḥ savyūhairabhiyānti sapratibhaṭānālokya garvoddhatān /
analyzed: netrābhyām avalokya siṅga nṛpatim dvābhyām raṇe vidviṣaḥ sa vyūhaiḥ abhiyānti sa pratibhaṭān ālokya garva uddhatān

original: doṣṇā svena nijaṃ kṛpāṇamavate tatkhaḍgadhārāṃ gatās te svaḥstrīkucakumbhayormṛgamadaṃ lumpanti lumpanti ca // Ckc_3.*14 //
analyzed: doṣṇā svena nijam kṛpāṇam avate tad khaḍga dhārām gatāḥ te svar strī kuca kumbhayoḥ mṛgamadam lumpanti lumpanti ca
atra avalokya iti anena eva netrābhyām iti
netrābhyām iti anena eva dvābhyām iti doṣṇā kṛpāṇam avate iti anena eva
svena nijam iti ca artha sāmarthyāt eva avagateḥ netra ādīnām gatārtha tvam
sura strī mṛgamada lepana krīḍayā eva ripūṇām kathā śeṣa tva avagateḥ svar strī iti śabda śleṣa sāmarthya labdha nija strī kuca kumbha mṛgamada lepana kriyāyāḥ aprayojana tvāt
vyartha tvam
idam yāti niśeṣaḥ ced vivakṣyate
yathā
alolaiḥ āśvaryāt avicalita lajjā parimalaiḥ pramodāt udvelaiḥ cakita hariṇī vīkṣaṇa sakhaiḥ
amandaiḥ autsukyāt praṇaya laharī marma piśunaiḥ apāṅagaiḥ siṅga kṣmā ramaṇam abalā vīkṣitavatī
atra nāyakam abalā vīkṣitavatī iti anena eva ananya siddhena avagatasya apāṅagaiḥ iti asya gatārtha tve pi niṣpanda tva lajjā parimala ādi viśeṣa vivakṣayā upātta tvāt adoṣaḥ
aprayojanasya yathā

original: saṅkalpairanavotasiṅganṛpatau saṃrūḍhamūlāṅkurai- rākrāntā tanutāṃ gatā smaraśaraiśśāteva śātodarī /
analyzed: saṅkalpaiḥ anava uta siṅga nṛpatau saṃrūḍha mūla aṅkuraiḥ rākrāntā tanu tām gatā smara śaraiḥ śātā iva śāta udarī

original: asmannūlamidaṃ tanutvamiti kiṃ lajjālasai locane prāpte pakṣmapuṭāvṛtiṃ ratipatestat ketanaṃ jṛmbhatām // Ckc_3.*16 //
analyzed: asmad nūlam idam tanu tvam iti kim lajjā alasaiḥ locane prāpte pakṣma puṭa āvṛtim ratipateḥ tat ketanam jṛmbhatām
atra mīna vijṛmbhaṇa kathanasya prakṛta avasthā anupayogi tvena aprayojaka tve loke prāyeṇa

original: paribhūtānāṃ parābhaviturāpadaṃ vinā vijṛmbhaṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti locanayorapunarunmīlanasūcanena
analyzed: paribhūtānām parābhavituḥ āpadam vinā vijṛmbhaṇam na saṃbhavati iti locanayoḥ apunar unmīlana sūcanena
navama avasthāyāḥ parākāṣṭhā pratīyate iti guṇa tvam
ukta abhinna artham ekārtham
yathā

original: saṃrakṣitāṃ vetanamānanābhyāṃ karoti senāṃ vinihatya śatrūn /
analyzed: saṃrakṣitām vetana mānanābhyām karoti senām vinihatya śatrūn

original: kalyāṇabhūpo vinihatya śatrūn balāni saṃrakṣati vetanādyaḥ // Ckc_3.*17 //
analyzed: kalyāṇa bhūpaḥ vinihatya śatrūn balāni saṃrakṣati vetana ādyaḥ
atra pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ apṛthak abhiprāya tvāt ekārtham
rasa udreke tu ayam guṇaḥ
yathā

original: kumāraśrīsiṅge jaladhiraśanāṃ śāsati mahīm amaryādādhvastāḥ patanapariṇāhapratibhuvaḥ /
analyzed: kumāra śrī siṅge jaladhi raśanām śāsati mahīm amaryādā dhvastāḥ patana pariṇāha pratibhuvaḥ

original: adharmā nirmūlā narakaparipākapraṇidhayo vinaṣṭā duśceṣṭāḥ kalikaluṣaveśīparidhayaḥ // Ckc_3.*18 //
analyzed: adharmāḥ nirmūlāḥ naraka paripāka praṇidhayaḥ vinaṣṭāḥ duśceṣṭāḥ kali kaluṣa veśī paridhayaḥ
atra dvitīya ādiṣu pādeṣu bhinna artha tva abhāve pi kenacid adharma gandhaḥ pi asmad deśe
na vidyate iti tris vācā dharma pratiṣṭhāpaka svāmi pakṣapāta atiśaya upakṣiptam sa udrekeṇa
cetasā abhihita tvāt guṇa tvam
sandeha dāyaka artham yat sasaṃśayam iti īritam
yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpa dhāṭīṣu vidviṣaḥ hīna sādhanāḥ
sāla śreṇim upāśritya kurvate jīvatam tṛṇam

original: atra hīnasādhanā vidviṣaḥ sālaśreṇiṃ prākārapaṅktimāśritya jīvanaṃ prāṇān tṛṇaṃ kurvate tṛṇāya manyanta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atra hīna sādhanāḥ vidviṣaḥ sāla śreṇim prākāra paṅktim āśritya jīvanam prāṇān tṛṇam kurvate tṛṇāya manyante iti arthaḥ

original: athavā sālaśreṇiṃ vāṭikāmāśritya hīnasādhanāḥ tṛṇaṃ jīvanaṃ prāṇadhāraṇaṃ kurvata iti ca nāsatpratipakṣatvamasatpratipakṣatvaṃ ve 'ti saṃśayapratīteḥ  #
analyzed: athavā sāla śreṇim vāṭikām āśritya hīna sādhanāḥ tṛṇam jīvanam prāṇadhāraṇam kurvate iti ca na asat pratipakṣa tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam vā iti saṃśaya pratīteḥ
sa saṃśayam idam
utkarṣa ādi vivakṣāyām asya api guṇa gauravam
yathā
kokila spardhi sallāpāḥ mṛga vairi vilocanāḥ

original: vāmāḥ śyāmā vaśīkartuṃ neśate siṅgabhūpatim // Ckc_3.*20 //
analyzed: vāmāḥ śyāmāḥ vaśīkartum na īśate siṅga bhūpatim

original: atra kokilaspardhinaḥ kokilasvaravat kalamadhurāssallāpā yāsāṃ tāḥ /
analyzed: atra kokila spardhinaḥ kokila svara vat kala madhurāḥ sat lāpāḥ yāsām tāḥ
mṛga vairīṇi mṛga locana tulyāni locanāni yāsām tāḥ

original: vāmāḥ ramyāḥ śyāmā yuvatayo nāyakaṃ vaśīkartuṃ neśate na śaktā ityanena strīvyasanamasya nāstīti /
analyzed: vāmāḥ ramyāḥ śyāmāḥ yuvatayaḥ nāyakam vaśīkartum na īśate na śaktāḥ iti anena strī vyasanam asya na asti iti

original: uta kokilaspardhināṃ kākānāṃ sallāpa iva sallāpā yāsāṃ tāḥnāmāḥ vakrāḥ śyāmāḥ kālāṅgyaḥ
analyzed: uta kokila spardhinām kākānām sallāpaḥ iva sallāpāḥ yāsām tāḥ nāmāḥ vakrāḥ śyāmāḥ kāla aṅgyaḥ

original: enaṃ vaśīkartuṃ neśata ityanenānuttamāsu kākasvarāḍhyāsu strīṣu na ramanta iti kāmaśāstraparijñānamastīti
analyzed: enam vaśīkartum na īśate iti anena anuttamāsu kāka svara āḍhyāsu strīṣu na ramante iti kāmaśāstra parijñānam asti iti
vā sandehe ubhayathā api nāyaka utkarṣa pratītiḥ iti guṇa tvam
paurvāparya viparyāsaḥ yatra syāt tat apakramam
yathā
ghora ajiḥ aṅge pratipakṣa bhūpāḥ śrī kiṅga bhūpāla vasum vilokya
kurvanti mauhūrtika sārvabhaumaiḥ prayāṇa horā pariśodhanāni

original: atra pūrvaṃ purānnirgatya pratipakṣabhūpaiḥ paśvādatikrāntaprayāṇalagnapariśodhanaṃ kriyata ityapakramatvam /
analyzed: atra pūrvam purāt nirgatya pratipakṣa bhūpaiḥ paśvāt atikrānta prayāṇa lagna pariśodhanam kriyate iti apakrama tvam
citra hetu ādiṣu prāyas guṇa tām asya manvate
yathā
paścāt muñcati te cittam kṣamām śrī siṅga bhūpate

original: purastādeva muñcanti paurastyā bhūbhujaḥ kṣamāḥ // Ckc_3.*22 //
analyzed: purastāt eva muñcanti paurastyāḥ bhūbhujaḥ kṣamāḥ
atra pūrva bhāvinaḥ nāyaka citte titikṣā mokṣaṇasya hetoḥ
hetumataḥ paśvāt bhāvinaḥ prati rāja nija deśa mokṣaṇasya ca paurvāparya viparyasāt apakrama tve
pi nāyaka titikṣā mokṣaṇasya deśa mokṣaṇa lakṣaṇa pratirāja sādhvasa uddīpana prakāśana para tvāt adoṣaḥ
pratyakṣa niṣṭhura artham yat paruṣam tat nigadyate
yathā

original: gaṇaḍagrāvatale nipātayata vā gartāntare datta vā vyāghrāṇāṃ purataḥ parikṣipata vā vyākrośato bālakān /
analyzed: gaṇaḍa grāva tale nipātayata vā garta antare datta vā vyāghrāṇām puratas parikṣipata vā vyākrośataḥ bālakān

original: hantāmī parito vanaṃ mṛgayataḥ kṣmāpālacūḍāmaṇeḥ vartante bhavatībhiradya hivayaṃ sarve 'pi dahyāmahe // Ckc_3.*23 //
analyzed: hanta amī paritas vanam mṛgayataḥ kṣmāpāla cūḍāmaṇeḥ vartante bhavatībhiḥ adya hi vayam sarve dahyāmahe

original: atra nāyakacamūdhāṭībhayena giriguhāsu līnānāṃ kulīnakuṭumbinīruddiśya bālakarodananivāraṇābhiprāyamātrāṇyapi pratyakṣe rūkṣārthānyakṣarāṇi  #
analyzed: atra nāyaka camū dhāṭī bhayena giri guhāsu līnānām kulīna kuṭumbinīḥ uddiśya bālaka rodana nivāraṇa abhiprāya mātrāṇi api pratyakṣe rūkṣa arthāni akṣarāṇi
gaditāni iti paruṣa tvam
hita upadeśa atikrānta smaraṇa ādau ca tat guṇaḥ
hitopadeśe yathā

original: asmadvakṣasijadvayātkimu sukhaṃ svardanti kumbhadvayaṃ pīyūṣaṃ kimu sāramasmadadharādasmādapasmāritam /
analyzed: asmad vakṣasija dvayāt kimu sukham svardanti kumbha dvayam pīyūṣam kimu sāram asmad adharāt asmāt apasmāritam

original: ko 'yaṃ vo janiteti sāhasarasān śrīvīrasiṅghaprabho saṃrambhādapasārayantyarinṛpān prauḍhāḥ pratītoktibhiḥ // Ckc_3.*24 //
analyzed: kaḥ yam vaḥ janitā iti sāhasa rasān śrī vīrasiṅgha prabho saṃrambhāt apasārayanti ari nṛpān prauḍhāḥ pratīta uktibhiḥ

original: atra māraṇaśūcanābhiprāyeṇa paruṣatve 'pi maraṇaparyavasāyī balavatā nāyakena virodhaḥ pariharaṇīya iti hitopadeśatvād guṇatvam /
analyzed: atra māraṇa śūcana abhiprāyeṇa paruṣa tve pi maraṇa paryavasāyī balavatā nāyakena virodhaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ iti hita upadeśa tvāt guṇa tvam
atikrānta smaraṇe yathā

original: yanmukto 'yamajihvikā priyasakhā tvatkhaḍgadhārāmukhād yo dṛṣṭo na ca taiḥ kirātahatakairdurgopahārodyataiḥ /
analyzed: yat muktaḥ yamajihvikā priya sakhā tvad khaḍga dhārā mukhāt yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na ca taiḥ kirāta hatakaiḥ durga upahāra udyataiḥ

original: tacvanmaṅgala sūtravaibhava miti prastauti siṅgaprabhor dhāṭīsaṃbhramanaṣṭaduṣṭapatikā ñcaikāṃ striyaṃ bandhutā // Ckc_3.*25 //
analyzed: sūtra vaibhava miti prastauti siṅga prabhoḥ striyam bandhu tā
atra prathama ardhe paruṣa tve pi saṃbhāvita atikrānta anuvāda mātra paratvāt guṇa tvam
virasam virasa arthaḥ syāt anaucitya kalaṅkataḥ
yathā
śrutvā siṅga kṣitipati raṇa ārambha gambhīra ghoṣān śuṣyat tālu prati nṛpatayaḥ stabdha jaṅgham patantaḥ

original: saṃmuhyante śrutiṣu marutāṃ śailakāntāradeśe niryāntīṣu śrutipujasukhaṃ vaiṇavībhyo vapābhyaḥ // Ckc_3.*26 //
analyzed: saṃmuhyante śrutiṣu marutām śaila kāntāra deśe niryāntīṣu śruti puja sukham vaiṇavībhyaḥ vapābhyaḥ
atra dhāṭī bhayena palāyamānānām manasaḥ kīcaka randhra samīraṇa śravaṇa sukha anusandhānam anucitam iti virasa tvam
apradhānasya vijñeyaḥ guṇībhāvaḥ sya kovidaiḥ
yathā

original: kastūryā tatkapola dvayabhuvi makarī nirmitau prastutāyāṃ nirmitsūnāṃ svavakṣasyatiparicayācvatpraśasterupāṃśu /
analyzed: kastūryā tad kapola dvaya bhuvi makarī nirmitau prastutāyām nirmitsūnām sva vakṣasi ati paricaya ācvat praśasteḥ upāṃśu

original: vīra śrīsiṅgabhūpa tvadahitakubhujāṃ rājyalakṣmīsapatnī- mānavyājena lajjāṃ sapadi vidadhate svāvarodhāḥ pragalbhāḥ // Ckc_3.*27 //
analyzed: vīra śrī siṅga bhūpa tvad ahita kubhujām rājya lakṣmī sapatnī māna vyājena lajjām sapadi vidadhate sva avarodhāḥ pragalbhāḥ
atra pratināyaka gatā nāyaka biruda vilekhana nimittayā janitā sva avarodha sānnidhya ādibhiḥ uddīpitā
lajjā anumitaiḥ nirveda dainya viṣāda ādibhiḥ abhivyaktā nirveda dainya viṣāda ādibhiḥ upacitā

original: tadanu tadanumitaireva mānasikakutsādibhirabhivyaktā nijajīvitajugupsā ca svāvarodhaviṣayā
analyzed: tadanu tad anumitaiḥ eva mānasika kutsā ādibhiḥ abhivyaktā nija jīvita jugupsā ca sva avarodha viṣayā
tad prāgalbhūya ādibhiḥ uddīpitā makarikā tapatra nirmāṇa dibhiḥ abhivyaktā tad anumitaiḥ

original: harṣādibhirupacitā ratiśva nirbharamekatra saṃniveśita ityanaucityena virasatve 'pi
analyzed: harṣa ādibhiḥ upacitā nirbharam ekatra saṃniveśitaḥ iti anaucityena virasa tve pi
tayoḥ nāyaka biruda vileśana hetu tayā nāyaka kṛpā kaṭākṣa prasāda sampanna tayā ca na saṃbhāvyamānayoḥ śaraṇa āgata rakṣaṇa lakṣaṇa nāyaka gata para upakāra tvena
prādhānyāt aduṣṭa tvam
prakrānta bhaṅgī anirvāhaḥ bhinnam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
yathā
gauḍī pāna mada alasāḥ parigalat dhammilla mallī srajaḥ sa vyāja skhalita uktayaḥ madavatī sīmanta ratna śriyaḥ

original: tāruṇyodadhiśīkarā smarakalāsāmrājyasiddhikriyāḥ śrīsiṅgakṣitipāla tāvakaguṇān gāyanti gauḍāṅganāḥ // Ckc_3.*28 //
analyzed: tāruṇya udadhi śīkarā smara kalā sāmrājya siddhi kriyāḥ śrī siṅga kṣitipāla tāvaka guṇān gāyanti gauḍa aṅganāḥ
atra matta jāti upakramasya madavatī ityādi guṇa varṇanena anirvāhāt guṇa tvam

original: asyāpi guṇatā kvāpi yadi chāyā na hīyate // Ckc_3.21 //
analyzed: asya api guṇa tā kvāpi yadi chāyā na hīyate

original: yathā grīṣmo niḥśvasiteṣu locanayuge varṣāḥ śaradgaṇḍayoriti pūrvodāhṛteṣu ṛtuṣvekavacanaprakramasya
analyzed: yathā grīṣmaḥ niḥśvasiteṣu locana yuge varṣāḥ śarad gaṇḍayoḥ iti pūrva udāhṛteṣu ṛtuṣu ekavacana prakramasya

original: varṣā iti bahuvacanopādānād bhinnatve 'pi bhūmnyeva varṣā ityanuśāsanād bahuvacanaśruterapyarthaikyasyātyājyatvādekavacanachāyā
analyzed: varṣāḥ iti bahuvacana upādānāt bhinna tve pi bhūmni eva varṣāḥ iti anuśāsanāt bahuvacana śruteḥ api artha aikyasya atyājya tvāt ekavacana chāyā
na hīyate iti guṇa tvam
yat aśraddheyam atyuktam atimātram tat ucyate
yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpāla tava ahitānām niḥśvāsa vegā giri kānanāni
kurvanti nirdagdha nikuñja puñjam paryasta gaṇḍa upala maṇḍalāni
atra parābhava bhārāt ati uṣṇānām ati bahulānām api ripu nṛpāla niḥśvāsa vegānām tathāvidha dāhaka kṣepaka tvayoḥ aśraddheya tvam iti atimātra tvam
asya api guṇatām kecid yathāpūrvam samarthane
vadanti anye tu sarasā loka sthiti anurodhataḥ
ādyam yathā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitipāla tāvakacamūdhāṭīṣu vājichaṭā riṃkhoddhūtarajobhirambunidhayo viśve 'pi gādhīkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipāla tāvaka camū dhāṭīṣu vāji chaṭāḥ riṃkha uddhūta rajobhiḥ ambunidhayaḥ viśve gādhīkṛtāḥ

original: cañcatketupaṭāntavāntapavanair bhūyopyagādhīkṛtāḥ bhadre bhendramadāmbunā punaramī pūrvādhikaṃ pūritāḥ // Ckc_3.*30 //
analyzed: cañcat ketu paṭa anta vānta pavanaiḥ bhūyas upi agādhīkṛtāḥ bhadre bhā indra mada ambunā punar amī pūrva adhikam pūritāḥ

original: atra senāvājirajasā samudrāṇāṃ śoṣaṇa sthalīkaraṇādiratimātratve 'pi punarapivāripūrakalpanayā vastusthiteravirodhād gāḍhamārgānuvartināṃ vidagdhānāmatiguṇatvam
analyzed: atra senā vāji rajasā samudrāṇām śoṣaṇa sthalīkaraṇa ādi ratimātra tve punar api vāripūra kalpanayā vastu sthiteḥ avirodhāt gāḍha mārga anuvartinām vidagdhānām atiguṇa tvam
dvitīyam yathā

original: yātreyaṃ kuladevatāsu kimutodvāhakramo bhūbhujām ācārā nu sakhīti vā pratipataṃ vadhvā vivāhotsave /
analyzed: yātrā iyam kula devatāsu kim uta udvāha kramaḥ bhūbhujām ācārā nu sakhī iti vā vadhvāḥ vivāha utsave

original: dhāṭīsaṃśravaṇā tpalāyanavatāṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpadviṣāṃ rājñāṃ marmanikṛntane paṭutarā tanmaṇḍalāgrādapi // Ckc_3.*31 //
analyzed: dhāṭī saṃśravaṇā tpalāyanavatām śrī siṅga bhūpa dviṣām rājñām marma nikṛntane paṭutarā tad maṇḍala agrāt api

original: atra vācāṃ khaḍgādapi hṛdayamarmabhedakathanā datimātratve 'pi tādṛśānāṃ tādṛśāni vacanāni vajrādapi hṛdayamarmāṇi bhindanti /
analyzed: atra vācām khaḍgāt api hṛdaya marma bheda kathanā tādṛśānām tādṛśāni vacanāni vajrāt api hṛdaya marmāṇi bhindanti
kim uta khaḍga ādiḥ iti loka sthiteḥ anuvartanāt vidarbha mārga anusāriṇām dākṣiṇātyānām atiguṇa tvam
na ati sphuṭa camatkāram anujjvalam iti īritam
yathā

original: kroḍān khananti vipine bhakṣayanti mṛgān kuśān /
analyzed: kroḍān khananti vipine bhakṣayanti mṛgān kuśān
nidrānti pādapa chāye kalyāṇa nṛpa vidviṣaḥ

original: atra vidviṣāṃ nagareṣu bhayavyākulatayā kadācidapi nidrā cakṣuḥ nopaiti bhraṣṭarājyāstu
analyzed: atra vidviṣām nagareṣu bhaya vyākula tayā kadācid api nidrā cakṣuḥ na upaiti bhraṣṭa rājyāḥ tu

original: kāntāre vanyajantuvat visrabdhā nidrāntīti vivakṣitasyāpi camatkārasyātikleśena pratīte
analyzed: kāntāre vanya jantu vat visrabdhāḥ nidrānti iti vivakṣitasya api camatkārasya ati kleśena pratīte
rasphuṭa alaṅkāra tvāt ca anujjvala tvam

original: vidagdhahṛdayāḥ vkāpi tasyāpi guṇatāṃ viduḥ // Ckc_3.25 //
analyzed: vidagdha hṛdayāḥ tasya api guṇa tām viduḥ
yathā sarve grahāḥ sa nakṣatrāḥ ityādi pūrva udāhṛtam
atra jāti ādi artha alaṅkāra viraheṇa anujjvala tve pi śuddha śrotriya āśīrvāda anukaraṇa tvāt guṇa tvam
spaṣṭam nāmnā eva lakṣitam
nīca adhika upamāne yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpa bhavadīya kṛpāṇa rekhām ālokya paktimakuśa agra niśāta dhārām

original: līnāḥ praviśya vipinaṃ pradarāntarālaṃ nārāyaṇodaradarīmiva vairibhūpāḥ // Ckc_3.*33 //
analyzed: līnāḥ praviśya vipinam pradara antarālam nārāyaṇa udara darīm iva vairi bhūpāḥ

original: atra khaḍgadhārāṃ prati kuśadhārāyāmatiniśātatve nīcatvādatinīcopamānatvaṃ vipinapradaraṃ prati vaipulyena nārāyaṇodarasyātyādhikyādadhikopamānatvam
analyzed: atra khaḍga dhārām prati kuśa dhārāyām ati niśāta tve nīca tvāt ati nīca upamāna tvam vipina pradaram prati vaipulyena nārāyaṇa udarasya ati ādhikyāt adhika upamāna tvam
asadṛkṣa upamāna tvam yathā
maṇḍalīkṛta kodaṇḍaḥ raṇe kalyāṇa bhūpatiḥ
kara kampita kalhāraḥ mīna ahkaḥ iva rājate
atra kodaṇḍa saugandhikayoḥ sāmya gandhasya abāvāt asadṛkṣa upamāna tvam
ādyayoḥ tu guṇībhāvaḥ kadāpi kavi kauśalāt
yathā
paripanthini siṅga nṛpaḥ dhana kaṇikām kanakagiriḥ iva ādatte

original: pātre tiṣṭhati purataḥ tṛṇakaṇavacyajati kanakāni // Ckc_3.*35 //
analyzed: pātre tiṣṭhati puratas kanakāni
atra kanaka giri tṛṇa kaṇayoḥ atyadhika nīcayoḥ upamāna tve pi nāyakasya artha dharma arjana apramādau ati śaya vivakṣāyām na duṣyataḥ
asadṛkṣa upamānasya vyatireka upamā ādiṣu
yathā

original: avivekī na surabhivat cintāmaṇiriva na yāti kāṭhinyam /
analyzed: avivekī na surabhi vat cintāmaṇiḥ iva na yāti kāṭhinyam
atra upamāna upameyayoḥ vaiṣamye pi vyatireka upamāna tvāt guṇa tvam
aprasiddha upamānam tu bhavet aprathita upamam
yathā
hanta saugandhika karāḥ sphuṭa kokanada aṃghrayaḥ
śrī kiṅga bhūpa dhāṭībhiḥ jarjarāḥ ghūrjara striyaḥ

original: atra saugandhikakokanadayoḥ kāntākaracaraṇopamānatvena kaviprayogeṣu na prasiddhiriti duṣṭatvam /
analyzed: atra saugandhika kokanadayoḥ kāntā kara caraṇa upamāna tvena kavi prayogeṣu na prasiddhiḥ iti duṣṭa tvam
asya api guṇa tā taraṅgita camatkṛteḥ
yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpāla bhavat prayukta nārāca paṅktyā paritas patantyā
rāji vīra ahita rāja kaṇṭhe sura aṅganā saṃvaraṇa srajā iva

original: atra nārājapaṅiktasvayaṃvaraṇasrajorupameyopamānabhāvāprasiddhāvapi surāṅgānāṃ bhoga hetutvasāmyācchamatkārātisya iti guṇatvam /
analyzed: atra na a rāja paṅikta svayaṃvaraṇa srajoḥ upameya upamāna bhāva aprasiddhau api sura aṅgānām bhogaḥ hetu tva sāmyāt śamatkāra atisyaḥ iti guṇa tvam
aślīlam tat vinirdiṣṭam yat aślīla pratīti kṛt
yathā
uddīpitāḥ prahāreṇa bhūpāla tava śātravāḥ
randhre prahartum auddhatyāt unnamanti namanti ca

original: atra prahāroddīpanaṃ randhraprahārāya namanonnamane ca śiśne 'pi vidyete iti tatpratīteraślīlatvam /
analyzed: atra prahāra uddīpanam randhra prahārāya namana unnamane ca śiśne vidyete iti tad pratīteḥ aślīla tvam
asya api guṇa tā jñeyā kavi indra svīkṛta ādiṣu
yathā

original: jitvā tatpariraṃbhaṇa prakṛtikaṃ dyūte sakhīnāṃ puraḥ śāryāropaṇasūcite paṇavidhau śrīsiṅgabhūmībhujā /
analyzed: jitvā dyūte sakhīnām puras śāryā āropaṇa sūcite paṇa vidhau śrī siṅga bhūmībhujā
manda smera kapola kānti laharī saṃkrānta vaktra īkṣaṇā sā āsvinna aṅguli śārikā parikaram sajjīkaroti priyā

original: atra śārikāstryupari śārikāropaṇena pumbhāvakelirūpasyāślīlasya pratīteraślīlatve 'pi kavibhirevaṃvidhasyāslīlasyāṅgīkārād guṇatvam /
analyzed: atra śārikā strī upari śārikā āropaṇena pumbhāva keli rūpasya aślīlasya pratīteḥ aślīla tve pi kavibhiḥ evaṃvidhasya aslīlasya aṅgīkārāt guṇa tvam

original: kutra kavibhirevamurarīkṛtamiti cettarhi sādhu sarvato nidarśayāmaḥ /
analyzed: kutra kavibhiḥ evam urarīkṛtam iti ced tarhi sādhu sarvatas nidarśayāmaḥ
tathā hi

original: tadānanaṃ mṛtsurabhi kṣitīśvaro rahasyupāghrāya na tṛptimāyayau // Ckc_3.*41 //
analyzed: tad ānanam mṛd surabhi kṣitīśvaraḥ rahasi upāghrāya na tṛptim āyayau
iti raghuvaṃśe

iti kumārasaṃbhave
mukha pradhānaiḥ kaṇṭha grahaiḥ kṣipra nipīḍita aṅgaiḥ

original: karapracāraiḥ śithiloparodhairlabdhaiḥ priyāyā mumude mukundaḥ // Ckc_3.*43 //
analyzed: kara pracāraiḥ śithila uparodhaiḥ labdhaiḥ priyāyāḥ mumude mukundaḥ
iti kandarpa saṃbhave
protayā galita nīvi nirasyan uttarīyam avalambita kāñci

iti bhārabikāvye
āśu laṅghitavatī iṣṭa kara agre nīvim ardha mukulīkṛta dṛṣṭyā
rakta vaiṇika hata adhara tantri maṇḍala kvaṇiṃta cāru cukūje
iti māgha kāvye evam anyatra api vijñeyam
deśa kāle kalā loka nyāya āgama virodhi yat
sāhitya prāṇasāra jñaiḥ tat viruddham iti īritam
tatra deśaḥ ndhraḥ mahārāṣṭra ādiḥ kālaḥ naktaṃdiva ṛtaṃvaḥ
gīti nīti prabhṛtayaḥ kālāḥ kāma artha saṃśrayāḥ
cara acarāṇām bhūtānām pravṛttiḥ lokaḥ ucyate
nyāyaḥ tu yāt āgamaḥ dharma saṃhitā
deśa ādi viruddhāni yathā

original: rādhe māsi divāniśaṃ mṛgamadavyālepino mālatī śayyāyāṃ yamunātaraṅgapavanasparśotsukairvatsalaiḥ /
analyzed: rādhe māsi divāniśam mṛgamada vyālepinaḥ mālatī śayyāyām yamunā taraṅga pavana sparśa utsukaiḥ vatsalaiḥ

original: dhātrīnāyakasevanāya militā bhūmīśvarā mānino rājādrau maṇihārasaurabhamayaiḥ krīḍhanti bandījanaiḥ // Ckc_3.*46 //
analyzed: dhātrīnāyaka sevanāya militāḥ bhūmīśvarāḥ māninaḥ rāja adrau maṇi hāra saurabha mayaiḥ krīḍhanti bandī janaiḥ
atra āndhra deśe yamunā iti deśa nirodhaḥ
mālatī śayyā iti kāla virodhaḥ
hārāṇām saurabham iti loka virodhaḥ
ete pratyakṣa virodhāḥ
māninaḥ sovāḥ militāḥ iti sva vacana virodhaḥ
bandi janāḥ vatsalāḥ iti aucitya virodhaḥ
anya sevakānām aharniśam krīḍā iti yukti virodhaḥ
ete anumāna virodhāḥ
bandīkṛtaiḥ para parigrahaiḥ krīḍanti iti karma saṃhitā virodhaḥ
bandīṣu anya āsakteḥ vyasanam apakṛta strīṣu viśvāsaḥ ca iti artha āgama virodhaḥ
grīṣme divāniśam krīḍanam pakṣāt varṣa nidāghayoḥ iti āyurveda virodhaḥ
grīṣme kastūrikā vilepanam bhoga śāstra virodhaḥ

original: atrāgamāntarbhūtānāmapi kalāśāstrāṇāṃ pṛthagabhidhānaṃ tadjñānasya sāhitye prādhānyajñāpanārtham /
analyzed: atra āgama antarbhūtānām api kalā śāstrāṇām pṛthak abhidhānam tad jñānasya sāhitye prādhānya jñāpana artham
mahā utpāta anubhāva ādi vivakṣāyām idam guṇaḥ
utpāta vivakṣāyām yathā

original: uddaṇḍapratigaṇḍabheravavibho smere kaṭākṣe ruṣā jāte kokanadacchavipratibhaṭe rāṣṭreṣu vidveṣiṇām /
analyzed: uddaṇḍa pratigaṇḍa bherava vibho smere kaṭākṣe ruṣā jāte kokanada chavi pratibhaṭe rāṣṭreṣu vidveṣiṇām

original: mākandāśśarati prabhūtakalikāḥ padmaṃ kukūlodare pāṣāṇāḥ prahasanti hanta dadhate sandhyāsu nidrā dvijāḥ // Ckc_3.*47 //
analyzed: mākandāḥ śarati prabhūta kalikāḥ padmam kukūla udare pāṣāṇāḥ prahasanti hanta dadhate sandhyāsu nidrāḥ dvijāḥ
atra śaradi mākanda prasūnāni iti kāla virodhaḥ

original: kukūlodare padmamiti yuktivirodhaḥ pāṣāṇāḥ prahasantīti lokavirodhaḥ /
analyzed: ku kūla udare padmam iti yukti virodhaḥ pāṣāṇāḥ prahasanti iti loka virodhaḥ
tat eṣām duṣṭa tve pi nāyaka kopa janiṣyamāṇa parāṣṭra vipatti sūcaka tur nimitta vivakṣayā guṇa tvam
anubhāva viva bhāyām yathā
kastūrī mṛga yūdha sevita talaiḥ karpūra pālī drumaiḥ ārāmān abhirāma tām upagatān ālokya rāja acale

original: vismerā hṛdi pañcavarṇakaśukādākarṇya karṇotsavaṃ śrīsiṅgakṣitipālavikramakalāṃ nandantyapūrve janāḥ // Ckc_3.*48 //
analyzed: vismerāḥ hṛdi pañca varṇaka śukāt ākarṇya karṇa utsavam śrī siṅga kṣitipāla vikrama kalām nandanti apūrve janāḥ
atra andhra deśe kastūrī mṛga karpūra druma ādi saddhāvaḥ iti deśa viruddha tve pi nānā dvīpa adhīśa sakāśāt upāyana grahaṇa samartha nāyaka prabhāva varṇana vivakṣayā
guṇa tvam
śabda artha rūpam tat itam kāvyam śabda artha kovidaiḥ
traividhyena camatkāri camatkāritaram yathā
camatkāritamam ca iti pravivicya nidarśitam
śabda cāru tva tātparye camatkārī iti kathyate
yathā

original: sarasi sarasatīre sārasārāpasāre viharati bharitaughe rājaśailādhirājaḥ // Ckc_3.*49 //
analyzed: sarasi sarasa tīre sāra sāra apasāre viharati bharita oghe rāja śaila adhirājaḥ

original: atrānuprāsanirvahaṇamātre kaviprayatnasya viśrānteḥ śabdamātracārutvādidaṃ kāvyaṃ camatkārītyucyate /
analyzed: atra anuprāsa nirvahaṇa mātre kavi prayatnasya viśrānteḥ śabda mātra cāru tvāt idam kāvyam camatkāri iti ucyate
vācya cāru tva tātparye camatkāritaram matam
yathā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitipāla tāvakacamūdhāṭībhayāṭīkitān ākārairapi śābarairapihitān ghorāṅgaṇe phakkaṇe /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipāla tāvaka camū dhāṭī bhaya āṭīkitān ākāraiḥ api śābaraiḥ apihitān ghora aṅgaṇe phakkaṇe

original: ātmīyaiva hi paśyatāṃ piśunayatyābālagaupālakaṃ bhūpālātkuliśātapatra kalaśīcihnā padānāṃ tatiḥ // Ckc_3.*50 //
analyzed: ātmīyā eva hi paśyatām piśuna yatyā ā bāla gaupālakam bhūpālāt kuliśa ātapatra kalaśī cihnā padānām tatiḥ

original: atra kaitavakirātānāṃ pratināyakānāṃ kulisādirājalakṣaṇalakṣitapadāvalīparijñānena yadime rājāna ityabhyūhanaṃ so 'yamanumānāmaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: atra kaitava kirātānām pratināyakānām kulisa ādi rāja lakṣaṇa lakṣita pada āvalī parijñānena yat ime rājānaḥ iti abhyūhanam saḥ yam anumāna amaṅkāraḥ

original: tatraiva kaviprayatnasya viśrāntiriti vācakākṣaramullaṅghya vācyacārutvatātparyāditaṃ camatkāritaramityucyate /
analyzed: tatra eva kavi prayatnasya viśrāntiḥ iti vācaka akṣaram ullaṅghya vācya cāru tva tātparyāditam camatkāritaram iti ucyate
vyaṅgi arya ca guṇībhāve tat eva āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
iha upasarjanī bhūtam aṣṭadhā vyaṅgyam ucyate
tathā ca āhuḥ
agūḍham aparasya aṅgam vācya siddhi aṅgam asphuṭam
sandigdha tulya prādhānye ma sundaram
iti
agūḍha vyaṅgyam yathā
kastūrī mṛga yūtha sevita talaiḥ karpūra pālī drumaiḥ ārāmān abhirāma tām upagatān ālokya rāja acale

original: vismerā hṛdi pañcavarṇakaśukādākarṇya karṇotsavaṃ śrīsiṅgakṣitipālavikramakalāṃ nandantyapūrve janāḥ // Ckc_3.*51 //
analyzed: vismerāḥ hṛdi pañca varṇaka śukāt ākarṇya karṇa utsavam śrī siṅga kṣitipāla vikrama kalām nandanti apūrve janāḥ

original: atra vikramakalāmityarthaśaktimūlasya nānādvīpādhipaprahitasyopāyanaviśeṣarūpasya vyaṅgyasyoparyeva prabhāvādidamagūḍhaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ nāma camatkāritaraṃ  #
analyzed: atra vikrama kalām iti artha śakti mūlasya nānā dvīpa adhipa prahitasya upāyana viśeṣa rūpasya vyaṅgyasya upari eva prabhāvāt idam agūḍham vyaṅgyam nāma camatkāritaram
kāvyam
apara aṅga vyaṅgyam yathā

original: cūtālokabhiyā nimīlitadṛśo rañjanti bhāgāntaraṃ bandhūnāṃ ca kuhūbhiyā śrutirudho nākarṇayantyo giraḥ /
analyzed: cūta āloka bhiyā nimīlita dṛśaḥ rañjanti bhāga antaram bandhūnām ca kuhū bhiyā śruti rudhaḥ na ākarṇayantyaḥ giraḥ

original: pāndhairbhūtabhiyā palāyanaparairnāveditādhvakramāḥ khidyanti tvadaristriyo vanabhuvi śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate // Ckc_3.*52 //
analyzed: pāndhaiḥ bhūta bhiyā palāyana paraiḥ nā āvedita adhva kramāḥ khidyanti tvad ari striyaḥ vana bhuvi śrī siṅga pṛthvīpate
atra śatru strī vipralambhasya karuṇā aṅga tvam
vācya siddhi aṅgam yathā
ṣaḍhbhiḥ ṣoḍhaśabhiḥ pūrvaiḥ gauḥ ekā mahiṣī kṛtā

original: atra vaśeti gajakāntālakṣaṇaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ bhūpālakuñjareṇetyatropamārūpakasandehe rūpakasiddhimupapādayatīti vācyasiddhyaṅgamidam /
analyzed: atra vaśā iti gaja kāntā lakṣaṇam vyaṅgyam bhūpāla kuñjareṇa iti atra upamā rūpaka sandehe rūpaka siddhim upapādayati iti vācya siddhi aṅgam idam
asphuṭam yathā
citram śrī siṅga bhūpālaḥ vimathya ripu vāhinīm
vikirati amṛtam sarva śravaṇa ānanda kāraṇam

original: atra mandaraḥ samudraṃ vimathya keṣāṃcideva rasanānandakāraṇa mamṛtamutpādayāmāsa /
analyzed: atra mandaraḥ samudram vimathya keṣāṃcid eva rasana ānanda kāraṇam amṛtam utpādayāmāsa

original: nāyakastu vāhinīṃ vimathya sarvalokaśravaṇānandakāraṇaṃ kīrtirūpamamṛtaṃ dikṣupūrayatīti mandarānnāyakasyādhikyapratipādanāt pratīyamānasya  #
analyzed: nāyakaḥ tu vāhinīm vimathya sarva loka śravaṇa ānanda kāraṇam kīrti rūpam amṛtam dikṣu pūrayati iti mandarāt nāyakasya ādhikya pratipādanāt pratīyamānasya
vyatirekasya na ati sphuṭa tvam
sandigdha vyaṅgyam yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpa pṛtanā adhikṛtaiḥ niṣaṇṇaiḥ āsthāna saudha maṇi toraṇa vetikāsu

original: ālokanena haridāgatarāja rājir- dṛṣṭā kapolatalakandalitasmitena // Ckc_3.*55 //
analyzed: ālokanena harit āgata rāja rājiḥ dṛṣṭā kapola tala kandalita smitena

original: atra nānādigantāgatarājakagocaraṃ senāpatīnāṃ sasmitānalokanaṃ saṃbhāvanābhiprāyeṇa vā raṇeṣu prabhūtatadīyakātaradaśāsmaraṇena veti sandehaḥ
analyzed: atra nānā diganta āgata rājaka gocaram senāpatīnām sa smita analokanam saṃbhāvanā abhiprāyeṇa vā raṇeṣu prabhūta tadīya kātara daśā smaraṇena vā iti sandehaḥ
tulya prādhānya vyaṅgyam yathā
tava śrī siṅga bhūpāla pratāpa tapana udayaḥ
sātapatrān mahīpālān santāpayati santatam

original: atra sātapatrān śatrūn pratāpatapanaḥ santāpayatīti vācyasya nirātapatrān naḥ santāpayatīti vyaṅgyasya ca prādhānyaṃ samameva pratīyate /
analyzed: atra sa ātapatrān śatrūn pratāpa tapanaḥ santāpayati iti vācyasya nirātapatrān naḥ santāpayati iti vyaṅgyasya ca prādhānyam samam eva pratīyate
kāku ākṣiptam yathā

original: bhadrebhādaśanabhatakṣitidharagrāvaśriyo 'gre sthitāḥ rājirvā javanirjitārkahayatā vibhrājināṃ vājinām /
analyzed: bhadra ibhā daśa nabha takṣiti dhara grāva śriyaḥ gre sthitāḥ rājiḥ vā java nirjita arka haya tā vibhrājinām vājinām

original: uddaṇḍapratigaṇḍabhairavavibhuṃ prāṇeśa śuddhāṅgaṇe hantādyāpi didṛkṣase na suhṛdaḥ prāṇā na cāhaṃ hitāḥ // Ckc_3.*57 //
analyzed: uddaṇḍa pratigaṇḍa bhairava vibhum prāṇeśa śuddha aṅgaṇe hanta adya api didṛkṣase na suhṛdaḥ prāṇāḥ na ca aham hitāḥ

original: atra pratināyakamuddiśya taddevīvākye gandhagajā vājino vā tavāgre na sthitā prāṇāsva
analyzed: atra pratināyakam uddiśya tad devī vākye gandha gajāḥ vājinaḥ vā tava agre na sthitā

original: priyā evāhaṃ ca tava hitaiveti vyaṅgyaṃ pratīyamānamapi kuñjarādayo 'gre sthitā vā
analyzed: priyā eva aham ca tava hitā evā iti vyaṅgyam pratīyamānam api kuñjara ādayaḥ gre sthitāḥ vā
ityādi kāku sahakāriṇā vācaka śabdena eva ākṣipyate iti upasarjanī bhūta tvam
asundaram yathā
dhātrīm atikramya parisphurantī bhujaṅga lokān abhitaśvarantī

original: śrīsiṅgabhūpāla tava prabhāvāt ślāghyā hi kīrtiḥ sumanogṛheṣu // Ckc_3.*58 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpāla tava prabhāvāt ślāghyā hi kīrtiḥ sumanaḥ gṛheṣu

original: atra kīrteḥ dhūrtastriyā sāmyaṃ śabdaśaktipratītamapi vācyādanatiśāyīti na sundaram /
analyzed: atra kīrteḥ dhūrta striyā sāmyam śabda śakti pratītam api vācyāt anatiśāyi iti na sundaram
pratyeya arthasya cāru tve camatkāritamam matam
yathā
siṅga prabhuḥ alaṅkārī laṅkārī rāghavaḥ punar
varṇa antara tvam ubhayoḥ śrūyate sarva sammatam

original: atra varṇenākṣareṇāntaraṃ bhedo yayostacvamiti vācye pratiṣṭhite varṇo vaiśyajātirantaraṃ nāyakaraghunāyakayoriti parasparavyatirekālahkāro  #
analyzed: atra varṇena akṣareṇa antaram bhedaḥ yayoḥ tacvam iti vācye pratiṣṭhite varṇaḥ vaiśya jātiḥ antaram nāyaka raghunāyakayoḥ iti paraspara vyatireka alahkāraḥ
vyaṅgyaḥ
