yathā vā
śrīpati naṃrasiṃhaḥ yam rājate rājaśekharaḥ
atra śabda śakti mūlaḥ nāyaka vaikuṇṭha kaṇṭhī ravayoḥ upamā alaṅkāraḥ vyajyate

original: anena ca kṣaṇādiva nāyako nikhilavirodhividāraṇakriyāpariṇati samarthanirvakraparākrama iti vidhirupaṃ vastu vyajyate /
analyzed: anena ca kṣaṇāt iva nāyakaḥ nikhila virodhi vidāraṇa kriyā pariṇati samartha nirvakra parākramaḥ iti vidhi rupam vastu vyajyate

original: etena ca nāyakena saha virodho na karaṇīya iti niṣedharūpaṃ vastu,
analyzed: etena ca nāyakena saha virodhaḥ na karaṇīyaḥ iti niṣedha rūpam vastu

original: amunā ca nāyakapratibhaṭībhūtā mahīpālā nirbuddhaya ityutprekṣā vyajyate /
analyzed: amunā ca nāyaka pratibhaṭībhūtāḥ mahīpālāḥ nirbuddhayaḥ iti utprekṣā vyajyate

original: anayā ca nāyakavirodhino naranāyakā daivaparāhatā ityutprekṣāparā vyajyate /
analyzed: anayā ca nāyaka virodhinaḥ nara nāyakāḥ daiva parāhatāḥ iti utprekṣā parā vyajyate
evam prati śatru pratibhā viśeṣa pratyaya artha paraṃparā samunmeṣa saṃpanna tayā bāḍham acintya mahima viśrānti dhāma tām nītam tat idam camatkāritamam iti ucyate
atra bheda prapañcaḥ dhvanilocana ādi grantheṣu draṣṭavyaḥ

original: gadyaṃ padyaṃ ca miśraṃ cetyetat sarvaṃ tridhā smṛtam /
analyzed: gadyam padyam ca miśram ca iti etat sarvam tridhā smṛtam

original: apādaḥ padasandarbho gadyaṃ hṛdyaṃ manīṣiṇām // Ckc_3.41 //
analyzed: a pādaḥ pada sandarbhaḥ gadyam hṛdyam manīṣiṇām
kīrtiratna niṣadyāyām gadye kasya api pāṭavam
catuṣpāda anvitam padyam ca ādiḥ mātrā iti tat dvidhā
chandoviciti kośeṣu tayoḥ jñeyaḥ tu vistaraḥ
padyabandha mayam kāvyam kṣudra akṣudra tayā dvidhā
kṣudram muktaka kāvyam tat bhāmaha ādyaiḥ prapañcitam
akṣudram sargabandha ādi praśasta udātta vastukam
sa deśa kāla pātra ādi varṇanā sampad ujjvalam
trivarga phala dam kāvyam raghu vaṃśa ādikam matam
gadya padya mayam miśram prekṣyam śrāvyam iti ddidhā
prekṣyam dvidhā rūpaka ākhyam uparūpakam iti api
rūpakam daśadhā proktam nāṭaka ādi vibhedataḥ
mahā prabandha sāmrājyam ādhi kartum idam kṣamam
siṅga bhūpāla racite rasārṇava sudhākare

original: asya prapañco vijñeyaḥ ke tathā vaktumīśate // Ckc_3.49 //
analyzed: asya prapañcaḥ vijñeyaḥ ke tathā vaktum īśate
uparupakam ākhyātam tat hi śrī gadita ādikam
bhāva prakāśikā ādyeṣu tad lakṣaṇam avekṣyate
śrāvyam ca kathitam campūḥ upacampūḥ iti dvidhā
campūprabandhaḥ tatra syāt kānta aṣṭādaśa varṇanaḥ
sa prabandhaḥ iti ślāghyaḥ bhoja rāmāyaṇa ādikaḥ
upampū prabandhānām iyat tā kena gadyate
atra api kavi sāmarthyāt bāṣā tāla ādi miśraṇaiḥ
kalikā utkalikā ādīnām
rasa bhāva ādi bhedena saṃpadyante tathā ucitam
tathā api prabhu vandi ādi harṣaṇa ārabhaṭī spṛśām

original: vakṣye ca caturbhadrādīnāṃ keṣāṃcidiha lakṣaṇam // Ckc_3.55 //
analyzed: vakṣye ca caturbhadra ādīnām keṣāṃcid iha lakṣaṇam
padya anantara baddhānām gadyānām hi yathāruci
avaiṣamyāt iyat tāyāḥ niyamaḥ bhadram ucyate
catvāri yatra tāni syuḥ tat caturbhadram īritam

original: bhadraṃ ca satālamatālaṃ miśraṃ ceti trividham /
analyzed: bhadram ca sa tālam a tālam miśram ca iti trividham
yatra padya anantaram
tat idam udāharaṇa ādiṣu
yatra padya anantaram gadyāni tat miśra bhadram
tat idam caturbhadra ādi viṣayam
caturbhadra nibandhanā prakāraḥ tu yat kiñcid ārabhaṭī vṛtti yogyam āśīrvāda bhūṣitam saṃbuddhi vibhakti saṃbhakta nāyaka nāma aṅkitam padyam ādau nibadhnīyāt

original: tato deva dhīra śūretyādi padopakramāṇi gadyānyantānuprāsavanti samasaṃkhyayā vaktavyāni /
analyzed: tatas deva dhīra śūra ityādi pada upakramāṇi gadyāni anta anuprāsavanti sama saṃkhyayā vaktavyāni

original: paśvād gadyasaṃkhyātikrameṇa dvayordvayorādyantānuprāsasundaramākalanīyāḥ kalikā itīdaṃ samuccitya bhadramityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: paśvāt gadya saṃkhyā atikrameṇa dvayoḥ dvayoḥ ādi anta anuprāsa sundaram ākalanīyāḥ kalikāḥ iti idam samuccitya bhadram iti abhidhīyate
evam caturṇām bhadrāṇām nibandhe caturbhadraḥ

original: evamaṣṭabhadrādayo 'pi tasyaivā vṛttito bhavantīti na pṛthagucyante /
analyzed: evam aṣṭabhadra ādayaḥ pi tasya evā vṛttitaḥ bhavanti iti na pṛthak ucyante
dvi bhadram api ca icchanti bhāṣāḥ nā ekavidhāḥ yadi

original: khyātaṃ hi raktaṃ kalyāṇaṃ yogassaṃskṛtadeśyayoḥ // Ckc_3.58 //
analyzed: khyātam hi raktam kalyāṇam yogaḥ saṃskṛta deśyayoḥ

original: evaṃ bhāṣādvayīyoge yogyaṃ nāma prakalpayet // Ckc_3.59 //
analyzed: evam bhāṣā dvayī yoge yogyam nāma prakalpayet
tat eva biruda āvaliḥ
tad tad samaya krartavya sūcana ādi phalā tu sā
varṇanīya guṇa utkarṣavatī bhoga āvalī matā
pratibhadram samunnidra diganta vijaya śramam
tat catur bhadram ākhyātam kovidaiḥ vijayāvalī
yat sa tālabhadram syāt tat udāharaṇam matam
jayati upakrama udbhāsi mālinī ākhyā ādi padyake
vibhaktayaḥ kramāt atra sapta saṃbuddhiḥ aṣṭamī
pratibhadram ca padya ante kalpayet kalikā aṣṭakam
tatas saptadaśāḥ vyastāḥ kalikā ardha sa mātṛkāḥ
tad tad vibhakti ābhāsa antāḥ kuryāt utkalikāḥ tathā
ādi anta anuprāsa bhaktiḥ kalpanīyā dvayoḥ dvayoḥ
vibhakti ābhāsa niyamāḥ ca
gadet sarva vibhakti ante padyam sārthavibhaktikam
āśīrvāda samāyuktam iti udāharaṇa kramaḥ
kramāt bhāṣā aṣṭakam yatra sa udāharaṇa mātṛkāḥ
nija pūrva pada antasya dvitra ādi akṣara santatiḥ
uttarasya padasya ādi yasmin avyavadhānataḥ
tat etat bhadra sandhānāt cakra vat cakravālakam
idam prokta padaiḥ anyaiḥ paryāyaḥ gadi apdyayoḥ
ante kṣudra prabandhānām āryayā anuṣṭubhā api ca
nāma prakāśe yat kartuḥ nāyakasya kṛteḥ api
saṃbuddhiḥ ekā sarvatra hitvā udāhaṇam matā
ittham anyat api jñeyam etat jāti samudbhavam
dvipatī pramukhānām tu kṣudreṣu antargatiḥ matā

original: yeṣāṃ lakṣyaṃ budhairūhyaṃ vayaṃ vistarabhīravaḥ // Ckc_3.73 //
analyzed: yeṣām lakṣyam budhaiḥ ūhyam vayam vistara bhīravaḥ
iti śrī sarasa sāhitya cāturī dhurīṇa viśveśvara kavi candra praṇītāyām śrī siṅga bhūpāla kīrti sudhā sāra śītalāyām
camatkāracandrikāyām arthaguṇadoṣaprabandhaviśeṣavivekaḥ nāma tṛtīyaḥ vilāsaḥ
rūpa ādayaḥ iva aṅgasya svarūpa utkarṣa hetavaḥ
kāvyasya etān vijānanti guṇān guṇa vivekinaḥ
śleṣa prasādau sama tā mādhurī sukumāra tā
artha vyaktiḥ udāra tvam ojaḥ kāntiḥ udātta tā
preyān samādhiḥ aurjiṃtyam saumyam gāmbhīrya vistarau

original: saṃkṣepaḥ śabdasaṃskāro bhāvikatvaṃ ca sammitaḥ // Ckc_4.3 //
analyzed: saṃkṣepaḥ śabda saṃskāraḥ bhāvika tvam ca sammitaḥ
gati ukti rītayaḥ kāvye te trāyoviṃśatiḥ matāḥ
tatra śleṣaḥ
masṛṇa śliṣṭa pada tā śleṣaḥ iti abhidhīyate
yathā
a vyāja sundaram anindita sacva sāra mā a jānu vāhum aravinda dala āyata akṣam

original: śrīsiṅgabhūpamavalokayatāṃ janānā- mānanditāni nayanāni sudhāmbuneva // Ckc_4.*1 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpam avalokayatām janānām ānanditāni nayanāni sudhā ambunā iva
atra bhinnānām api padānām eka pada vat pāṭha samaye pratibhānam śleṣaḥ
drāk artha avagatiḥ yatra sa prasādaḥ nigadyate

original: yathā saugandhike ca ghanasāriṇi candane ca bimbādhare ca sudṛśāṃ vadane ca tāsām /
analyzed: yathā saugandhike ca ghanasāriṇi candane ca bimba adhare ca su dṛśām vadane ca tāsām

original: śrīsiṅgabhūparacite ca girāṃ kadambeṃ ko vā na nandati jano jagadekasāre // Ckc_4.*2 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpa racite ca girām kadambeṃ kaḥ vā na nandati janaḥ jagat eka sāre
atra pādānām sama kālam evā artha samarpaka tvāt prasādaḥ
mṛdu sphuṭa vimiśrāṇām varṇānām bandha klṭaptiṣu

original: āmūlacūḍaṃ nirvāhaḥ samatā dhīmatāṃ matā // Ckc_4.6 //
analyzed: āmūlacūḍam nirvāhaḥ sama tā dhīmatām matā
atra sphaṭa varṇa nirvāhaḥ yathā
yuddheṣu pratipakṣa lakṣa turaga pradhvaṃsana uttaṃsite tvad kaukṣeyaka śikṣitaiḥ api param siṅgakṣamā ārakṣaka

original: saptāśve pratibhedamātramaribhiḥ prāyeṇa saṃdhāryate kaṣṭaṃ kliṣṭadhiyāṃ gurorapi vṛthā sarvaiva vidyā bhavet // Ckc_4.*3 //
analyzed: saptāśve pratibheda mātram aribhiḥ prāyeṇa saṃdhāryate kaṣṭam kliṣṭa dhiyām guroḥ api vṛthā sarvā eva vidyā bhavet
atra pāda catuṣṭaye ghoṣa para akṣara prāya tva nirvahaṇāt sphuṭa varṇā sama tā
miśra varṇa bandha nirvāhaḥ yathā

original: ākṣepoktividhāyināṃ kṣitibhujāmātmāvarodhāntike yuddhāgre tu nirīkṣya sādhvasavatāṃ tvāṃ khaḍganārāyaṇa /
analyzed: ākṣepa ukti vidhāyinām kṣitibhujām ātma avarodha antike yuddha agre tu nirīkṣya sādhvasavatām tvām khaḍga nārāyaṇa

original: rūkṣodagra tṛṇāṅkuragrasanatā jihvāgravicchedanaṃ daṇḍo 'bhūdata eva te hi bhavatā sve sve pade sthāpitāḥ // Ckc_4.*4 //
analyzed: rūkṣa udagra tṛṇa aṅkura grasana tā jihvā agra vicchedanam daṇḍaḥ bhūt atas eva te hi bhavatā sve sve pade sthāpitāḥ

original: atra pādacatuṣṭaye 'pi nātivarṇamṛduprāyatā nātirūkṣākṣaraprāyatā ceti miśrabandhasamatā /
analyzed: atra pāda catuṣṭaye na ati varṇa mṛdu prāyatā na ati rūkṣa akṣara prāyatā ca iti miśra bandha sama tā

original: agranthilā pṛdhagbhūtiḥ patānāṃ mādhurī matā // Ckc_4.7 //
analyzed: agranthilā pṛdhak bhūtiḥ patānām mādhurī matā
yathā
cammam

original: bommo kāpūṇa sommaṃ tvihuvaṇa raaṇaṃ kaṇṇaaṃ kitti saṇṇaṃ dvihā uṃtie ṇāhaṃ kuṇa iva rauṇaṃ maṃgalaṃ siṃgabhūvam // Ckc_4.*5 //
analyzed: sommam raaṇam kaṇṇaam kitti saṇṇam dvihā uṃtie na aham kuṇaḥ iva rauṇam maṃgalam

original: atra pāṭhasamaya eva padavibhāgaḥ pratibhātīti mādhuryam /
analyzed: atra pāṭha samaye eva pada vibhāgaḥ pratibhāti iti mādhuryam
saṃyukta akṣara sacve śravya tvam sukumāra tā
yathā

original: yuṣmābhiḥ pratigaṇḍabhairavaraṇe prāṇāḥ kathaṃ rakṣitā ityantaḥ purapṛcchayā yadariṣu prāpteṣu cājñāvaśam /
analyzed: yuṣmābhiḥ prati gaṇḍa bhaiḥ avaraṇe prāṇāḥ katham rakṣitāḥ iti antar pura pṛcchayā yat ariṣu prāpteṣu ca ājñā vaśam
śaṃsati unnata mānsa vyatikara vyāpāra pāraṅga tā gaṇḍa āndolita karṇa kuṇḍala harit māṇikya varṇa aṅkurāḥ
atra saṃyukta akṣara prāya tve śruteḥ akaṭu tvāt saukumāryam
adya āhāra anapekṣa tvam artha vyaktiḥ iti īritā
yathā
namanti siṅga bhūpālam rājānaḥ nīti kovidāḥ
nija rājya pratiṣṭhāyai śaraṇa āgata vatsalam
atra vākyasya saṃpūrṇa tā spaṣṭā eva
vikaṭa akṣara tā bandhe prājñaiḥ audārya mīryate
yathā
garjat ghūrjara garva parvata bhide nepāla bhūpālaka dhvānta dhvānta virodhine kaṭu raṭat saurāṣṭra rāṣṭra druhe

original: dṛpyatkeralamaulimoṭanakṛte śrīsiṅgapṛthvīṃpate bhūyāsurbhuvanābhayavratabhṛte śreyāṃsi bhūyāṃsi te // Ckc_4.*8 //
analyzed: dṛpyat kerala mauli moṭana kṛte śrī siṅga pṛthvīṃpate bhūyāsuḥ bhuvana abhaya vrata bhṛte śreyāṃsi bhūyāṃsi te

original: atra vikaṭākṣaratayā nṛtyadbhiriva padairyā bandharacanā tadaudāryam /
analyzed: atra vikaṭa akṣara tayā nṛtyadbhiḥ iva padaiḥ yā bandha racanā tat audāryam
ojaḥ samās bāhulyam etat dvedhā nigadyate
samāsānām adīrghāṇām prācuryāt prathamam bhavet
idam komala mārga anusāriṇām prāṇa saṃmitam
samāsasya ati dīrgha tvāt dvitīyam gauḍa sammatam
atra alpa samāsa prācuryam yathā nāyakasya eva
ākīrṇa gharma jalam ākula keśapāśam āmīlita akṣi yugam ādṛta pāravaśyam
ānanda kandalitam astamita anya bhāvam āśāsmahe kim api ceṣṭitam āyata akṣyāḥ
yathā ca
saṅgīta krama caṅkrama priya sakhī śṛṅgāra saṃjīvanī saujanya druma sāraṇī catur atā sāmrājya siṃhāsanam
śrī siṅga kṣitipāla śekhara maṇeḥ vaiyātya ghaṇṭā pathaḥ cāṭu vyāhṛti vaikharī vijayate sāhitya śilpa avadhiḥ
atra su alpa samāsa tvam
spaṣṭam eva
piśācāḥ saha saha caṭaiḥ hasta tāla anukūlam
krīḍanti kreṃkriyābhiḥ kahakaha ninada āḍambara ālambinībhiḥ
atra dīrgha samāsa tvam spaṣṭam eva

original: kāntiśchāyā hi bandhasya kathitā bandhakovidaiḥ // Ckc_4.13 //
analyzed: kāntiḥ chāyā hi bandhasya kathitā bandha kovidaiḥ
yathā

original: ākṛṣṭā mūrdhni kṛṣṇā gahanamaṇigatā maithilī pūrvamūrvoś channā parṇairaparṇā kila nalamahiṣī kalpitā śitpinīti /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭā mūrdhni kṛṣṇā gahana maṇi gatā maithilī pūrvam ūrvoḥ channā parṇaiḥ aparṇā kila nala mahiṣī kalpitā śitpinī iti

original: āstāṃ tattaddaśāyāmapi dadhati śucaṃ yāvadākṣeparūpair ākhyātaiḥ siṅgabhūpa tvadarimṛgadṛśāṃ sthairyavatyo jaratyaḥ // Ckc_4.*12 //
analyzed: āstām tad tad daśāyām api dadhati śucam yāvat ākṣepa rūpaiḥ ākhyātaiḥ siṅga bhūpa tvad ari mṛga dṛśām sthairyavatyaḥ jaratyaḥ
yathā vā
lalita rasa vilāka vyāsa vinyāsa dhanyām prathayati madhura arthām bhāratīm siṅga bhūpe

original: garanigaraṇarūkṣairakṣarair vāvadūko viṣadharakulamūrdhā na sphuṭī yaḥ sphuṭīti // Ckc_4.*13 //
analyzed: gara nigaraṇa rūkṣaiḥ akṣaraiḥ vāvadūkaḥ viṣadhara kula mūrdhā na sphuṭī yaḥ sphuṭī iti
atra bandhasya ati ujjvala tvam chāyā sā eva kāntiḥ
ślāgyaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ yogam budhāḥ viduḥ udātta tām
yathā
ākalpam ākalpa viśeṣa bhājā bhujena rekhā kuliśa aṅkitena
śrī siṅga bhūpāla tava āyatena rakṣāvatī sāgaramekhalā iyam
atra bhuja viśeṣaṇānām bhāgya viśeṣa pratipādaka tvāt ati ślāghya tvam
preyān priya ukteḥ vinyāsaḥ cāṭu sāhitya jīvitam
yathā
saubhāgya bhāgya yuvatī jana citta cora dākṣiṇya gaṇya dharaṇī tala pārijāta

original: śṛṅgārabhāva karuṇākara siṅgabhūpa gāṃ rakṣa rakṣa tava rakṣaṇameva dharmaḥ // Ckc_4.*15 //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra bhāva karuṇā kara siṅga bhūpa gām rakṣa rakṣa tava rakṣaṇam eva dharmaḥ

original: atra nāyakaṃ prati dūtyāḥ priyoktiḥ spaṣṭaiva /
analyzed: atra nāyakam prati dūtyāḥ priya uktiḥ spaṣṭā eva
samādhiḥ iha śabdasya vṛttiḥ syāt aupacārikī
yathā
adhyāste phaṇi loka puṅgava phaṇā nirvyūḍha paryaṅkikām ākrāmati anuvelam abdhi raśanā kāñcī guṇa āḍambaram
niṃste vismaya dhūta dhūrjaṭi jaṭā kūlaṃkaṣa ahaṃkriyām śrī siṅga kṣitipāla kīrti mahimā sākalya kalpa udayaḥ
atra adhyāsana ākramaṇa cumbanānām upacarita tvam kīrteḥ acetana tvāt
yat bandhasya ati gāḍha tvam tat aurjityam udāhṛtam
yathā
kari pati dṛḍha kumbha ālamban prakramām ca ghora koṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ

original: tava racayati dhanuradhvaṃsanaṃ siṅgabhūpa pradanakadanagandhapraṅvaṇabvān piśācān // Ckc_4.*17 //
analyzed: tava racayati dhanuḥ adhvaṃsanam siṅga bhūpa pradana kadana gandha praṅ vaṇabvān piśācān

original: atra hrasvākṣarāṇāṃ saṃyuktapūrvatayā gurutve yadgāḍhatvaṃ tadaurjityaṃ nāma /
analyzed: atra hrasva akṣarāṇām saṃyukta pūrva tayā guru tve yat gāḍha tvam tat aurjityam nāma
antar saṃjalpa sāmarthyam śabdānām saukṣmyam ucyate
yathā

original: bhūdhātuṃ kartṛbhāvādanugatamanunā mānayatyātmamāne paryāye saṃpadāṃ syādabhiparisahitaṃ vidviṣāṃ karmabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: bhūdhātum kartṛ bhāvāt anugata manunā mānayati ātma māne paryāye saṃpadām syāt abhiparisahitam vidviṣām karma bhāvaḥ

original: puṃliṅge tvanmano 'bjaṃ spṛśati śivapadaṃ tvadgṛhālī na puṃsi strīliṅge śātravāṇāṃ nikhilamapi puraṃ siṅgabhūpālacandra // Ckc_4.*18 //
analyzed: pum liṅge tvad manaḥ bjam spṛśati śiva padam tvad gṛha āliḥ na puṃsi strī liṅge śātravāṇām nikhilam api puram siṅga bhūpāla candra
atra nāyakaḥ sampadaḥ nubhavati iti
dviṣaḥ paribhavati
nāyakasya mānasam śivaḥ mahādevaḥ spṛśati

original: tadvirodhinagaraṃ śivā jambūkaḥ spṛśatīti padānāṃ bhūdhātuṃ kartubhāvādityādiṣu garbhitatvādantaḥ saṃjalpanaśaktiḥpratīyata iti saukṣmyamidam
analyzed: tad virodhi nagaram śivā jambūkaḥ spṛśati iti padānām bhūdhātum kartu bhāvāt ityādiṣu garbhita tvāt antar saṃjalpana śaktiḥ pratīyate iti saukṣmyam idam
dhvanimat tā tu gāmbhīryam
yathā

original: ekenaiva turaṅgameṇa kakubho vyākramya saumyakramā- naṅgīkṛtya karān kadācidagataḥ kāṃcittamograstatām /
analyzed: ekena eva turaṅgameṇa kakubhaḥ vyākramya saumya kramāḥ n aṅgīkṛtya karān kadācid agataḥ kāṃcid tamaḥ grasta tām

original: ullāsāya satāmanantamudayaṃ dhatte tathāpi sphuṭaṃ tvaṃ prājñairnanu siṅgabhūpatilaka jñāto 'si bhāsāṃ nidhiḥ // Ckc_4.*19 //
analyzed: ullāsāya satām anantam udayam dhatte tathā api sphuṭam tvam prājñaiḥ nanu siṅga bhūpa tilaka si bhāsām nidhiḥ
atra sūryaḥ tu diśaḥ turaṅgamaiḥ saptabhiḥ ākramati
tīvrān kiraṇān aṅgīkaroti

original: rahugrastatāṃ gacchati nakṣatrāṇāmanullāsāya sāntamudayaṃ dhatta iti dhvanirvidyate /
analyzed: rahu grasta tām gacchati nakṣatrāṇām an ullāsāya sa antam udayam dhatte iti dhvaniḥ vidyate
tasmāt gambhīra tvam
prapañca uktiḥ tu vistaraḥ

original: puṇyaiḥ pūrvamupārjitaistanumato janmāstu sanmānuṣaṃ janmāpyasya tadāndhradeśatilake rājācale saṃbhavet /
analyzed: puṇyaiḥ pūrvam upārjitaiḥ tanumataḥ janma astu sat mānuṣam janma api asya tad āndhra deśa tilake rāja acale saṃbhavet

original: tatrāpyeṣa dadhātu tāṃ pariṇatiṃ bhāgyasya yogyāṃ tathā gatvā nandati siṅgabhūvara giraṃ tvatkāṃ camatkāriṇīm // Ckc_4.*20 //
analyzed: tatra api eṣa dadhātu tām pariṇatim bhāgyasya yogyām tathā gatvā nandati siṅgabhūvara giram tvad kām camatkāriṇīm

original: atra nāyakasya sannidhau sarvadā sthātumicchāmīti vivakṣitārthasyātivivṛtya karaṇādvistaraḥ /
analyzed: atra nāyakasya sannidhau sarvadā sthātum icchāmi iti vivakṣita arthasya ati vivṛtya karaṇāt vistaraḥ
saṃkṣepaḥ tu samasya uktiḥ analpasya api vastunaḥ
yathā
ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ bhūpaiḥ gauḥ ekā mahiṣī kṛtā
sā eva śrī siṅga bhūpāla kuñjareṇa vaśīkṛtā
atra ṣaḍbhiḥ iti anena
hariścandraḥ nalaḥ rājā purukutsaḥ purūravāḥ
sagaraḥ kārtavīryaḥ ca ṣaṭ ete cakravartinaḥ
iti śloka arthasya
ṣoḍaśabhiḥ bhūpaiḥ iti anena
gayaḥ mbarīṣaḥ śaśibinduḥ aṅga pṛthuḥ maruttaḥ bharataḥ suhotraḥ
rāmaḥ dilīpaḥ śibi rantidevau yayāti māndhātṛ bhagīrathāḥ ca

original: iti ślokārthasya ca prapañcakathanaprasiddhasyātrātisaṅkocena kathanāccamatkārātiśayakārī saṃkṣepo nāma guṇaḥ ayam --- “sa mārutasutānītamahauṣadhidhṛtavyathaḥ”
analyzed: iti śloka arthasya ca prapañca kathana prasiddhasya atra ati saṅkocena kathanāt camatkāra atiśaya kārī saṃkṣepaḥ nāma guṇaḥ ayam sa mārutasuta ānīta mahā oṣadhi dhṛta vyathaḥ
ityādau kavibhiḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ lakṣaṇīyaḥ

original: supāṃ tiṅāṃ ca vyatpattiśśabdasaṃskāra ucyate // Ckc_4.21 //
analyzed: supām tiṅām ca vyatpattiḥ śabda saṃskāraḥ ucyate
yathā
diś kūlaṅkaṣa vaibhavāḥ ghana patha vyāpti priyaṃbhāvukā śrī siṅga kṣitipāla kīrti vibhavāḥ śambhoḥ tulā ālambinaḥ

original: gāmadhyāsitumīśate pragupate paryāptamāryotsavān kalpānte tava kalpitāṃ vivṛṇute dhāmrā mahimrāṃ śriyam // Ckc_4.*22 //
analyzed: gām adhyāsitum īśate pragupate paryāpta mārya utsavān kalpa ante tava kalpitām vivṛṇute dhāmrā mahimrām śriyam

original: atra dikkūlaṃkaṣeti priyaṃbhāvuketi gāmadhyāsitumityādau subantānāmīśata ityādiṣu
analyzed: atra diś kūlaṃkaṣā iti priyaṃbhāvukā iti gām adhyāsitum ityādau sup antānām īśate ityādiṣu

original: tiṅntānāṃ ca digvyāpino 'ntarikṣavyāpino gavi tiṣṭhantyādibhi rviśeṣapratibhānācchabdasaṃskāra ityucyate /
analyzed: tiṅ ntānām ca diś vyāpinaḥ ntarikṣa vyāpinaḥ gavi tiṣṭhanti ādibhiḥ viśeṣa pratibhānāt śabda saṃskāraḥ iti ucyate
harṣa ādi bhāva vaśataḥ vāc vṛttiḥ bhāvikam matam
yathā

original: vidyādaivata tāta tāvakaguro sarvajñacūḍāmaṇe stotavyo 'si manīṣiṇāṃ tvamathavā vandyo javākairalam /
analyzed: vidyā daivata tāta tāvaka guro sarvajña cūḍāmaṇe stotavyaḥ si manīṣiṇām tvam athavā vandyaḥ javākaiḥ alam

original: itthaṃ siṅgamahīpatiṃ gurujano 'pyābhāṣate toṣavān tattatpaddhatidharmamarmaṇi paricchedāni saṃvādinam // Ckc_4.*23 //
analyzed: ittham siṅga mahīpatim guru janaḥ pi ābhāṣate toṣavān tad tad paddhati dharma marmaṇi saṃvādinam
paricheda saṃbhūta saṃtoṣa vaśena pravṛtta tvāt bhāvika tvam
tad sammita tvam śabda artha kūlāba dhṛtiḥ ucyate
yathā

original: vikrame na krame kecitkrame kecinna vikrame /
analyzed: vikrame na krame kecid krame kecid na vikrame

original: vikrame ca krame cāyaṃ dakṣaḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpatiḥ // Ckc_4.*24 //
analyzed: vikrame ca krame ca ayam dakṣaḥ śrī siṅga bhūpatiḥ
atra yāvadartha pada tvam sammita tvam
āroham avarohan ca svarāṇām gatiḥ īritā
yathā
śrī siṅga kṣmāpāle kṣoṇīm dhārayati sāra dhaureye
madayati kapaṭaka maṭhānām
pūrva ardhe dīrva tayā svarāṇām ārohaḥ
uttara ardhe hrasva tayā avarohaḥ ca iti gatiḥ
uktiḥ vivakṣitasyāḥ bhaṇanam ucyate

original: yathā tasyāḥ kiṃ guṇajīvitasya kuśalaṃ rājan satī jīvati praśnastatkuśalakramo hi kathitaṃ sā jīvatīti sphuṭam /
analyzed: yathā tasyāḥ kim guṇa jīvitasya kuśalam rājan satī jīvati praśnaḥ tad kuśala kramaḥ hi kathitam sā jīvati iti sphuṭam

original: bhadre dūti punastadeva kimidaṃ mugdheva saṃbhāṣase śvāse tiṣṭhati sā mṛteti gadituṃ śrīsiṅga kiṃ yujyate // Ckc_4.*26 //
analyzed: bhadre dūti punar tat eva kim idam mugdhā iva saṃbhāṣase śvāse tiṣṭhati sā mṛtā iti gaditum śrī siṅga kim yujyate

original: atra tasyāḥ kiṃ kuśalamiti nāyakapraśne dūtyā kuśalamakuśalaṃ veti prativaktavyajīvatītyādiyuktibhaṅgyā yo 'yaṃ tvadvirahe jīvitamātraśeṣeti  #
analyzed: atra tasyāḥ kim kuśalam iti nāyaka praśne dūtyā kuśalam akuśalam vā iti prativaktavya jīvati ityādi yukti bhaṅgyā yaḥ yam tvad virahe jīvita mātra śeṣā iti
sūcanā prakāraḥ saḥ yamuktiḥ nāma guṇaḥ
upakramasya nirvāhaḥ rītiḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: ekaṃ yācitamarthinā dbiguṇitaṃ citte tvadīye punar- vākye tantriguṇaṃ caturguṇayutaṃ haste tatastvarthinaḥ /
analyzed: ekam yācitam arthinā dbi guṇitam citte tvadīye punar vākye tat triguṇam caturguṇa yutam haste tatas tu arthinaḥ

original: pāṇau pañjaguṇaṃ prakalpitamaho ṣāḍguṇyadīkṣāguro- raudārye tava siṅgabhūpa nitarāmāścaryamācāryakam // Ckc_4.*27 //
analyzed: pāṇau pañjaguṇam prakalpitam aho ṣāḍguṇya dīkṣā guroḥ raudārye tava siṅga bhūpa nitarām āścaryam ācāryakam
artraka ādīnām ṣaṣ antānām yathākramam nirvāhaḥ rītiḥ
iti guṇa vivekaḥ
rītiḥ padānām ghaṭanā proktā rīti viśāradaiḥ
rīṅ gatau iti atas dhātoḥ iyam rītiḥ iti īryate
asamāsā samāsena madhyamā iva vibhūṣitā
ati dīrgha samāsā ca miśrā ca iti caturvidhā
asamāsāḥ yathā

original: rājānaḥ santu loke dinarajanikṛtoratra vaṃśāvataṃsā viṣṇoraitihyasiddhānabhidadhati guṇān kīrtigandhāḥ pravandhāḥ /
analyzed: rājānaḥ santu loke dina rajani kṛtoḥ atra vaṃśa avataṃsāḥ viṣṇoḥ aitihya siddhān abhidadhati guṇān kīrti gandhāḥ pravandhāḥ

original: adya kṣoṇī kṛtārthā nṛpatikulagurū cakṣuṣī yasya sau'yaṃ devo recarlavaṃśo viharati bhagavān siṅgabhūpālamūrtiḥ // Ckc_4.*28 //
analyzed: adya kṣoṇī kṛtārthā nṛpati kula gurū cakṣuṣī yasya devaḥ viharati bhagavān siṅga bhūpāla mūrtiḥ

original: nanvatra samāsaḥ śrūyate kathamasamāseti cet śrūyatām /
analyzed: nanu atra samāsaḥ śrūyate katham asamāsa iti ced śrūyatām
atra nañā samāsa svarūpa niṣedhaḥ na abhidhīyate
kintu tasya tīrga tvam drāghīyaḥ tvam ca
yathā aanudarā iyam kanyā
nissāraḥ pumān iti
tasmāt dvayoḥ trayāṇām vā na
padānām samāse rīteḥ sahṛdaya hṛdayānām anudvega dāyinām asamāsa tvam eva
yathā ca dṛṣṭam a samāsa mārga anusāriṇām mahā kavīnām prabandha ratneṣu
tanvī śyāmā śikhari daśanā pakva bimba adharoṣṭhī
ityādi megha sandeśe
vara tanu kabarī vidhāyinā surabhi nakhena narendra pāṇinā
apacita kusumā api vallarī iyam samajani vṛnta nilīna ṣaṭpadā
iti karṇāmṛte
utphulla gaṇḍa yugam adbhuta manda hāsa udvela rāgam urarīkṛta kāmatantram

original: hastena hastamavalambya kadā nu seve sallāparūpamamṛtaṃ sarasīruhākṣyāḥ // Ckc_4.*31 //
analyzed: hastena hastam avalambya kadā nu seve sat lāpa rūpam amṛtam sarasīruha akṣyāḥ
iti siṅgabhūpālīye
mukha pradhānaiḥ avalaṃba pūrvaiḥ kaṇṭha grahaiḥ vipratipīḍita aṅgaiḥ

original: nakhapracārai śśithilopagūḍhairlabdhaiḥ priyāyā mumude mukundaḥ // Ckc_4.*32 //
analyzed: nakha pracāraiḥ śśithila upagūḍhaiḥ labdhaiḥ priyāyāḥ mumude mukundaḥ
iti kandarpa saṃbhave

original: evanamyeṣvapi vaidarbhamārgānusāriṇāṃ prabandheṣu tatra tatra ca tunnapadasamāsasyāsamāsatvakīrtanānupraveśākāro 'vagantavyaḥ /
analyzed: eva namyeṣu api vaidarbha mārga anusāriṇām prabandheṣu tatra tatra ca tunnapada samāsasya asamāsa tva kīrtana anupraveśa ākāraḥ vagantavyaḥ

original: aparañca nyūnānāmadaśādhikānāṃ padānāṃ samāso madhyamaḥ tadvatī madhyamasamāsā
analyzed: aparam ca nyūnānām adaśa adhikānām padānām samāsaḥ madhyamaḥ tadvatī madhyama samāsā
yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpa bhavadīya vacaḥ vilāsa dhārā sudhā madhurima anubhava anubhāvāt
āmīlita añcala vilocana yugma nirya dānanda bāṣṇa kaṇikāḥ sudhiyaḥ bhavanti
daśa adhika pada samāsā ati dīrgha samāsā
yathā
śrī siṅga kṣoṇipāla prabala bala bhara uddhūta dhūlī vitāna channa chāyā sahāya dyuti harit udara skandha baddha andhakāre
vyomni vyāma prameya stana yuvati parīraṃbha saṃhabha kelī pratyūha vyūha śānti pramudita manasaḥ tam praśaṃsanti siddhāḥ
sahakārāt miśrā
a samāsa ati dīrgha samāsayoḥ miśraṇe
yathā
avitura kṛta bhaṅgam siṅga bhūpāla maule stribhū vanam api śuddham kīrti kallolinībhiḥ
viṣama viṣama cakṣuḥ jūṭa koṭī kuluṅga skhalita phalita phena svahdhunī spardhinībhiḥ
atra prathama ardhe samāsa uttara ardhe ti dīrgha samāsā
a samāsā madhyamasamāsayoḥ
yathā

original: jayati vijayalakṣmyā veṇikāśreṇikāntī raṇabhuvi tava bāhāsaṅginī siṅgabhūpa // Ckc_4.*36 //
analyzed: jayati vijaya lakṣmyā veṇikā śreṇi kāntī raṇa bhuvi tava bāhā āsaṅginī siṅga bhūpa
atra prathama ardhe madhyama samāsa uttara arghe samāsā
ati dīrgha madhyama samāsayoḥ
yathā
siṅga kṣmāpāla yuddhe pratibhaṭa rathinī nātha koṭīra koṭī sphāyat līlā kalācī bharita nava vasā visra kīlāla hālām

original: pāyaṃ pāyaṃ piśācāḥ saha saha carīhastatālānukūlaṃ krīḍanti kreṃkriyābhiḥ kahakahaninadāḍambarālambinībhiḥ // Ckc_4.*37 //
analyzed: pāyam pāyam piśācāḥ saha saha carī hasta tāla anukūlam krīḍanti kreṃkriyābhiḥ kahakaha ninada āḍambara ālambinībhiḥ
atra prathama ardhe ti dīrgha samāsā uttara ardhe madhyama samāsā
evam anyat api etad jātīyam draṣṭavyam
iti rīti vivekaḥ

original: yā vikāse ca vikṣepe vikṣobhe vistare tathā /
analyzed: vikāse ca vikṣepe vikṣobhe vistare tathā

original: (cetaso vartayitrī syātsā vṛttiḥ sāpi ṣaḍvidhā) // Ckc_4.29 //
analyzed: cetasaḥ vartayitrī syāt sā vṛttiḥ sā api ṣaḍvidhā
kaiśikī ārabhaṭī ca eva bhāratī sātvatī tathā
madhyama ārabhaṭī ca eva tathā madhyama kaiśikī
mṛdū śṛṅgāra karuṇau su alpau hāsāya adbhutau punar
uddhatau raudra bībhatsau kiṃcid vīra bhayānakau
śabda arthayoḥ mṛdu tvena kaiśikī vṛttiḥ iṣyate
yathā alolaiḥ āścaryāt aviralita lajjā parimalaiḥ pramodāt udvelaiḥ cakita hariṇī prekṣaṇa sakhaiḥ
amandaiḥ autsukyāt praṇaya laharī marma piśunaiḥ rapā aṅgaiḥ siṅga kṣmā ramaṇam abalā vīkṣitavatī
vṛttim ārabhaṭīm āhuḥ prauḍha tvāt artha śabdayoḥ

original: yathā sāvaṣṭambha sadambhajambhagirisadvyālambhanottambhita prārambhādbhūtajambhabhedibhiduratviṅgena khaḍgena te /
analyzed: yathā sa avaṣṭambha sa dambha jambha giri sat vyālambhana uttambhita prārambhāt bhūta jambha bhedi bhidura tviṅgena khaḍgena te

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitirakṣaka pratimṛdhaṃ siddhyedari kṣmābhṛtāṃ sā rambhākucakumbhasambhramaparī rambhādisambhāvanā // Ckc_4.*39 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣiti rakṣaka pratimṛdham siddhyet ari kṣmābhṛtām sā rambhā kuca kumbha sambhrama parī rambhā ādi sambhāvanā
atra snigdha prāṇa varṇa prāya tvam sandarbhasya mṛdu tvam
mṛdu tvam
atra rūkṣa mahāprāṇa varṇa pramāya tvena saṃdarbhasya gāḍha tvam
pratibhaṭa dhvaṃsana rupa tvāt arthasya gāḍha tvam
mṛdu arthā prauḍha saṃdarbhā bhāratī vṛttiḥ iṣyate

original: yathā tajjitvā parirambhaṇaprabhṛtikaṃ dyūte sakhīnāṃ puraḥ śāryāropaṇasūcite paṇavidhau śrīśiṅgapṛthvīkṣitā /
analyzed: yathā tat jitvā parirambhaṇa prabhṛtikam dyūte sakhīnām puras śāryāropaṇa sūcite paṇa vidhau śrīśiṅga pṛthvīkṣitā

original: hāsotphullakapolakāntilaharīsaṃkrāntavakrekṣaṇā sā svinnāṅguli śārikāparikaraṃ sajjīkaroti priyā // Ckc_4.*40 //
analyzed: hāsa utphulla kapola kānti laharī saṃkrānta vakra īkṣaṇā sā svinna aṅguli śārikā parikaram sajjīkaroti priyā
atra śṛṅgāra tvāt arthasya mṛdu tvam
bandhasya mahā praṇa rūkṣa varṇa prāya tvam prauḍha tvam
prauḍha artha mṛdu saṃdarbā sātvatī vṛttiḥ iṣyate
yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpa karavāla hala ari mauleḥ muktāphalāni patitāni abhitas sphuranti

original: kīlālamāṃsakalitāsu raṇasthalīṣu bījāṅkurāṇi yaśasāmiva nirmalāni // Ckc_4.*41 //
analyzed: kīlāla māṃsa kalitāsu raṇa sthalīṣu bīja aṅkurāṇi yaśasām iva nirmalāni
atra ripu hiṃsana rūpa tvāt arthasya prauḍha tvam
alpa prāṇa varṇa prāya tvāt saṃdarbhasya mṛdu tvam
mṛdu arthaḥ īṣat prauḍha saṃdarbhā madhyama kaiśikī
yathā

original: tvāmāśriteṣvavasaro 'pi na hi kraśimnāṃ taccitamāśrayati ca tvayi sā natabhrūḥ /
analyzed: tvām āśriteṣu avasaraḥ pi na hi kraśimnām tad citam āśrayati ca tvayi sā nata bhrūḥ

original: ākhyāti hanta tanimānamiti prasaṅge kasyāyaśo vimṛśa cetasi siṅgabhūpa // Ckc_4.*42 //
analyzed: ākhyāti hanta tanimānam iti prasaṅge kasya ayaśaḥ vimṛśa cetasi siṅgabhūpa
atra vipralambha tvāt arthasya mṛdu tvam
bandhasya saṃyukta varṇa hrasva akṣara prāya tvena ūrjita tvāt īṣat gāḍha tvam
madyam ārabhaṭī prauḍhe pi arthe na ati mṛdu kramā
yathā

original: saṃvartapāvakaśikhā kimu kiṃ nu jihvā mṛtyoriyaṃ kimu yugāntakṛtāntadaṃṣṭrā /
analyzed: saṃvarta pāvaka śikhā kimu kim nu jihvā mṛtyoḥ iyam kimu yugānta kṛtānta daṃṣṭrā
iti ūhyate samara sīma niṣevya deśe śrī siṅga bhūpa kara kampita khaḍga rekhā
atra samara kriyā rūpa tvāt arthasya prauḍha tvam
miśra varṇa ārabdha tvāt saṃdarbhasya na ati mṛdu tvam
iti vṛtti vivekaḥ
pākam vācām parīpākam āhuḥ ākhāda meduram

original: so 'yaṃ mṛduḥ kharaśceti samāsena dvidhā bhavet // Ckc_4.38 //
analyzed: saḥ yam mṛduḥ kharaḥ ca iti samāsena dvidhā bhavet
atra mṛdu pākaḥ yathā

original: kiṃ kāmena kimindunā surabhiṇā kiṃ vā jayantena vā madbāgyādanavotasiṅganṛpate rūpaṃ mayā vīkṣitam /
analyzed: kim kāmena kim indunā surabhiṇā kim vā jayantena vā mad bāgyāt anavota siṅga nṛpate rūpam mayā vīkṣitam

original: dhanyāstatparicaryayaiva sudṛśau hanteti romāñcitā svidyadgaṇḍatalaṃ sagadgadapadaṃ sākhyāti sakhyāḥ puraḥ // Ckc_4.*44 //
analyzed: dhanyāḥ tad paricaryayā eva sudṛśau hanta iti romāñcitā svid yat gaṇḍa talam sa gadgada padam sā ākhyāti sakhyāḥ puras

original: atra drākṣāpāka ivākleśena samāsvādadāyī śabdapariṇāmo mṛdupāka ityucyate /

analyzed: sva ājñā nirvahaṇena nirvṛta manāḥ tad kālam īlat dṛśe yasmai puṣpaśarāsanaḥ sva sukṛtaiḥ kalyāṇam āśaṃsate
atra rūpa yauvana viśeṣa śīla ādi guṇa saṃpannām nāyikām uddiśya samutpannā dhīra lalita prakṛte

original: rāśrayabhūtasya nāyakasya ratiḥ paricayopacitena saṃskārapāṭavena paribodhyamānā
analyzed: ra āśraya bhūtasya nāyakasya ratiḥ paricaya upacitena saṃskāra pāṭavena paribodhyamānā
svabhāva sundara tad aṅga sanniveśa rāmaṇīyaka vibhāvanā uddīpana atiśayena dīpyamānā sakhīnām
samakṣam anya āliṅgana lakṣaṇa śarīra āraṃbha anubhāva anumīyamānām lajjā tyāga lakṣaṇām saptamīm
rasa avasthām adhyāste

original: kiñca samagrātmaguṇa saṃpadā nāyakamuddiśya samutpannā sthirānurāgasarasaprakṛteḥ
analyzed: kiñca samagra ātma guṇa saṃpadā nāyakam uddiśya samutpannā sthira anurāga sarasa prakṛteḥ

original: nāyikāyā ratiḥ paricayānukūlyābyāmutkaṭena vāsanā pāṭavena prabodhyamānā prakṛṣṭapremapriyatamāliṅganadīpanātiśayenoddīpyamānāṃ
analyzed: nāyikāyāḥ ratiḥ paricaya ānukūlyābyām utkaṭena vāsanā pāṭavena prabodhyamānā prakṛṣṭa prema priyatama āliṅgana dīpana atiśayena uddīpyamānām

original: nayananimīlanānubhāvānumīyamānāṃ navamīṃ premapuṣṭimavasthā madhitiṣṭhatīti seyaṃ rasapuṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: nayana nimīlana anubhāva anumīyamānām navamīm prema puṣṭim avasthām adhitiṣṭhati iti sā iyam rasa puṣṭiḥ
prema puṣṭere vā avasthā daśakam siṅgabhūpālīye nidarśakam
nidarśitam hi
abhilāṣa cintana anusmṛti guṇa saṃkīrtana udvegāḥ

original: savilāsā unmādavyādhī jaḍatā mṛtiśca daśadhā tāḥ // Ckc_5.21 //
analyzed: savilāsāḥ unmāda vyādhī jaḍatā mṛtiḥ ca daśadhā tāḥ
kramaśas darśayati
nanu tatra pūrva anurāga ākhya vipralaṃbha janya tayā tat idam daśā daśakam pradarśakam
pradarśitam

original: atra tu saṃbhogena kathaṃ nirūpyata iti ceducyate /
analyzed: atra tu saṃbhogena katham nirūpyate iti ced ucyate
vipralaṃbhe prāyeṇa kavibhiḥ etat āpoṣitam iti abhiprāyeṇa
na tu saṃbhoge tad niṣedhāya iti veditavyam
sama kāla bala utpatti hetau bhāva antare sati

original: yastena tasya saṃsargaḥ sa saṅkara itīritaḥ // Ckc_5.22 //
analyzed: yaḥ tena tasya saṃsargaḥ sa saṅkaraḥ iti īritaḥ
yathā
dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭe siṅga bhūpe tad pūrva āgasi vallabhe
āśvarya roṣa snehānām majjati ūrmiṣu mānimī

original: atra vismayaroṣasnehā yathocitaṃ tatpūrvāparādhatayā dṛṣṭatayā vallabhatayā bhaktijanitāstattadāśritaviśeṣavibhāvanoddīpyamānāḥ
analyzed: atra vismaya roṣa snehāḥ yathocitam tad pūrva aparādha tayā dṛṣṭa tayā vallabha tayā bhakti janitāḥ tad tad āśrita viśeṣa vibhāvanā uddīpyamānāḥ
parama paripoṣa lakṣaṇa kathā svabhāva vācka śabda prayoga śaktyā yathocitam sūcitaiḥ animeṣa adhara sphuraṇa nīvī bandha visraṃsana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
stambha vaivarṇya romāñca ādibhiḥ sācvikaiḥ anuvaddhāḥ ūrmi pada dyotitaiḥ vitarta harṣa ādi vyabhicāribhiḥ
staraṅgitāḥ tulya kāla bala utpatti hetu tayā saṃkīrṇāḥ ca rasa saṅkara pratītim aṅkurayanti iti
rasa saṅkara uktiḥ iyam

original: ārūḍhasya parāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ yena kenāpi hetunā /
analyzed: ārūḍhasya parām kāṣṭhām yena kena api hetunā

original: rasasyāpacayo yasya taṃ hrāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ // Ckc_5.23 //
analyzed: rasasya apacayaḥ yasya tam hrāsam kavayaḥ viduḥ
yathā

original: śvāso yena yayā ca bhāṣaṇavidhau vyālokane pakṣmaṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ pariraṃbhaṇe malayajaṃ pratyūha ityūhyate /
analyzed: śvāsaḥ yena yayā ca bhāṣaṇa vidhau vyālokane pakṣmaṇām vyāpāraḥ pariraṃbhaṇe malaya jam pratyūhaḥ iti ūhyate

original: tāmāpṛcchati rājaśailagataye pāṇṅyassa tasmai ca sā sevārītimupādiśantyanusamācāreṇa cakre natim // Ckc_5.*11 //
analyzed: tām āpṛcchati rāja śaila gataye pāṇṅyaḥ sa tasmai ca sā sevā rītim upādiśantī anusamācāreṇa cakre natim
atra prativirodhinām niḥśvāsa ādīnām bhāṣaṇa ādi saṃbhoga pratyūha tva abhimāna lakṣaṇena citta ārambha anubhāvena

original: kṛtapratīterudvegalakṣaṇāyāḥ pāṇḍyatadavarodhayoḥ premapuṣṭerapacayo rājyadhvaṃsavanavāsādiparikleśa hetuko bhavati /
analyzed: kṛta pratīteḥ udvega lakṣaṇāyāḥ pāṇḍya tad avarodhayoḥ prema puṣṭeḥ apacayoḥ rājya dhvaṃsa vana vāsa ādi parikleśa hetukaḥ bhavati

original: ekatra nāyakasevārthaṃ rājagirigamanāyāmantraṇena vāgārambhaṇenānyatra sevāprakāropadeśasamācāranatibhyāṃ vākkāyasaṃraṃbhānubhāvābhyāṃ pratīyata  #
analyzed: ekatra nāyaka sevā artham rājagiri gamanāya āmantraṇena vāc ārambhaṇena anyatra sevā prakāra upadeśa samācāra natibhyām vāc kāya saṃraṃbha anubhāvābhyām pratīyata
iti sā iyam rasa hrāsa uktiḥ
ālambanasya anaucityāt bhavan api parisphulan
rasa vat hāsate kiñcid ayam ābhāsaḥ īritaḥ
tatra śṛṅgāra ābhāsaḥ caturdhā īritaḥ
ekatra rāgasya abhāvāt anekatra vaiṣamyeṇa saṃbhavāt tiryak ālaṃbana tvāt mleccha ālaṃbana tvāt ca
atra rāga asaṃbhavaḥ tridhā prāgabhāvāt
pradhvaṃsa abhāvāt atyanta abhāvāt ca
atra rāga prāgabhāva viṣaye na ābhāsa tā
darśana ādi sāmagrī saṃbhave rāga utpatteḥ saṃbhāvyamāna tvāt itarayoḥ tu ābhāsa tā eva
rāga atyanta abhāve yathā

original: vyarthatvaṃ gamitā kaṭākṣasaraṇiḥ sākūtamandasmitā vyaṅgyoktirvitathā vṛthā viracitastādṛk praṇāmāñjaliḥ /
analyzed: vyartha tvam gamitā kaṭākṣa saraṇiḥ sa ākūta manda smitā vyaṅgya uktiḥ vitathā vṛthā viracitaḥ tādṛś praṇāma añjaliḥ

original: necchatyanyaparigrahaṃ kila vadhūṃ recarlavaṃśāgraṇīḥ sakhyastvaṃ ca suhurmuhuḥ smarata māṃ so 'yaṃ hi satyavrataḥ // Ckc_5.*12 //
analyzed: na icchati anya parigraham kila vadhūm sakhyaḥ tvam ca suhur muhur smarata mām saḥ yam hi satya vrataḥ
atra muhur mahur ātma smaraṇa prārthanā lakṣaṇām sakhī jana āmantraṇa vāc āraṃbha anubhāva anumitām

original: tanutyāgodyogalakṣaṇāṃ parāṃ puṣṭimadhitiṣṭhan parakīyāyāḥ nāyikāyā anurāgo viṣayabhūte
analyzed: tanutyāga udyoga lakṣaṇām parām puṣṭim adhitiṣṭhan parakīyāyāḥ nāyikāyāḥ anurāgaḥ viṣaya bhūte
nāyaka ratne para strī viṣaya rāga atyanta abhāvāt ekatas śṛṅgāram iva ābhāsayati iti
saḥ yam rasa ābhāsa uktiḥ
evam anyat api udāhāryam
prabaloṣu upajāteṣu pratikūleṣu hetuṣu
mīlanam śamaḥ īritaḥ
yathā

original: siṅgakṣoṇibhujaḥ kaliṅgakubhuje kruddhasya tasmin kṣaṇe dattāṃ tattanayāmupāyanatayā lokottamāṃ paśyataḥ /
analyzed: siṅga kṣoṇibhujaḥ kaliṅga kubhuje kruddhasya tasmin kṣaṇe dattām tad tanayām upāyana tayā loka uttamām paśyataḥ

original: vyāvṛttā dhanuṣaḥ kaṭākṣasaraṇistadbhrūlatālokinī dṛkkoṇaṃ parihṛtya rāgamahimā cite paraṃ ceṣṭate // Ckc_5.*13 //
analyzed: vyāvṛttā dhanuṣaḥ kaṭākṣa saraṇiḥ tad bhrū latā ālokinī dṛś koṇam parihṛtya rāga mahimā cite param ceṣṭate

original: atra pūrvamārūḍho 'pi kaliṅganarapālagocaro nāyakasya krodho balavatā samucitopāyanasamarpaṇajanitaprasādopabṛhitena
analyzed: atra pūrvam ārūḍhaḥ pi kaliṅga narapāla gocaraḥ nāyakasya krodhaḥ balavatā samucita upāyana samarpaṇa janita prasāda upabṛhitena

original: kaliṅgarājakanyakāgocareṇa premṇā niravaśeṣamupaśāmyata iti seyaṃ rasaśamoktiḥ /
analyzed: kaliṅga rāja kanyakā gocareṇa premṇā niravaśeṣam upaśāmyate iti sā iyam rasa śama uktiḥ
rasasya vāsanā sthairyāt āśya prakṛteḥ uta

original: pralīnasyāpi yo gandhaḥ sa śeṣa iti gīyate // Ckc_5.26 //
analyzed: pralīnasya api yaḥ gandhaḥ sa śeṣaḥ iti gīyate
yathā

original: śyāmāyāḥ kucamaṇḍale na parayorṇattebhakumbhadvaye dṛṣṭiṃ rāgataraṅgitāṃ vidadhatā śrīsiṅgabhūmībhujā /
analyzed: śyāmāyāḥ kuca maṇḍale na dṛṣṭim rāga taraṅgi tām vidadhatā śrī siṅga bhūmībhujā

original: dākṣiṇyavratabhhagabhīrumanasā devena vāmabhruvā- manyāsāmapi sā tathaiva kṛtinā netrakriyā nāpyasau // Ckc_5.*14 //
analyzed: dākṣiṇya vrata bhhaga bhīru manasā devena vāma bhruvā manyāsām api sā tathā eva kṛtinā netra kriyā nā api asau

original: atra dhīralalitaprakṛternāyakasya śyāmāgocareṇa balavatā premṇā pralīnatāmānītasyāpi
analyzed: atra dhīra lalita prakṛteḥ nāyakasya śyāmā gocareṇa balavatā premṇā pralīna tām ānītasya api

original: taditaranāyikāgocarasya premṇo viśeṣaḥ kaṭākṣapradāna dākṣiṇyena pratibhātata iti
analyzed: tad itara nāyikā gocarasya premṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ kaṭākṣa pradāna dākṣiṇyena pratibhā tatas iti
sā iyam rasa śeṣa uktiḥ

original: evaṃ hāsyādiṣvapi raseṣu sphurattādi daśoktiprakārāḥ svayamanusandheyāḥ /
analyzed: evam hāsya ādiṣu api raseṣu sphurat tā ādi daśa ukti prakārāḥ svayam anusandheyāḥ
viśeṣāt āgrahaḥ smākam alahkāra prapañcane
brūmaḥ tathā api saṃjñepāt śṛṅgāra ādi nirūpaṇam
atra śṛṅgāraḥ nāma catur astrīpuṃsa ālaṃbanaḥ manohara padārtha uddīpanaḥ lalita bhrū latā vikṣepa kaṭākṣa manda smita ādi anubhāvaḥ
nikhila sācvika utsuka tva ugra tā lasya jugupsā vahittha ādi pariśiṣṭa sañcāri puṣṭaḥ rati sthāyībhāvaḥ
vipralaṃbha saṃbhoga bhedavān vigalita vedya antara tva lakṣaṇam cetaḥ vikāsam adhitiṣṭhati
atra vipralaṃbhaḥ yathā
cāndrīcandana nitarām ākampita svāntayā ārūḍha vāñchā śriyā

original: niḥśvāsaglapitādharaṃ paritatassaṃruddhavāṣpodayaṃ tanvyā snigdhasakhījane viracitā dīnā dṛśorvṛttayaḥ // Ckc_5.*15 //
analyzed: niḥśvāsa glapita adharam paritataḥ saṃruddha vāṣpa udayam tanvyā snigdha sakhī jane viracitāḥ dīnāḥ dṛśoḥ vṛttayaḥ
atra nāyaka gocarā kasya aśvit nāyikāyāḥ ratiḥ abhīṣṭa āliṅgana ādi aprāptau api prakṛṣyamāṇā
candra candana mārūtaiḥ śvakārāt anukta samuccitaiḥ puṃskokila ālāpibhiḥ samuddīpyamānā
niḥśvāsa ādi śarīra āraṃbha anubhāvaiḥ bāṣpa ādi sācvikaiḥ prakāśitā tanu tva dīna dṛṣṭi ādya anumitaiḥ
glāni śrama viṣāda āvega dainya ādi sañjāribhiḥ abhipoṣitāḥ vigalita vedya antara tayā bhāvaka cetasi

original: vikāso pādhikā sphurantī śṛṅgārarasatāmāpadyata iti so 'yaṃ tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: sphurantī śṛṅgāra rasa tām āpadyate iti saḥ yam tathā uktaḥ
saṃbhoga śṛṅgāraḥ yathā

original: avyājaspṛhaṇīyamañcati parāṃ kāntiṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ śrīsiṅgabhitināyakena sutanoraṅgaṃ samāliṅgitam /
analyzed: a vyāja spṛhaṇīyam añcati parām kāntim sakhīnām puras śrī siṅgabhiti nāyakena su tanoḥ aṅgam samāliṅgitam

original: svājñānirvahaṇena nirvṛtamanāstatkālamīladdṛśe yasmai puṣpaśarāsanaḥ svasukṛtaiḥ kalyāṇamāśaṃsate // Ckc_5.*16 //
analyzed: sva ājñā nirvahaṇena nirvṛta manāḥ tad kālam īlat dṛśe yasmai puṣpaśarāsanaḥ sva sukṛtaiḥ kalyāṇam āśaṃsate
hāsyaḥ nāma kubja vāmana ādi samalambanaḥ tad svarūpa ādi bhāvanā uddīpanaḥ nayana vistāra gaṇḍa maṇḍala
vikāsa su andha nikuñcana ādi anubhāvaḥ bāṣpa sveda ādi sācvikaḥ harṣa avahittha ādhṛti pramukha sañjārī hāsya sthāyībhāvaḥ
smita vihasita ādi bhedavān vikāsa upādhiḥ eva vilasati
yathā

original: strīpuṃsau gaḍurāvupāyanakṛtau dvīpāntarādhīśvarair īkṣitvā vikasatkapolamadhipo līlābjamājighrati /
analyzed: strī puṃsau gaḍurau upāyana kṛtau dvīpa antara adhīśvaraiḥ īkṣitvā vikasat kapolam adhipaḥ līlā abjam ājighrati

original: rājādressacivā hasanti vikasannetraṃ vibhugvāṃsakaṃ saṃpīḍyāpahasanti pārśvayugalīṃ bāṣpāvilākṣaṃ janāḥ // Ckc_5.*17 //
analyzed: rāja adreḥ sacivāḥ hasanti vikasat netram vibhuj vāṃsakam saṃpīḍya apahasanti pārśva yugalīm bāṣpa āvila akṣam janāḥ
atra kubja mithuna viṣayaḥ nāyaka ādi samāśraya hāsaḥ tadīya strīpuṃsa vyāpāra ābhāsa bhāvanā uddīpitaḥ
kapola vikāsa ādinā śarīra āraṃbha anubhāvena sūcitaḥ līlā aravinda samāghrāṇa ādi anumitena avahitthā lakṣaṇa sañcāriṇā
paripuṣṭaḥ manaḥ vikāsam adhitiṣṭhati iti saḥ yam hāsyaḥ
vīraḥ nāma prakṛṣṭa prakṛti nāyaka āśrayaḥ lokottara vastu viṣayaḥ tādṛśa purāvṛtta puruṣakāra anubandha asaha
sahaja sacva ādi samuddīpana vibhāvaḥ mukha prasāda vāhu sphuraṇa kṛpāṇa nirīkṣaṇa pramukha anubhāvaḥ
romāñca vepathu prabhṛti sācvikaḥ harṣa asūyā amarṣa mati dhṛti pramukha sañcāri bhāva kalpita śrīḥ utsāha sthāyībhāvaḥ cetasaḥ
vistāram adhitiṣṭhati
yathā

original: rāmasya śrutasindhubandhanavidhiḥ bāhū nijau vīkṣate prītiṃ naiti digantarājavijaye dvīpāntarāṇāṃ śruteḥ /
analyzed: rāmasya śruta sindhu bandhana vidhiḥ bāhū nijau vīkṣate prītim na eti diganta rāja vijaye dvīpa antarāṇām śruteḥ

original: na ślāghāṃ bahumanyate vitaraṇe deveṣvasaṃprārthiṣu śrīsiṅgakṣitināthamaṇḍanamaṇī recarlavaṃśāgraṇīḥ // Ckc_5.*18 //
analyzed: na ślāghām bahu manyate vitaraṇe deveṣu a saṃprārthiṣu śrī siṅga kṣitinātha maṇḍana maṇī recar lavaṃśa agraṇīḥ

original: atra nāyakottamāśrayo lokottaratvaprāptiviṣaya utsāho rāmabhadrāpadāna śravaṇādinoddīpito
analyzed: atra nāyaka uttama āśrayaḥ loka uttara tva prāpti viṣayaḥ utsāhaḥ śravaṇa ādinā uddīpitaḥ
rāja bāhu nirīkṣaṇa lakṣita rāmabhadra viṣaya spardhā viśeṣāt jambūdvīpa rāja viṣaya anādarāt ca

original: prakāśitenādhikaspadāṃ nivārayeti lakṣaṇavatā śobhānāmnā pauruṣasācvikena dvīpāntarajayāśaṃsālakṣaṇena
analyzed: prakāśitena adhika spadām nivāraya iti lakṣaṇavatā śobhā nāmnā pauruṣa sācvikena dvīpa antara jaya āśaṃsā lakṣaṇena
citta āraṃbha anubhāvena ca abhivyaktaḥ sūyā dhṛti mati garva ādibhiḥ upacitaḥ manaḥ vistāram adhitiṣṭhati iti
saḥ yam yuddha vīraḥ

original: tathā ca tatraiva dānavīro 'pi devatākartṛkārthitvākāṅakṣālakṣaṇena cittārambhānubhāvenābhivyakto devatālabhyavastuviśeṣavitaraṇakaṇḍūlatālakṣaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā ca tatra eva dānavīraḥ pi devatā kartṛka arthi tva ākāṅakṣā lakṣaṇena citta ārambha anubhāvena abhivyaktaḥ devatā labhya vastu viśeṣa vitaraṇa kaṇḍūla tā lakṣaṇam
parama utkarṣam ārohati
adbhuta nāmā lokottara darśana ādi vibhāvaḥ nayana naiśvalya śirodhūnana choṭikā sādhuvāda ādi anubhāvaḥ
pulaka ādi sācvikaḥ harṣa cāpalya dhṛti mati pramukha sañcāri bhāvaḥ vismaya sthāyībāvaḥ vitta vistāram eva adhitiṣṭhati
yathā

original: śrutvā saṃsadi siṅgabhūpacaritaṃ dattaṃ havistadadvijair ādātuṃ bhuvamāgataiḥ pratigatairākhyātamindrādibhiḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā saṃsadi siṅga bhūpa caritam dattam haviḥ tat a dvijaiḥ ādātum bhuvam āgataiḥ pratigataiḥ ākhyātam indra ādibhiḥ

original: anyonyaṃ kila sādhusādhviti kṛtālāpā dilīpādayaḥ prāntasphāravilokitā pulakitā mūrdhānamādhunvate // Ckc_5.*19 //
analyzed: anyonyam kila sādhu sādhu iti kṛta ālāpāḥ dilīpa ādayaḥ prānta sphāra vilokitā pulakitāḥ mūrdhānam ādhunvate
atra dharṇa pratiṣṭhāpana ādi nāyaka puṇya carita viṣayaḥ dilīpa ādi purātana mahā rāja samāśrayaḥ
vismayaḥ mahendra ādi samādaraṇa udāharaṇābhyām uddīpitaḥ nayana staimitya ādi anubhāva anumitaḥ
pulaka sācvikena viśeṣataḥ prakāśitaḥ sādhuvāda śiraḥ kampa anumitaiḥ harṣa cāpala ādibhiḥ abhipuṣṭa śvitta vistāra lakṣaṇam upādhim upāt
iṣṭhate iti saḥ yam adbhuta rasaḥ
raudraḥ nāma krūra jana samāśrayaḥ
apara adhi viṣayaḥ tad apakāra smaraṇa pramuka uddīpanaḥ bhrū bhaṅga danta ghaṭṭana rūkṣa īkṣaṇa ādi anubhāvaḥ
sveda vepathu pramukha sācvikaḥ marṣa abhyasūyā cāpala ugra tā ādi sañcāri bhāva prapañcitaḥ krodha sthāyībhāvaḥ
citta vikṣobha lakṣaṇam upādhim anusaṃdhatte
yathā
cakṣuḥ vikṣepa lakṣa sphurita paripatat krodharva aṃhna sphuliṅgam bhrū bhaṅga udbheda bhīmam kaṭu raṭati raṭat danta daṣṭā dharā uṣṭham

original: durvārākharvagarvajvarabharaghaṭita svedamādhūtagātraṃ bhinte śrīsiṅgabhūpapratibhaṭapaṭalaṃ niṣkṛpaste kṛpāṇaḥ // Ckc_5.*20 //
analyzed: durvāra akharva garva jvara bhara ghaṭita svedam ādhūta gātram bhinte śrī siṅga bhūpa pratibhaṭa paṭalam niṣkṛpaḥ te kṛpāṇaḥ
atra pratibhaṭa samāśrayaḥ nāyaka gocaraḥ krodha sthāyī deśa ākramaṇa bandhu vadha bandhana ādibhiḥ uddīpyamānaḥ
bhrū bhaṅga danta karṣaṇa oṣṭha saṃdaṃśana ādibhiḥ abhilakṣitaḥ sveda vepathubhyām sāttvikābhyām
prakāśamānaḥ tad upalakṣitaiḥ eva garva āmarṣa cāpala ugra tā amarṣa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāribhiḥ puṣṭaḥ
bhāvakānām cetasi vikṣobha lakṣaṇām ānanda laharīm unmudrayan raudraḥ iti ākhyāyate
karuṇaḥ nāma vipanna suhṛd ādi viṣayaḥ tad guṇa smaraṇa ādi uddīpanaḥ vilāpa patana ādi anubhāvaḥ
vaivarṇya stambha aśru mukha sāttvikaḥ nirveda glāni viṣāda dainya āvega unmāda ādi sañcārī śoka sthāyībhāvaḥ
manaḥ vikṣobha lakṣaṇam eva upādhim anusandhatte
yathā

original: etattadvadanaṃ kimeṣa sabhujaḥ se 'yaṃ tavorassthalī hā prāṇeśa halāsmi nāsmi dalitā gāḍhaṃ khalu strīmanaḥ /
analyzed: etat tat vadanam kim eṣa sa bhujaḥ se yam tava uraḥsthalī hā prāṇeśa halā asmi nā asmi dalitā gāḍham khalu strī manaḥ

original: ityādīni raṇāṅgaṇeṣu gaṇaśaḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpadviṣa- ddevīnāṃ paridevitāni karuṇāṃ śraṇvanti bhūtānyapi // Ckc_5.*21 //
analyzed: ityādīni raṇa aṅgaṇeṣu gaṇaśas śrī siṅga bhūpa dviṣaḥ ddevīnām paridevitāni karuṇām bhūtāni api

original: atra nāyakaśatrukulabālikāśrayo vipannavallabhaviṣayaḥ śokasthāyī khaṇḍīkṛtaḥ tatastato
analyzed: atra nāyaka śatru kula bālikā āśrayaḥ vipanna vallabha viṣayaḥ śoka sthāyī khaṇḍīkṛtaḥ tatas tatas
viparyasta tad avayava pratyabhijñā ādibhiḥ uddīpyamānaḥ tat etat iti vāc ārambham avyabhicaratā
nirdeśa lakṣaṇena hasta ārambha anubhāvena sūcitaḥ tad anusaraṇa pariṇatiḥ avaśyam bhāvinā aśru pāta vaivarṇya ādinā
sāttvika samudayena prakāśitaḥ tad tad ucita hā prāṇa īśa ādi vāc ārambha anumitaiḥ dainya viṣāda nirveda matibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ
ibhiḥ ādi pada dyotita paridevita viśeṣa upakalpitaiḥ glāni śrama śaṅgā cāpala unmāda ādibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca
paripoṣitaḥ nīrasa tayā sthāṇu prāyāṇām api bhūta betāla ātmaka ādīnām a pi anukampā atiśaya sampādaka tayā
bhāvuka cetasi vikṣobha puṣṭi m adhitiṣṭhan karuṇaḥ iti ākhyāyate
bībhatsaḥ nāma heya vastu viṣayaḥ tad doṣa darśana ādibhiḥ uddīpitaḥ nāsā agra pidhāna mukha kūṇana netra saṃkocanā
di anubhāvaḥ vaivarṇya ādi sāttvikaḥ nirveda āvega cāpala vrīḍā ādi vyabhicārī jugupsā sthāyībhāvaḥ
vidagdha bhāvaka cetasi vikṣepa lakṣaṇām ānanda bhūmikām ālaṃbate
yathā

original: aṃhaśśeṣairiva parivṛto makṣikāmaṇḍalībhiḥ pūyaklinnaṃ vraṇamabhimṛśan vāsasaḥ khaṇḍakena /
analyzed: aṃhaḥ śeṣaiḥ iva parivṛtaḥ makṣikā maṇḍalībhiḥ pūya klinnam vraṇam abhimṛśan vāsasaḥ khaṇḍakena

original: rathyāprānte drutamapasṛtaṃ saṃkucannetrakoṇaṃ channaghrāṇaṃ racayati janaṃ dadrurogī daridraḥ // Ckc_5.*22 //
analyzed: rathyā prānte drutam apasṛtam saṃkucat netra koṇam channa ghrāṇam racayati janam dadru rogī daridraḥ

original: atra nāyakaśatrudadrurogiviṣayā janāśrayā jugupsā vraṇāmarśanā dibhiruddīpitā netrasaṃkocanādibhirabhivyaktā
analyzed: atra nāyaka śatru dadru rogi viṣayāḥ jana āśrayāḥ jugupsā vraṇa āmarśana ādibhiḥ uddīpitā netra saṃkocana ādibhiḥ abhivyaktā
para apasaraṇa anumitaiḥ āvega cāpala ādibhiḥ poṣitā cetasi vikṣepa lakṣaṇam upādhim ādadhānā
bībhatsaḥ iti ākhyāyate
bhayānakaḥ nāma bhīṣaṇa vastu viṣayaḥ mukha śoṣa tālu puṭa lehana nīcais gamana ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: aśruvarjita sāttviko viṣādaśaṅkātrāsāvegadainyajaḍatā glāniśramacintāpasmārādisaṃcāribhāvo bhayasthāyībhāvaścittavikṣepalakṣaṇāmeva bhūmikāmālambate
analyzed: sāttvikaḥ viṣāda śaṅkā trāsa āvega dainya jaḍa tā glāni śrama cintā apasmāra ādi saṃcāri bhāvaḥ bhaya sthāyībhāvaḥ citta vikṣepa lakṣaṇām eva bhūmikām ālambate
yathā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitināyakasya ripavo dhāṭīśruterākulāḥ śuṣyattālupuṭaṃ skhalatpadatalaṃ vyālokayanto diśaḥ /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitināyakasya ripavaḥ dhāṭī śruteḥ ākulāḥ śuṣyat tālu puṭam skhalat pada talam vyālokayantaḥ diśaḥ

original: dhāvitvā kathamapyupetya tamasā gāḍhopagūḍhāṃ guhām anviṣyanti tadantare 'pi karasaṃsparśena gartāntaram // Ckc_5.*23 //
analyzed: dhāvitvā katham api upetya tamasā gāḍha upagūḍhām guhām anviṣyanti tad antare pi kara saṃsparśena garta antaram
atra kriyā akrūra nāyaka nāsīra bhaṭa viṣayaḥ śatru samāśrayaḥ sthāyībhāvaḥ dhāṭī śravaṇa uddīpitaḥ
dhāvana guhā praveśa garta antara anveṣaṇa ādibhiḥ ranubhāvaiḥ abhivyaktaḥ vyākula tva tālu śoṣaṇa
pada skhalana ādi anumitaiḥ āvega śaṅkā trāsa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāribhiḥ abhipuṣṭaḥ bhāvaka cetasi
vikṣepa lakṣaṇām bhūmikām bibhrāṇaḥ bhayānakaḥ iti ākhyāyate
sā iyam akhilaḥ pi rasa puruṣa arthaḥ janana sāhasra saṃpādita sāhitya devatā pada aravinda yugala upāsanā janita vāsanā prauḍha paripāka bhāvanā viśeṣa sahakāriṇām

original: sahṛdayānāṃ mānasena gocarī kṛto yena kenacidākāreṇa bhāsate /
analyzed: sahṛdayānām mānasena gocarī kṛtaḥ yena kenacid ākāreṇa bhāsate

original: nanu ko 'yamākāro rasasya yenāyaṃ bhāvakamānasairanubhūyata iti cetsvasvānubhavaikavedanīye tasminnākāre kathamasmādṛśāṃ vācovyāpāra mātmīyamāpūrayeyuḥ
analyzed: nanu kaḥ yam ākāraḥ rasasya yena ayam bhāvaka mānasaiḥ anubhūyate iti ced sva sva anubhava eka vedanīye tasmin ākāre katham asmādṛśām vācaḥ vyāpāram ātmīyam āpūrayeyuḥ

original: na hi kṣīrasāgaramāgalaṃ pibannapi taṃ mādhurīviśeṣamidaṃtayā nirdeṣṭuṃ brahmāpi śaknoti /
analyzed: na hi kṣīrasāgara māgalam piban api tam mādhurī viśeṣam idaṃtayā nirdeṣṭum brahmā api śaknoti

original: kintu vigalitavedyāntaratvamiti vacanaparipāṭīṃ manasi muhurāvartayatā bhāvanāsiddhiparyantaṃ saṃtoṣṭavyamāyuṣmatā / nanu
analyzed: kintu vigalita vedya antara tvam iti vacana paripāṭīm manasi muhur āvartayatā bhāvanā siddhi paryantam saṃtoṣṭavyam āyuṣmatā nanu
ākāśāpūpikā nyāyāt asau rasaḥ iti sphuṭam

original: āmīlitadṛśāṃ puṃsāṃ seyaṃ bhāvaka bhūmikā // Ckc_5.28 //
analyzed: āmīlita dṛśām puṃsām sā iyam bhāvaka bhūmikā

original: asatyo rasavādo 'yaṃ rasavāda itaḥ param // Ckc_5.29 //
analyzed: asatyaḥ rasavādaḥ yam rasavādaḥ itas param
na pratyakṣeṇa lakṣyaḥ yam na anumānena mānyate

original: na cāgamena sugamo nopamānena mānitaḥ // Ckc_5.30 //
analyzed: na ca āgamena sugamaḥ na upamānena mānitaḥ
samarthitaḥ na arthāpattyā na abhāvena ca
saṃbhāvyaḥ naitihyena ca lihyate

original: iti ceducyate svānubhūtivilasanameva rasasya sadbhāve pramāmamiti paramaṃ rahasyam /
analyzed: iti ced ucyate sva anubhūti vilasanam eva rasasya sadbhāve paramam rahasyam
tat etat anupadam eva pradarśitam

original: anyā punariyaṃ vāgāḍaṃbaraviḍaṃbanā vividhacarcāvinodakaṃḍūladhiṣaṇāprakāṃḍānāṃ vādināṃ mude vilikhyate /
analyzed: anyā punar iyam vāc āḍaṃbara viḍaṃbanā vividha carcā vinoda kaṃḍūla dhiṣaṇā prakāṃḍānām vādinām mude vilikhyate
tathā hi

original: nanu pratyakṣī bhavannasau nirvikalpakenāvabhāsate savikalpakena vā /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣī bhavan asau nirvikalpakena avabhāsate savikalpakena vā
na ādyaḥ
vastu svarūpa mātra avabhāsaka svabāva tvāt nirvikalpakasya rasasya bhuvi bhāva di viśeṣa anusaṃdhāna pūrvaka pratīti svabhāva tvāt
nirvikalpaka pūrva tvāt savikalpakasya iti ced śrūyatām
sa vikalpakena iti brūmaḥ
sa vikalpakasya nirvikalpaka pūrvaka tva abhidhānam avijārita ramaṇīyam eva
niḥ viśiṣṭa viṣaya an ullekhinaḥ jñānasya eva asaṃbhavāt

original: tathā ca śeṣāvatāraviśeṣasya bhagavataḥ patañjalerabhiprāyaṃ prakaṭayatā vyāhṛtaṃ hariyoginā /
analyzed: tathā ca śeṣa avatāra viśeṣasya bhagavataḥ patañjaleḥ abhiprāyam prakaṭayatā vyāhṛtam hari yoginā
na saḥ sti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte

original: anuviddhamiva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena gṛhyate // Ckc_5.32 //
analyzed: anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gṛhyate

original: iti anumānamapi sāmānyato dṛṣṭam rasāvabhāsakatayātmani bahumānamākalyati /
analyzed: iti anumānam api sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam rasa avabhāsaka tayā ātmani bahu mānam ākalyati
amī sāmājikāḥ rasa anubhavavantaḥ
ye ye vivakṣita ceṣṭā viśiṣṭāḥ te te rasa anubhavavantaḥ
yathā tattva sākṣātkāra anubhavitāraḥ
tathā ca ime ceṣṭā viśiṣṭāḥ
tasmāt rasa anubhavavantaḥ eva iti
na ca dṛṣṭānte sādhana vaikalyam āśaṅkanīyam
samādhi velāyām ānante bāṣpa ādi vyatikara prasiddheḥ
tathā mahimrastave

original: “manaḥ pratyak citte savidhamavadhāyāstamarutaḥ prahṛṣyadromāṇaḥ pramadasalilotsaṅgita dṛśaḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ pratyak citte savidham avadhāya asta marutaḥ prahṛṣyat romāṇaḥ pramada salila utsaṅgita dṛśaḥ

original: yadālokyāhlādahrada iva nimajjyāmṛtamaye dadhatyantastattvaṃ kamapi yaminastatkila bhavān” // Ckc_5.*24 // iti
analyzed: yat ālokya āhlāda hrade iva nimajjya amṛta maye dadhati antar tattvam kam api yaminaḥ tat kila bhavān iti

original: āgamāḥ puna ranekasiddhāntarahasye sākṣātkāriṇāṃ yathādṛṣṭavādināṃ purāṇakavīnāmalaṅkārasaṃhitāḥ /
analyzed: āgamāḥ punar aneka siddhānta rahasye sākṣātkāriṇām yathā dṛṣṭa vādinām purāṇa kavīnām alaṅkāra saṃhitāḥ

original: tatra ca rasa eva sarvottaratayā pratipādyate /
analyzed: tatra ca rasaḥ eva sarva uttara tayā pratipādyate

original: gosadṛśo gavaya itivat tattvasākṣātkārasadṛśo rasa ityupamānamapi rasasadbhāvāyānubhāvanādātmasattāsāphalyamanusaṃdhatte /
analyzed: go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti vat tattva sākṣātkāra sadṛśaḥ rasaḥ iti upamānam api rasa sadbhāvāya anubhāvanāt ātma sattā sāphalyam anusaṃdhatte
arthāpattiḥ api nirāpattikam samarthayate rasa sadbhāvam

original: yathā divā na bhuñjānasya devadattasya pīnatvānupapattyā kalpitā naktaṃbhuktiḥ /
analyzed: yathā divā na bhuñjānasya devadattasya pīna tva anupapattyā kalpitā naktaṃbhuktiḥ
evam vibhāva anubhāva ādeḥ anupapattyā rasaḥ iti

original: nanu rasāpratītāvapi svayameva kvacidāsvādyatayā svatandrāṇāṃ bhāvādīnāṃ kānupapattiriti
analyzed: nanu rasa apratītau api svayam eva kvacid āsvādya tayā svatandrāṇām bhāva ādīnām kā anupapattiḥ iti

original: cet kadācit ko 'pi vibhāvādiṣu svatantravyavahāra upacāramātreṇa rājapuruṣeṣu rājavyavahāravaditi
analyzed: ced kadācid kaḥ pi vibhāva ādiṣu svatantra vyavahāraḥ upacāra mātreṇa rāja puruṣeṣu rāja vyavahāra vat iti
saṃbhava vastu saṃkhyā viṣaya tayā rasa mahārāja lakṣmīm an ālakṣayan nija daurbhāgyam āvirbhāvayati
aitihyam api nidarśita pramāṇa saṃvādinā bāhyam
na eva rasa nirūpaṇe saṃbādham avalambate
tat ittham akhila pramāṇa saṃsiddhe rasa sudhā nisyande su manobhiḥ anubhūyamāne yogya anupalabdhi lakṣaṇam abhāva pramāṇam

original: rasāvamānaika durāgrahāṇāṃ viparītasākṣarāṇāṃ manasi vaidagdhyābhāvameko 'pi bhāsayati /
analyzed: rasa avamāna eka durāgrahāṇām viparīta sākṣarāṇām manasi vaidagdhya abhāvam ekaḥ bhāsayati
tathā ca uktam asmat ācāryaiḥ kāśīśvara miśraiḥ rasamīmāṃsāyām
rasa lakṣmīm an ādṛtya vāc āḍambara toraṇam
puṇḍra īkṣaḥ rasa vidveṣāt ṛjīṣa anubhavaḥ yathā
pramāṇa lakṣaṇa ādika manyataḥ vagantavyam
kavayaḥ loka siddhānta siddhārtha vyavahāriṇaḥ
atrā eva hi camatkāra sākṣātkāra eka sākṣiṇaḥ
anuktānām iha anyeṣām lakṣya lakṣaṇa vistaraḥ
siṅga bhūpāla racite rasārṇau asudhākare
ādi dvitīyayoḥ sādhu śīlanīyāḥ vilāsayoḥ
anyatra baddha dṛṣṭi tvāt asmābhiḥ na prapañcitaḥ

original: na hi sarvatra sarveṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ pradarśanam /
analyzed: na hi sarvatra sarveṣām viśeṣāṇām pradarśanam
ati vistara doṣeṇa grantha uccheda prasaṅgataḥ
diś mātram eva śāstreṣu dhīmatām upadiśyate
khayam eva avabhāsante viśeṣāḥ pariśīlanāt
iti sakalam api kalyāṇam

original: iti sarasasāhityacāturīdhurīṇaviśveśvarakavicandrapraṇītāyāṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpālakīrtisudhāsāra śītalāyāṃ camatkāracandrikāyā- malaṅkṛtau rasaviveko  #
analyzed: iti sarasa sāhitya cāturī dhurīṇa viśveśvara kavi candra praṇītāyām śrī siṅga bhūpāla kīrti sudhā sāra śītalāyām camatkāracandrikāyām alaṅkṛtau
nāma pañcamaḥ vilāsaḥ
ṣaṣṭhaḥ vilāsaḥ
eka deśa gatāḥ sarvam śarīram kaṭaka ādi vat

original: alaṅkurvanti ye kāvyaṃ te 'laṅkāratayā matāḥ // Ckc_6.1 //
analyzed: alaṅkurvanti ye kāvyam te laṅkāra tayā matāḥ
traividhyam kathitam teṣām śabda artha ubhaya saṃbhayāt
atra śabda gatāḥ prājñaiḥ ekādaśa samīritāḥ
chāyā mudrā yuktiḥ śleṣa anuprāsa gumbhanāḥ citram

original: yamakaṃ vākovākyaṃ gūḍhaṃ praśnottaraṃ ceti // Ckc_6.3 //
analyzed: yamakam vākovākyam gūḍham praśna uttaram ca iti
anyoktīnām anukṛtiḥ chāyā sā iyam udāhṛtā
tredhā nāgarika grāmya sāmānya ukti anusārataḥ
tatra nāgarika ukti chāyā yathā
siktaḥ pi siṅga bhūpāla kalyāṇa ukti sudhā rasaiḥ

original: yo na pallavitastasmai jaṅgamasthāṇave namaḥ // Ckc_6.*1 //
analyzed: yaḥ na pallavitaḥ tasmai jaṅgama sthāṇave namaḥ

original: atra jaṅgamasthāṇave nama iti solluṇṭhane namaḥśabdaṃ vadatāṃ vidagdhānāmukteranukṛtiḥ chāyā /
analyzed: atra jaṅgama sthāṇave namaḥ iti sa ulluṇṭhane namaḥ śabdam vadatām vidagdhānām ukteḥ anukṛtiḥ chāyā
grāmya ukti chāyā yathā
sakhi siṅga nṛpati pada yuga śaraṇa āgata rāja vebhavam paśya

original: sundari kimidaṃ citraṃ rājñi bhujaṅge 'pi kācavalayaḥ kim // Ckc_6.*2 //
analyzed: sundari kim idam citram rājñi bhujaṅge kāca valayaḥ kim

original: atra turīyapāda āśrayaviśeṣeṇābyudayaviśeṣaṃ vadatāṃ grāmyāṇāmukteranukṛtiḥ chāyā /
analyzed: atra turīya pāde āśraya viśeṣeṇa a byudaya viśeṣam vadatām grāmyāṇām ukteḥ anukṛtiḥ chāyā

tam siṅgayam siṅga bhūpālam sārasāda āvāsa padmādayatu bhajatu
tathā gajavatī sva ādhāra diś gajavatī iti arthaḥ
sā kṣamā bhūmiḥ ca
anyat evam vidham anusandheyam
yamakam tu avinābhūta khara vyañjana saṃhateḥ
punaḥśrutiḥ vibhinna arthā tana madhya anta ādi gam tridhā
ādiyamakam yathā nāyakasya eva
sa dayā sa dayā buddhiḥ avatāravatā mama
madhurāḥ madhura anātha bhavatā bhavatā ādaram

original: atra caturṇāmapi pādānāmādau pradhamākṣarasahitaṃ varṇatritayamāntaratamavyavthānena punaḥśrutamiti sarvapādādiyamakamidam /
analyzed: atra caturṇām api pādānām ādau varṇa tritayam āntaratama vyavthānena punaḥśrutam iti sarva pāda ādiyamakam idam
evam anye api dvi pāda ādi yamaka dalayoḥ vyavahita avyavahita bhedāḥ svayam avagantavyāḥ
madhyayamakam yathā
ghana yaśaḥ naya śobhita saṃgara utsukatamaḥ katamaḥ sahate ripuḥ

original: bhavadasiṃ vada siṅgamahīpate paramayā ramayā bharitadyute // Ckc_6.*24 //
analyzed: bhavat asim vada siṅga mahīpate paramayā ramayā bharita dyute

original: atra caturṣvapi pādeṣu prathamākṣaraṃ vihāya madhyākṣarayamakamāntaramavya vadhānena punaḥśrutamiti sarvapādamadhyayamakamidam /
analyzed: atra caturṣu api pādeṣu prathama akṣaram vihāya madhya akṣara yamakam punaḥśrutam iti sarva pāda madhya yamakam idam
evam anye pi pūrva padasya bhedāḥ nirūpaṇīyāḥ
antyayamakam yathā
yaśasā saura bhavantam siṅga mahīpāla meru dhīra bhavantam
sukṛtīkṛta vasudevaḥ satatam pāyāt vitīrṇa ghana vasudevaḥ

original: he merudhīra siṅgamahīpāla yaśasā saurabhavantaṃ yaśassurabhiṃ bhavantaṃ sukṛtīkṛtavasudevaḥ
analyzed: he meru dhīra siṅga mahīpāla yaśasā saurabhavantam yaśaḥ surabhim bhavantam sukṛtīkṛta vasudevaḥ

original: svajanmanā kṛtārthīkṛtānakadundubhiḥ devaḥ śrīkṛṣṇaḥ vitīrṇaghanavasu yathā tathā
analyzed: sva janmanā kṛtārthīkṛta ānakadundubhiḥ devaḥ śrī kṛṣṇaḥ vitīrṇa ghana vasu yathā tathā
pāyāt iti antya akṣara sahitam akṣara catuṣṭayam pāda dvaye punaḥśrutam iti dvi pāda anta yamakam idam
evam anye pi bhedāḥ svayam ūhyāḥ
avāntara bhidāḥ tasya bahavaḥ santi duṣkarāḥ
mṛdu mārga virodhi tvāt asmābhiḥ na prapañcitāḥ
ukti pratyuktimat vākyam vākovākyam iti īritam
yathā

original: rambhe kiṃ sakhi menake na sulabhāḥ kalpadrumāṇāṃ srajaḥ te svarge na hi santi kutra dharaṇībhāge kutaḥ kāraṇāt /
analyzed: rambhe kim sakhi menake na sulabhāḥ kalpadrumāṇām srajaḥ te svarge na hi santi kutra dharaṇī bhāge kutas kāraṇāt

original: dātuḥ śrīanavotasiṅganṛpatestairdattahastāṅgulīr brahmā nirmitanānato nu dhanikāḥ sarve 'pi dhātrīsurāḥ // Ckc_6.*26 //
analyzed: dātuḥ śrī anavota siṅga nṛpateḥ taiḥ datta hasta aṅgulīḥ brahmā nirmita nānataḥ nu dhanikāḥ sarve dhātrī surāḥ
atra rambhā menakayoḥ ukti pratyuktayaḥ spaṣṭāḥ
kriyā kāraka saṃbhandha guptimat gūḍham ucyate
tatra kriyā gūḍham yathā
śrī siṅga dharaṇī pāla vibhava iti samṛddha tām

original: atra he vibho samṛddhatāmehīti kriyāpadasya vibhava iti saptamyā gopitatvamiti gūḍhakriyāpadatvāt kriyāgūḍham /
analyzed: atra he vibho samṛddha tām ehi iti kriyā padasya vibhavaḥ iti saptamyā gopita tvam iti gūḍha kriyā pada tvāt kriyā gūḍham
yathā ca
pura mārge purandhrīṇām niścala ānayana añcalāḥ

original: atrāpuriti kriyāpadaṃ purandhrīṇāmiti padena gopitamiti kriyāgūḍham /
analyzed: atra āpuḥ iti kriyā padam purandhrīṇām iti padena gopitam iti kriyā gūḍham
kāraka gūḍham yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpa nāsīra dhāṭī sādhvasa saṃbhramāt

original: kva darī kva darītyadreḥ kāntāre raṭati sphuṭam // Ckc_6.*29 //
analyzed: kva darī kva darī iti adreḥ kāntāre raṭati sphuṭam

original: atra raṭatikriyāyāḥ kartṛkārakabhūtā areḥ kāntāḥ kāntāra iti saptamyā gopitamiti kārakagūḍheṣu kartṛgūḍhamidam /
analyzed: atra raṭati kriyāyāḥ kartṛ kāraka bhūtāḥ areḥ kāntāḥ kāntāraḥ iti saptamyā gopitam iti kāraka gūḍheṣu kartṛ gūḍham idam
evam karma gūḍha ādayaḥ draṣṭavyāḥ
saṃbandha pada gūḍham yathā
śarān apāṅga śrīḥ rājan na abhikramati kevalam
bhrū vallī lalitaiḥ cāpam tvad sevā sudṛśām api

original: atra eḥ kāmasyeti sambandhapadaṃ lalitairvilāsairiti tṛtīyā vā (tṛtīyayā?)
analyzed: atra   kāmasya iti sambandha padam lalitaiḥ vilāsaiḥ iti tṛtīyā vā tṛtīyayā
gopitam iti saṃbandha gūḍham idam
paṣṭhayāḥ kāraka tva abhāvāt sambhandha gūḍhasya atra pṛthak nirdeśaḥ

original: yatrottararya nirmedaḥ praśne praśnottaraṃ hi tat /
analyzed: nirmedaḥ praśne praśna uttaram hi tat
antar praśrnam bahis praśrnam ubhaya praśrnam ca iti tat tridhā
kam adarpayat manobhūḥ kim narapati veśma rājate nidhimat

original: kāmadhurā kathaya saśe tvayaiva kathitaṃ hi siṅgabhūpāla // Ckc_6.*31 //
analyzed: kāma dhurā kathaya saśe tvayā eva kathitam hi siṅga bhūpāla

original: atra manobhūḥ kamalobhayaditi praśne kaṃ brahmāṇam /
analyzed: atra manobhūḥ kam alobhayat iti praśne kam brahmāṇam
narapati veśma praśne kinnara pati veśma
kuberagṛham iti

original: madhurā keti praśne kāmadhurā kāmabhāra iti cottarāṇi praśnāvayasyāntara itīdamantaḥpraśnam /
analyzed: madhurā kā iti praśne kāmadhurā kāmabhāraḥ iti ca uttarāṇi praśna avayasyā antare iti idam antaḥpraśnam
pratyānanam rājita gaṇḍa madhyam su bhīṣaṇam bhairava mastakam kim

original: tvayā naceduttaramapradattaṃ rājan na jānāti bhavān bhavantam // Ckc_6.*32 //
analyzed: tvayā na ced uttaram apradattam rājan na jānāti bhavān bhavantam

original: atra pratigaṇḍabhairava ityuttarasya praśnavākyāntare pratīyamānatvādidañcāntaḥ praśnam /
analyzed: atra prati gaṇḍa bhairavaḥ iti uttarasya praśna vākya antare pratīyamāna tvāt idam ca antar praśnam
bahis praśnam yathā
kīdṛś balam deva vibho śuceḥ ca sambodhanam tvad ripu maṇḍalam ca
śrī siṅga bhūpāla vada uttarāṇi pūrva ukta varṇa bhaya vṛddhi yogāt

original: atra indrabalaṃ saphali śucisaṃbuddhiḥ pavitreti tvadvipumaṇḍalaṃ vitrapaṃ vitrasaditi vā trīṇyuttarāṇi praśnād bahireva mṛgyāṇi /
analyzed: atra indra balam sa phali śuci saṃbuddhiḥ pavitra iti tvad vipu maṇḍalam vitrapam vitrasat iti vā trīṇi uttarāṇi praśnāt bahis eva mṛgyāṇi
bahis praśnam idam
ubhaya praśnam yathā

original: yogināṃ bhogināṃ rājan ka iṣṭastaṃ na vetti yaḥ /
analyzed: yoginām bhoginām rājan kaḥ iṣṭaḥ tam na vetti yaḥ

original: viparīto harastena na jñāto hi sahāmbaraḥ // Ckc_6.*34 //
analyzed: viparītaḥ haraḥ tena na jñātaḥ hi sahāmbaraḥ

original: atra rahovāsa ityuttarasya pūrvabhāgo rahaśśabdo viparītaharaśabdena praśnavākyasyāntaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: atra rahaḥ vāsaḥ iti uttarasya pūrva bhāgaḥ rahaḥ śabdaḥ viparīta hara śabdena praśna vākyasya antaḥ pratīyate

original: uttarāvayavo vāsa ityayaṃ bahireva mṛgyata iti bahirantaḥpraśnottarasya sthitatvādidamubhayapraśnam /
analyzed: uttara avayavaḥ vāsaḥ iti ayam bahis eva mṛgyate iti bahis antar praśna uttarasya sthita tvāt idam ubhaya praśnam
evam nirūpitāḥ sādhu śabda alaṅkāra jātayaḥ

original: iti sarasasāhityacāturīdhurīṇaviśveśvarakavicandrapraṇītāyāṃ camatkāracandrikāyāṃ śabdālaṅkāraviveko nāma ṣaṣṭho vilāsaḥ //
analyzed: iti sarasa sāhitya cāturī dhurīṇa viśveśvara kavicandra praṇītāyām camatkāracandrikāyām śabdālaṅkāravivekaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ vilāsaḥ

original: kurvan karṇapuṭīṃ sudhārasamayīṃ vācaṃ parīkṣāvatā- māsthānyāmanavotasiṅganṛpatiḥ puṣṇāti netrotsavam // Ckc_7.*2 //

original: tanvanna bhāravinatiṃ phaṇirājamūdhrnāṃ kurvanna dhautaśucitāṃ haraśāṭikānām /
analyzed: tanvan na bhāra vinatim kurvan na dhauta śuci tām hara śāṭikānām

original: atra vinatiśucitvavitānānāṃ bhāradhāvanāṃśukāni hetutayā prasiddhāni tāni nirvartya yaśaso dhāvalyanairmalyabāhulyānyanyāni kāraṇāni vibhāvyanta  #
analyzed: atra vinati śuci tva vitānānām bhāra dhāvana aṃśukāni hetutayā prasiddhāni tāni nirvartya yaśasaḥ dhāvalya nairmalya bāhulyāni anyāni kāraṇāni vibhāvyanta
iti iyam kāraṇa antara vibhāvanā

original: atra tīkṣṇatvasugandhitvayorloke ullekhanavāsane prasiddhabhūte iti nirvartya prajñāyaśasoḥ svabhāvo 'pi vibhāvyata itīyaṃ svabhāvavibhāvanā

original: kriyāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ mukhyo gauṇa iti dvidhā /

mukhya hetuḥ dvidhā tatra kāraka jñāpaka kramāt
pravṛtteḥ ca nivṛtteḥ ca prayukteḥ ca tridhā ādimaḥ

pāpa kriyā paṭala khaṇḍana paṇḍitāni puṇya kriyā punar udīraṇa pūraṇāni

original: saṃpādayanti satataṃ pramadaṃ janānāṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpacaritāni mahādbhutāni // Ckc_7.*5 //
analyzed: saṃpādayanti satatam pramadam janānām śrī siṅgabhūpa caritāni mahā adbhutāni

original: atra nāyakacaritānyevaṃ bhūtāni pracānāṃ prāgasataḥ santoṣasya pravartanakriyāyāmāviṣṭānīti kriyāviṣṭo 'yaṃ pravartakaḥ kārakahetuḥ /
analyzed: atra nāyaka caritāni evam bhūtāni pracānām prāk asataḥ santoṣasya pravartana kriyāyām āviṣṭāni iti kriyā āviṣṭaḥ yam pravartakaḥ kāraka hetuḥ
saḥ eva an āviṣṭaḥ yathā
avitura kṛta bhaṅgum siṅga bhūpāla mauleḥ tribhuvanam api siddham kīrti kallolinībhiḥ
viṣama viṣama cakṣuḥ jūṭa koṭīra śṛṅga skhalana valita phena svardhunī spadhinībhiḥ

original: atra bhuvanaviśadabhāve kīrtāvanāviṣṭāṃ hetau tṛtīyāṃ prayojayati /
analyzed: atra bhuvana viśada bhāve kīrtau anāviṣṭām hetau tṛtīyām prayojayati

original: na tu kartarīti kriyānāviṣṭo 'yaṃ pravartakaḥ kārakahetuḥ /
analyzed: na tu kartari iti kriyā an āviṣṭaḥ yam pravartakaḥ kāraka hetuḥ
nivartaka kriyā āviṣṭaḥ kāraka hetuḥ yathā
pradhvaṃsāya prabhavatitarām ugra saṅgrāma raṅga prāmoda agre pratibhaṭa camū cakra durvikramāṇām

original: siṅgakṣoṇīpatirabhivahan ghoradaṃbholipālī- jṛmbārambhaprakaṭanadhurā bandhurāṃ khaḍgadhārām // Ckc_7.*7 //
analyzed: siṅga kṣoṇī patiḥ abhivahan ghora daṃbholi pālī jṛmba ārambha prakaṭana dhurā bandhurām khaḍga dhārām
atra karavāla eka sahāyasya nāyakasya pratibhaṭa vikrama dhvaṃsana kriyā kartṛ tvena āveśāt āviṣṭaḥ yam nivartakaḥ kāraka hetuḥ
saḥ eva an āviṣṭaḥ tathā
śrī siṅga bhūpa kodaṇḍāt atyārūḍha guṇa dhvaneḥ
bhajanti nirguṇībhāvam vaira strī kaṇṭha bhūmayaḥ

original: atra vairikulapālikākaṇṭhasūtranivartanakriyāmanāviśan nāyakakodaṇḍadaṇḍo hetau pañcamīṃ prayojayatīti kriyānāviṣṭo 'yam nivartakaḥ kārakahetuḥ
analyzed: atra vairi kulapālikā kaṇṭhasūtra nivartana kriyām an āviśan nāyaka kodaṇḍa daṇḍaḥ hetau pañcamīm prayojayati iti kriyā an āviṣṭaḥ yam nivartakaḥ kāraka hetuḥ
kriyā āviṣṭa prayojaka hetuḥ yathā

original: kumāre śrīsiṅge jaladhiraśanāṃ śāsati mahī- mamaryādādhvastāḥ patanapariṇāhapratibhuvaḥ /
analyzed: kumāre śrīsiṅge jaladhi raśanām śāsati mahī patana pariṇāha pratibhuvaḥ

original: adharmā nirmūlā narakaparipākapraṇidhayo vinaṣṭā duśceṣṭāḥ kali kaluṣapeśīparidhayaḥ // Ckc_7.*9 //
analyzed: adharmāḥ nirmūlāḥ naraka paripāka praṇidhayaḥ vinaṣṭāḥ duśceṣṭāḥ kali kaluṣa peśī paridhayaḥ

original: atra maryādādhvaṃsādiṣu kriyāsu saptamīvācyanaimittikādhikaraṇakārakabhāvena nāyako 'yamāviśan prayojako bhavatīti yathoktaḥ /
