saḥ eva an āviṣṭaḥ yathā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitināthapārśvamayatāmajñātapūrvaṃ hi naḥ tatsevābhyasanaṃ vidheyamiti te pratyarthipṛthvībhūjaḥ /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitinātha pārśva maya tām ajñāta pūrvam hi naḥ tad sevā abhyasanam vidheyam iti te pratyarthi pṛthvī bhūjaḥ

original: vṛddhāmātyajanānupāṃśu vinayātsiṃhāsane sthāpitān saṃbaddhāñjalayo bhajanti mahitā stotraikacitroktayaḥ // Ckc_7.*10 //
analyzed: vṛddha amātya janān upāṃśu vinayāt siṃhāsane sthāpitān saṃbaddha añjalayaḥ bhajanti mahitā stotra eka citra uktayaḥ

original: atra nīcairavasthānāñjalibandhanastotrakaraṇādirūpāyāṃ sevābhyasanakriyāyāmātmanyevātmanaḥ samāveśo na saṃbhavatīti kriyānāviṣṭo 'yamiti śabdābidheyaprayojako  #
analyzed: atra nīcaiḥ avasthāna añjalibandhana stotra karaṇa ādi rūpāyām sevā abhyasana kriyāyām ātmani eva ātmanaḥ samāveśaḥ na saṃbhavati iti kriyā anāviṣṭaḥ yam iti śabda abidheya prayojakaḥ
nāma kāraka hetuḥ

original: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca caturthaī saptamī ca yam /
analyzed: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca caturthaī saptamī ca yam
kriyā anāviṣṭam ācaṣṭe lakṣakaḥ jñāpakaḥ ca saḥ
tatra dvitīyā vācyaḥ lakṣaka hetuḥ yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpatim prati śītakara karavāla khaṇḍita arātim

original: saṅgarasīmani vividhāḥ kātaraceṣṭā bhavanti vimatānām // Ckc_7.*11 //
analyzed: saṅgara sīmani vividhāḥ kātara ceṣṭāḥ bhavanti vimatānām

original: atra kriyānāviṣṭenaiva nāyakenana vimatānāṃ bhayajanakakātaraceṣṭā labhyante viśeṣyanta iti so 'yaṃ lakṣaṇahetuḥ /
analyzed: atra kriyā an āviṣṭena eva vimatānām bhaya janaka kātara ceṣṭāḥ labhyante viśeṣyante iti saḥ yam lakṣaṇa hetuḥ
pratinā yoge dvitīyām utpādayati iti dvitīyā vācyaḥ yam
tadvat tṛtīyā vācyaḥ yathā
sādhāraṇa āśraya yuje yudhi bandhu tāyām paśyanti rāja acala rājadhānyām
rājānam ājñā sahajena paurāḥ praphulla saugandhika śekhareṇa

original: atra saugandhikaśekharaṃ darśanakriyāyāmanāviśadeva rājānaṃ jñāpayatītītthaṃbhāvalakṣaṇatṛtīyayā vājyo 'yaṃ jñāpakahetuḥ /
analyzed: atra saugandhika śekharam darśana kriyāyām an āviśat eva rājānam jñāpayati iti itthaṃbhāva lakṣaṇa tṛtīyayā vājyaḥ yam jñāpaka hetuḥ
caturthī vācyaḥ yathā

original: akāṇḍe śemuṣī rājñāṃ rājyabhraṃśāya vairiṇām // Ckc_7.*13 //
analyzed: akāṇḍe śemuṣī rājñām rājya bhraṃśāya vairiṇām

original: atrotpātabhūtayā rājñāmakāṇḍato nāyakasevāparāṅmukhībhāvabuddhyā teṣāṃ rājyabhraṃśo jñāpyate /
analyzed: atra utpāta bhūtayā rājñām akāṇḍataḥ nāyaka sevā parāṅmukhībhāva buddhyā teṣām rājya bhraṃśaḥ jñāpyate

original: tenāyamutpātena jñāpyamāna iti caturthyā vācyo jñāpakahetuḥ /
analyzed: tena ayam utpātena jñāpyamānaḥ iti caturthyā vācyaḥ jñāpaka hetuḥ
saptamī vācyaḥ yathā

original: mā bhūta pratirājakātpratimukhāḥ kīrti vihāyādhunā prāṇebhyaḥ kva nuyāta dhūtamatayo bhoḥ paśyatāsmāniti /
analyzed: mā bhūta pratirājakāt pratimukhāḥ kīrti vihāya adhunā prāṇebhyaḥ kva nuyāta dhūta matayaḥ bhoḥ paśyata asmān iti

original: śāsatsu svapatākinī radhikṛteṣvārūḍhamandasmitaḥ śrīsiṅgakṣitipo ripūnabhimukho badhnāti dossampadaḥ // Ckc_7.*14 //
analyzed: śāsatsu sva patākinī radhi kṛteṣu ārūḍha manda smitaḥ śrī siṅga kṣitipaḥ ripūn abhimukhaḥ badhnāti dos sampadaḥ

original: atra senādhipatīnāṃ balānuśāsanakriyayā nāyakasya prakāśanakriyā lakṣyate /
analyzed: atra senā adhipatīnām bala anuśāsana kriyayā nāyakasya prakāśana kriyā lakṣyate
hetuḥ gauṇaḥ iti proktaḥ gauṇa vṛtti vyapāśrayāt
vaicitrī kāraṇa tvena citra hetuḥ ca satkṛtaḥ
sama kālaḥ viparyastaḥ yukta ayuktau asaṃgataḥ

original: iti tasya samāsena pañca bhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // Ckc_7.10 //
analyzed: iti tasya samāsena pañca bhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
tatra kāryeṇa eva samutpannaḥ hetuḥ sama kālaḥ
yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpaḥ kavi tā abhiṣaṅgaḥ raṇa aṅgaṇe vīra guruḥ niṣaṅgāt

original: bāṇān samākarṣati śātakoṇān prāṇairarīṇāṃ samakālameva // Ckc_7.*15 //
analyzed: bāṇān samākarṣati śātakoṇān prāṇaiḥ arīṇām sama kālam eva

original: atra kāryapūrvakṣaṇa varti kāraṇamityetadullaṅdhya kāraṇabhūtasya bāṇākarṣaṇasya tatkāryabhūtasya vimataprāṇākarṣaṇasya ca samakālamevotpattikathanāt  #
analyzed: atra kārya pūrva kṣaṇa varti kāraṇam iti etat ullaṅdhya kāraṇa bhūtasya bāṇa ākarṣaṇasya tad kārya bhūtasya vimata prāṇa ākarṣaṇasya ca sama kālam eva utpatti kathanāt  /
sama kālaḥ nāma ayam gauṇa hetuḥ
kāryāt anantaram utpannaḥ hetuḥ viparyastaḥ
yathā
paścāt muñcati te śaṅgaḥ kośam śrī siṅga bhūpate

original: kośaṃ muñcanti paurastyāḥ purastādeva bhūbhujaḥ // Ckc_7.*16 //
analyzed: kośam muñcanti paurastyāḥ purastāt eva bhūbhujaḥ

original: atra pūrvadikpārthivabhāṇḍāgāratyāgalakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpatteranantaratvāt kāraṇabhūtasya nāyakakhaḍgamokṣasyotpattikathanādiyaṃ viparyasto  #
analyzed: atra pūrva diś pārthiva bhāṇḍāgāra tyāga lakṣaṇasya kāryasya utpatteḥ anantara tvāt kāraṇa bhūtasya nāyaka khaḍga mokṣasya utpatti kathanāt iyam viparyastaḥ
nāma citrahetuḥ
yukta kārya kārī hetuḥ yuktaḥ
tad viparītaḥ henuḥ ayuktaḥ
tau yathā
kṛpāṇa bhogī tava siṅga bhūpate karotu ari prāṇa samīra pāraṇām
bhavat pratāpa ātapa vaibhavāt katham virodhinām śoka tamisram edhate

original: atra prathamārdhe yatsarpāṇāmucitaṃ pavanapāraṇakāryaṃ tadeva kṛtamityayaṃ yukto nāma gauṇahetuḥ /
analyzed: atra prathama ardhe yat sarpāṇām ucitam pavana pāraṇa kāryam tat eva kṛtam iti ayam yuktaḥ nāma gauṇa hetuḥ

original: uttarārdhe tejaso yaduktaṃ tamovardhanaṃ tadevakṛtamityatyukto 'yaṃ gauṇahetuḥ /
analyzed: uttara ardhe tejasaḥ yat uktam tamaḥ vardhanam tat eva kṛtam iti ati uktaḥ yam gauṇa hetuḥ
adhikaraṇa hetuḥ asaṅgataḥ
yathā

original: bhūbhārastava dakṣa bāhuśikhare mūdhrnā natāḥ pārthivāḥ prāgalbhyaṃ tvayi siṅgabhūvara paraṃ vītatrapā vairiṇaḥ /
analyzed: bhū bhāraḥ tava dakṣa bāhu śikhare mūdhrnā natāḥ pārthivāḥ prāgalbhyam tvayi siṅgabhūvara param vīta trapāḥ vairiṇaḥ

original: aunnatyaṃ tvayi garvitāḥ pratibhaṭa vyāptāntarikṣāntarāś citraṃ kāraṇamekataḥ parigataḥ kāryodayastvanyataḥ // Ckc_7.*18 //
analyzed: aunnatyam tvayi garvitāḥ pratibhaṭa vyāpta antarikṣa antarāḥ citram kāraṇam ekatas parigataḥ kārya udayaḥ tu anyatas

original: atra nāyakagatānāṃ bhūbharaṇādikāraṇānāṃ pratināyakagatānāṃ namratvādikāryāṇāṃ vaiyadhikaraṇyenāsaṃbaddhatvādasaṅgato nāmāyaṃ gauṇahetuḥ /
analyzed: atra nāyaka gatānām bhū bharaṇa ādi kāraṇānām pratināyaka gatānām namra tva ādi kāryāṇām vaiyadhikaraṇyena asaṃbaddha tvāt asaṅgataḥ nāma ayam gauṇa hetuḥ
iti hetu vikalpānām darśitā gatiḥ īdṛśī
abhāva hetavaḥ pi evam khayam ūhyāḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
vastu svabhāvāt anyena hetunā vā parāhataḥ

original: notpādayati yaḥ kāryaṃ so 'heturiti gīyate // Ckc_7.12 //
analyzed: na utpādayati yaḥ kāryam saḥ hetuḥ iti gīyate
vastu svabhāva parāhataḥ hetuḥ yathā

original: rūkṣāhaṃkṛtayo na santi lalite bhedaṃ gate na bhruvau dṛkkoṇo 'pi na rāgameti hasitaṃ mandaṃ ca nāntarhitam /
analyzed: rūkṣa ahaṃkṛtayaḥ na santi lalite bhedam gate na bhruvau na rāgam eti hasitam mandam ca na antarhitam

original: dṛṣṭvāpi pratigarjatāṃ kṣitibhujāṃ saṃraṃbhagarbhakriyā mūrtirdāruṇaceṣṭayāpyavikṛtā śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate // Ckc_7.*19 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā api pratigarjatām kṣitibhujām saṃraṃbha garbha kriyāḥ mūrtiḥ dāruṇa ceṣṭayā api avikṛtā śrī siṅga pṛthvīpate
atra ati saṃraṃbha pratināyaka ceṣṭā vikaraṇa samarthasya api

original: nāyaka mūrtisvabhāvaprabhāvaparāhatā huṃkārādikāluṣyarūpaṃ kāryaṃ notpādayatīti so 'yaṃ tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: nāyaka mūrti svabhāva prabhāva parāhatā huṃkāra ādi kāluṣya rūpam kāryam na utpādayati iti saḥ yam tathā uktaḥ
dvitīyaḥ yathā

original: dossāraṃ samareṣu siṅganṛpateḥ prāyeṇa jānannapi kṣmāpāleṣu bhavādṛśeṣvapi cirāt tatpādasaṃseviṣu /
analyzed: dossāram samareṣu siṅga nṛpateḥ prāyeṇa jānan api kṣmāpāleṣu bhavādṛśeṣu api cirāt tad pāda saṃseviṣu

original: śruṇvannāptajanoddhatāṃ giramapi prāṇeśa dhīmān bhavān tatsevāṃ na cikīrṣatīti yadidaṃ tahaiva duśceṣṭitāt // Ckc_7.*20 //
analyzed: śruṇvan āpta jana uddhatām giram api prāṇeśa dhīmān bhavān tad sevām na cikīrṣati iti yat idam duśceṣṭitāt

original: atra nāyakadossārajñānādikāraṇānāṃ pratināyakagirā lakṣaṇakāryakaraṇasāmarthye 'pi bhavitavyatāparāhataśaktitvakathanāt kāraṇāntaraparāhato  #
analyzed: atra nāyaka dossāra jñāna ādi kāraṇānām pratināyaka girā lakṣaṇa kārya karaṇa sāmarthye pi bhavitavyatā parāhata śakti tva kathanāt kāraṇa antara parāhataḥ
yama hetuḥ

original: nirūḍhe sāhitye sarasahṛdayānandasadane vadānye śrīsiṅgakṣitipatilake tiṣṭhati puraḥ /
analyzed: nirūḍhe sāhitye sarasa hṛdaya ānanda sadane vadānye śrī siṅga kṣitipa tilake tiṣṭhati puras

original: kṛtārthaḥ sarvārthe bhavati bhuvi yaḥ kaścana na cel lalāṭe durlaṃghā duritalipirasyaiva mahatī // Ckc_7.*21 //
analyzed: kṛtārthaḥ sarva arthe bhavati bhuvi yaḥ kaścana na ced lalāṭe durlaṃghā durita lipiḥ asya eva mahatī

original: atra vidyāpakṣapātavrata nāyakaudāryasya sakalārthi kṛtārthīkaraṇasāmarthye 'pi yatra
analyzed: atra vidyā pakṣapāta vrata nāyaka audāryasya sakala arthi kṛtārthīkaraṇa sāmarthye yatra
kutra cit kāryasya anutpādaka tve tad arthi lālāṭika durlipi parāhata tva kathanāt anya parāhataḥ yama hetuḥ
yaḥ tu kāraṇa mālā iti hetu santānaḥ ucyate
pṛthak pṛthak asāmarythāt saḥ pi ahetuḥ mataḥ mama
yathā

original: prājñaiḥ prāktanavāsanāparikarairvidvajjavopāsanaṃ tenāpi pratibhā tathā madhurayā sāhityasākṣātkriyā /
analyzed: prājñaiḥ prāktana vāsanā parikaraiḥ vidvas java upāsanam tena api pratibhā tathā madhurayā sāhitya sākṣātkriyā

original: tatproḍhīranavotasiṅganṛpatessmerāḥ kaṭābhakramāḥ te lakṣmīradhikāṃ tathā kṛtadhiyāṃ siddhyet trivargodayaḥ // Ckc_7.*22 //
analyzed: kaṭābha kramāḥ te lakṣmīḥ adhikām tathā kṛta dhiyām siddhyet trivarga udayaḥ

original: atra vidvajjanopāsanādīnāmuttarottarahetubhūtānāmapi trivargodaye pūrvapūrvavyapekṣayā samucitanāmeva kāraṇatvamiti pṛthak pṛthagasāmarthyāt  #
analyzed: atra vidvas jana upāsana ādīnām uttarottara hetu bhūtānām api trivarga udaye pūrva pūrva vyapekṣayā samucita nām eva kāraṇa tvam iti pṛthak pṛthak asāmarthyāt
kāraṇam ālāpya hetuḥ eva
sūkṣmam vidagdha lakṣya arthaḥ dvidhā ākāra iṅgita kramāt
yathā
keyūra ratnam upalālayatā nṛpeṇa yat prārthitam nija sakhī jana sannidhāne

original: śyāmā payodharayuge paramādareṇa tasyottaraṃ kṛtavatī pulakaprarohān // Ckc_7.*23 //
analyzed: śyāmā payodhara yuge parama ādareṇa tasya uttaram kṛtavatī pulaka prarohān
atra keyūra nāyaka ratna saṃkrānta nāyikā pratibimba payodhara upalālana karaṇam iṅgitam

original: tena nāyakasya manoratho vidagdhayā nāyikayā lakṣyate sma /
analyzed: tena nāyakasya manorathaḥ vidagdhayā nāyikayā lakṣyate sma
nāyikāyāḥ ca romāñcaḥ ākāraḥ

original: tenāṅgīkaraṇarūpā svābhilaṣitacikīrṣā nāyikāyā vidagdhena nāyakena jñāyata itīdamubhayavidhaṃ sūkṣamam /
analyzed: tena aṅgīkaraṇa rūpā sva abhilaṣita cikīrṣā nāyikāyāḥ vidagdhena nāyakena jñāyate iti idam ubhayavidham sūkṣamam
tad uttaram mahā utkarṣaḥ yaḥ ṛthānām uttarottaram
yathā

original: jambūdvīpe lasati nitarāmandhradeśo viśeṣaḥ śreyastasmin bhavati nagaraṃ rājaśailābhidhānam /
analyzed: jambūdvīpe lasati nitarām andhra deśaḥ viśeṣaḥ śreyaḥ tasmin bhavati nagaram rājaśaila abhidhānam

original: tatrotkarṣaṃ kalayati sabhā siṅgabhūpālamaule- ssārātsāraṃ vacanaracanaṃ tatra tasyāpi rājñaḥ // Ckc_7.*24 //
analyzed: tatra utkarṣam kalayati sabhā siṅga bhūpāla maule ssārāt sāram vacana racanam tatra tasya api rājñaḥ
atra āndhra deśa ādīnām uttarottara krameṇa sāra tva abhidhānāt uttaram idam
padārthānām parasparam asaṃhatiḥ
asaṅga ta pratyanīka viṣama adhīra bhedavān
saḥ yam dvidhā bhedataḥ

original: tācviko 'pi dvidhā śuddho grathitaśceti gīyate // Ckc_7.17 //
analyzed: tācvikaḥ dvidhā śuddhaḥ grathitaḥ ca iti gīyate
atra śuddhaḥ tācvika virodhaḥ yathā

original: dhanapradānaṃ dvaviṇārjanaṃ ca sāmrājyakṣmīrbhuvi bhāratī ca /
analyzed: dhana pradānam ca sāmrājī akṣmīḥ bhuvi bhāratī ca

original: dhīvṛddhasevā navayauvanaṃ ca śrīsiṅgabhūpe vilasanti nityam // Ckc_7.*25 //
analyzed: dhī vṛddha sevāḥ nava yauvanam ca śrī siṅga bhūpe vilasanti nityam

original: atra dhanapradānārjanayoḥ takṣmīsarasvatyoḥ vṛddhasevānavayauvanayośca virodhastācviko viviktaśceti yathoktaḥ /
analyzed: atra dhana pradāna arjanayoḥ takṣmī sarasvatyoḥ vṛddha sevā nava yauvanayoḥ ca virodhaḥ tācvikaḥ viviktaḥ ca iti yathā uktaḥ
grathitaḥ tācvika virodhaḥ yathā

original: kiṃ nirdveṣakathasya daityahananaṃ tatrāpi kiṃ nidrayā nidrālorurasi striyā kimatha sā nissaṃbhavā syātkatham /
analyzed: kim nirdveṣa kathasya daitya hananam tatra api kim nidrayā nidrāloḥ urasi striyā kim atha sā nissaṃbhavā syāt katham

original: daityāreriti tatpurāṇasamaye goṣṭhīṣu vidvajjana- prauḍhokttīrniśamayya siṅganṛpatiḥ smerānano jāyate // Ckc_7.*26 //
analyzed: daityāreḥ iti tad purāṇa samaye goṣṭhīṣu vidvas jana prauḍha ukttīḥ niśamayya siṅga nṛpatiḥ smera ānanaḥ jāyate
atra virodhasya uttara uttara grathanena grathitaḥ nāma ayam
yatra śleṣa ādi sāmarthyāt virodhaḥ ca avabhāsate
pratīti mātra cāru tvam ābhāsaḥ yam dvidhā ucyate
brūmahe siṅga bhūpālam vayam saujanya paṇḍitam

original: kāmaṃ vadati vīrāliḥ tamasaujanya paṇḍitam // Ckc_7.*27 //
analyzed: kāmam vadati vīra aliḥ paṇḍitam
atra rājanya saujanya yoga rūpaḥ virodhaḥ śabda śloṣa mātreṇa pratīyate
tacvataḥ tu vīra paṅktiḥ asaujanya paṇḍitam raṇa kuśalam vadati iti parihāraḥ
saḥ eva grathitaḥ yathā

original: rājñaste gurutā kathaṃ bada guroḥ padmāttatā syātkatham padmāttasya ca jiṣṇutā kathamaho jiṣṇoḥ kathaṃ saumyatā /
analyzed: rājñaḥ te guru tā katham bada guroḥ padmātta tā syāt katham padmāttasya ca jiṣṇu tā katham aho jiṣṇoḥ katham saumya tā

original: saumyasya kṣitinandanatvamucitaṃ loke kathaṃ bhūpateḥ śrīsiṅgakṣitinandantvamapi tallakṣṇīśvarollāsitam // Ckc_7.*28 //
analyzed: saumyasya kṣitinandana tvam ucitam loke katham bhūpateḥ śrī siṅga kṣitinandan tvam api tat lakṣṇīśvara ullāsitam
atra uttarottara saṃkalanayā grathitasya śleṣa mūla tvāt ābhāsa tvam spaṣṭam eva

original: kiṃ bhūpatitvaṃ kutaḥ śrīsiṅgakṣitinandanasya tadidaṃ lakṣmīśvarollāsitamiti /
analyzed: kim bhūpati tvam kutas śrī siṅga kṣiti nandanasya tat idam lakṣmīśvara ullāsitam iti
jāti ādi asaṅgateḥ bhedāḥ bahavaḥ hi anayoḥ matāḥ
tatra jāteḥ jāti kriyā guṇa dravyaiḥ yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpāla manaḥ pi bhūbhṛt

original: khyāto 'si bhogījanavatsalo 'pi bhūmau suparvo 'pi ca sārvabhaumaḥ // Ckc_7.*29 //
analyzed: khyātaḥ si bhogī jana vatsalaḥ pi bhūmau ca sārvabhaumaḥ

original: atra prathame pāde meghaparvatajātyoḥ dvitīye padmākarapaṅkaśoṣaṇakriyayoḥ tṛtīye
analyzed: atra prathame pāde megha parvata jātyoḥ dvitīye padma ākara paṅka śoṣaṇa kriyayoḥ tṛtīye
caturthe deva jāteḥ diggaja lakṣaṇasya
dravyasya ca asaṃhatiḥ iti catvāraḥ jāti virodhāḥ
kriyāyāḥ kriyā guṇa dravya virodhaḥ

original: yathā kaviprītiṃ kurvan tirayasi kaviṃ nītinigame tava prajñā tīkṣṇā racayati na bhedaṃ kṛtadhiyām /
analyzed: yathā kavi prītim kurvan tirayasi kavim nīti nigame tava prajñā tīkṣṇā racayati na bhedam kṛta dhiyām

original: kalānātho 'pi tvaṃ tyajasi nanu nabhatrapadavīṃ vicitraṃ śrīsiṅgakṣitivara caritraṃ tava param // Ckc_7.*30 //
analyzed: tvam tyajasi nanu nabhatra padavīm vicitram śrī siṅga kṣiti vara caritram tava param

original: atra kaviprītikaraṇa kavitiraskaraṇakriyayoḥ prathamapāde dvitīye tīkṣṇatvaguṇabhedakriyayoḥ
analyzed: atra kavi prīti karaṇa kavi tiraskaraṇa kriyayoḥ prathama pāde dvitīye tīkṣṇa tva guṇa bheda kriyayoḥ
tṛtīye kalānātha nāmnaḥ candra lakṣaṇa dravyasya nakṣatra mārga tyajane kriyāyāḥ ca saṅgatiḥ iti
trayaḥ kriyā virodhāḥ
guṇasya guṇa dravyābhyām virodhe dvau bhedau
tatra guṇayoḥ virodhaḥ yathā
śrī siṅgabhūpa nā api

original: dākṣiṇyamuttaratvaṃ bhavati tu nirṛtyapekṣayā bhavati // Ckc_7.*31 //
analyzed: dākṣiṇyam uttara tvam bhavati tu nirṛti apekṣayā bhavati
atra dakṣiṇa tva uttara tvayoḥ dvayoḥ guṇayoḥ virodhaḥ
guṇa dravyayoḥ yathā
citram śrī siṅga bhūpāla tāvakaiḥ arjunaiḥ api
bhūyate yaśasām bṛndaiḥ mitra nandana vatsalaiḥ
atra arjuna lakṣaṇa dravyasya karṇa vātsalya guṇasya virodhaḥ

original: dravyasya dravyeṇa virodhe eka eva bhedaḥ /
analyzed: dravyasya dravyeṇa virodhe ekaḥ eva bhedaḥ
yathā
rāja adri rāja dātuvyām dhānyām
madhurāyām api sadā viśālāyām

original: śrī siṅganṛpo dharaṇīṃ māṃdhātāpi praśāsti kṛtavīryaḥ // Ckc_7.*33 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga nṛpaḥ dharaṇīm māṃdhātā api praśāsti kṛta vīryaḥ

original: atra prathamārdhe madhurāyā viśalānagaratvaṃ dvitīye māṃdhātuḥ kṛtavīryatvamiti dravyavirodhaḥ /
analyzed: atra prathama ardhe madhurāyāḥ viśalā nagara tvam dvitīye māṃdhātuḥ kṛtavīrya tvam iti dravya virodhaḥ
iti ābhāsa virodhasya daśa bhedāḥ nirūpitāḥ

original: evaṃ tācvika bhedāstu khayamūhyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // Ckc_7.20 //
analyzed: evam tācvika bhedāḥ tu khayam ūhyāḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
virodha bhedeṣu asaṅgataḥ yathā
virājate madhyama loka bhāgyam rāja acale kaścana rāja siṃhaḥ
yad prānta dṛpta āptavatām vilīnaḥ māda atirekā ripu mañjarīṇām

original: atra siṃhāntikamāptānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ madaśoṣo nasaṃgacchata ityasaṃgato nāmāyaṃ virodhabhedaḥ /
analyzed: atra siṃha antikam āptānām kuñjarāṇām mada śoṣaḥ na saṃgacchate iti asaṃgataḥ nāma ayam virodha bhedaḥ
pratyanīkam yathā
śrotum raṃbhā racanām nirbhara ānanda garbhām
prāsādeṣu pratidiśa taṭinīm vīkṣitum jāla mārgeḥ

original: citraṃ siṅgakṣitipa bhavataḥ khaḍgadhārā nimagnā nidrāmudrāṃ niravadhikathāmāśrayanti dviṣantaḥ // Ckc_7.*35 //
analyzed: citram siṅga kṣitipa bhavataḥ khaḍga dhārāḥ nimagnāḥ nidrā mudrām niravadhi kathām āśrayanti dviṣantaḥ

original: atra vacanaśravaṇanirīkṣaṇārthināṃ niravadhinidrāśrayaṇaṃ pratikūlatvenāsaṅgatamiti pratyanīkamapi virodha eva /
analyzed: atra vacana śravaṇa nirīkṣaṇa arthinām niravadhi nidrā āśrayaṇam pratikūla tvena asaṅgatam iti pratyanīkam api virodhaḥ eva
viṣamam yathā

original: diśāṃ dukūlaṃ hasitaṃ jayaśriyā yaśo vilāsastava siṅgabhūpate /
analyzed: diśām dukūlam hasitam jaya śriyā yaśaḥ vilāsaḥ tava siṅga bhūpate

original: svabhāvaśuddho 'pi muśe virodhināṃ karoti mālinyataraṅgitāṃ diśām // Ckc_7.*36 //
analyzed: svabhāva śuddhaḥ pi virodhinām karoti mālinya taraṅgi tām diśām

original: atra dhavalasya yaśaso virodhimukheṣu yadatimālinyakaraṇaṃ tasya ca yādṛśo 'pyupajāyate tādṛgeva tadbhavatīti prasiddhivaiṣamyāt parasparāsaṅgaterayaṃ  #
analyzed: atra dhavalasya yaśasaḥ virodhi mukheṣu yat ati mālinya karaṇam tasya ca upajāyate tādṛś eva tat bhavati iti prasiddhi vaiṣamyāt paraspara asaṅgateḥ ayam
viṣamam nāma virodhaḥ

original: athavā diṅmukheṣu viśadīkaraṇaṃ virodhimukheṣu malinīkaraṇañca samavartanaprakāro na bhavatīti vaiṣamyādviṣam virodhaḥ /
analyzed: athavā diṅmukheṣu viśadīkaraṇam virodhi mukheṣu malinīkaraṇam ca sama vartana prakāraḥ na bhavati iti vaiṣamyāt viṣam virodhaḥ
adhikam yathā

original: śrī siṅgakṣitipo vahanniśitadhī rākarṇakṛṣṭaṃ dhanuḥ pratyaśvaṃ pratikuñjaraṃ pratinaraṃ muñcannamoghān śarān /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipaḥ vahat niśita dhīḥ rākarṇa kṛṣṭam dhanuḥ prati aśvam prati kuñjaram prati naram muñcan amoghān śarān

original: yāvanti dviṣatāṃ balāni balavatyāścaryameko 'pyasau tāvadvā samameva tairabhimukhairadhyakṣamālabhyate // Ckc_7.*37 //
analyzed: yāvanti dviṣatām balāni balavatī āścaryam ekaḥ pi asau tāvat vā samam eva taiḥ abhimukhaiḥ adhyakṣam ālabhyate

original: atraikasyāpi nāyakasyānekairapi sainyai ranekadhā dṛśyamānatve naikatvasaṃkhyāviruddhasaṃkhyādhikyaṃ pratīyata ityadhikaṃ nāma virodhabhedaḥ
analyzed: atra ekasya api nāyakasya anekaiḥ api sainyaiḥ anekadhā dṛśyamāna tve na ekatva saṃkhyā viruddha saṃkhyā ādhikyam pratīyate iti adhikam nāma virodha bhedaḥ
prabhūta kāraṇa ālokāt yatra saṃbhāvyate vidhiḥ

original: niṣedho vā viśeṣajñaissa saṃbhava itīritaḥ // Ckc_7.21 //
analyzed: niṣedhaḥ vā viśeṣa jñaiḥ sa saṃbhavaḥ iti īritaḥ
atra vidhi saṃbhavaḥ yathā
raicarlīya kṣiti vara bhavat ghora nāsīra ghoṭī koṭī kṣuṇṇa kṣiti tala rajasi āvṛta āśā avakāśe

original: syātsaṃbhāvyaṃ tanuyavanikāthannadīpopamānaṃ paryantodyatparivṛḍha śikhā padmarāgopalānāma // Ckc_7.*38 //
analyzed: syāt saṃbhāvyam tanu yavanikā athanna dīpa upamānam paryanta udyat parivṛḍha śikhā padmarāga upalā nāma

original: atraivaṃvidhe rajasi sāmantaśikhāmaṇīnāṃ tādṛśī daśā saṃbhāvyeti vidhessaṃbhāvyamānatvādayaṃ vidhisaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: atrā evaṃvidhe rajasi sāmanta śikhāmaṇīnām tādṛśī daśā saṃbhāvyā iti vidheḥ saṃbhāvyamāna tvāt ayam vidhi saṃbhavaḥ
niṣedha saṃbhavaḥ yathā

original: somollāsini pāraśīkanṛpatau saṃdhānusaṃdhāyake kanyāratnasamarpaṇād gajapatau saṃbandhagandhaspṛśi /
analyzed: soma ullāsini pāraśīka nṛpatau saṃdhā anusaṃdhāyake kanyā ratna samarpaṇāt gaja patau saṃbandha gandha spṛśi

original: raicarlānvayaśārṅiṇaṃ narapatiṃ draṣṭuṃ raṇe sāhasaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ na hi gautamīparisarakṣudrakṣamābhṛdgaṇe // Ckc_7.*39 //
analyzed: raicarla anvaya śārṅiṇam narapatim draṣṭum raṇe sāhasam saṃbhāvyam na hi gautamī parisara kṣudra kṣamā bhṛt gaṇe
evaṃvidha nāyaka saṃraṃbha sahana sāhasam kṣudra kṣatriyeṣu na saṃbhāvyam iti niṣedhāt niṣedha saṃbhavaḥ

original: anyonyaṃ pratīkāro yastadanyonyaṃ mataṃ mama // Ckc_7.22 //
analyzed: anyonyam pratīkāraḥ yaḥ tat anyonyam matam mama
yathā
nirvāta staṃbhita orva dharaṇi sura kara spaśam pūtaiḥ su śīlaiḥ tvad dāna ambu pravāhaiḥ sahi mahima nidhe siṅga bhūpāla maule

original: bhāṇḍāgārānyanarghairanudinamavate pūrayatyaiṣa ratnair ityanyonyopakāraprasṛmaravibhavau tvaṃ ca vārāṃ nidhiśca // Ckc_7.*40 //
analyzed: bhāṇḍa āgārāni anarghaiḥ anudinam avate pūrayati ā eṣa ratnaiḥ iti anyonya upakāra prasṛmara vibhavau tvam ca vārām nidhiḥ ca
atra nāyaka nadīnāyakayoḥ dāna ambu pravāha praśasta ratna samudāyābhyām anyonya upakāraka bhāvāt anyonyam idam
ekatā cūlikā bhrāntiḥ anyonyasya eva bhūmikāḥ
atra anyonya ekatā yathā
uddaṇḍīkṛta puṇḍarīka paṭala spaṣṭa prakāśam yaśaḥ cañcat campaka mitra rucira ākāraḥ pratāpaḥ ca te

original: pratyathikṣitipālamandirabhuvi śrīsiṅgabhūpojjvalā- nyanyonya dyutimelanena bhavatarḥ sakīrṇavarṇā iva // Ckc_7.*41 //
analyzed: pratyathi kṣitipāla mandira bhuvi śrī siṅga bhūpa ujjvalāḥ dyuti melanena sa kīrṇa varṇāḥ iva

original: atra kīrtipratāpayor anyonyaṃ vikāryavikā rakabhāvāt pratīkārapratīteranyonyaikyatāpyanyonya eva /
analyzed: atra kīrti pratāpayoḥ anyonyam vikārya vikā raka bhāvāt pratīkāra pratīteḥ anyonya aikyatā api anyonye eva
anyonya cūlikā yathā

original: vidyāśriyā rājati vidyayā śrīḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpo vacasā śriyā ca /
analyzed: vidyā śriyā rājati vidyayā śrīḥ śrī siṅga bhūpaḥ vacasā śriyā ca

original: nayo 'pi sattvena nayena sattvaṃ nayena sattvena yathā sa eva // Ckc_7.*42 //
analyzed: sattvena nayena sattvam nayena sattvena yathā saḥ eva

original: atra vidyāśriyorvirājane parasparamupakāryopakārakatayā vartamānayordvayornāyakavirājamānakriyāyā apakārakatvaṃ yat seyaṃ cūlikopari vardhata  #
analyzed: atra vidyā śriyoḥ virājane parasparam upakārya upakāraka tayā vartamānayoḥ dvayoḥ nāyaka virājamāna kriyāyāḥ apakāraka tvam yat sā iyam cūlikā upari vardhata
iti anyonya cūlikā iyam anyonya bhedaḥ eva
anyonya bhrāntiḥ yathā

original: līyante gahatnāntareṣu śanakairānmaikṣaṇāśaṅkino bhūpālān bhavadīya sainikadhiyā vīkṣyādhvagān vairiṇaḥ /
analyzed: līyante gahatna antareṣu śanakais ānmaikṣaṇa āśaṅkinaḥ bhūpālān bhavadīya sainika dhiyā vīkṣya adhvagān vairiṇaḥ

original: tānālokya malimlucā iti dhiyā pārśvadvayālokinaḥ sannaddhāstvaritaṃ prayānti pathikāḥ śrī siṅgapṛthvīpate // Ckc_7.*43 //
analyzed: tān ālokya malimlucāḥ iti dhiyā pārśva dvaya ālokinaḥ sannaddhāḥ tvaritam prayānti pathikāḥ śrī siṅga pṛthvīpate

original: atra kāntārasañcāriṇāṃ nāyakavirodhināṃ pathikānāṃ parasparamuddeśyoddeśakatābhāvāt pratīkārapratīteranyonyabhrāntiranyonyabheda eva /
analyzed: atra kāntāra sañcāriṇām nāyaka virodhinām pathikānām parasparam uddeśya uddeśaka tā bhāvāt pratīkāra pratīteḥ anyonya bhrāntiḥ anyonya bhedaḥ eva

original: vyatyayo vastunonyastu yo vā vinimayo mithaḥ /
analyzed: vyatyayaḥ vastunaḥ nyaḥ tu yaḥ vā vinimayaḥ mithas

original: parivṛttiriyaṃ proktā mukhyā gauṇīti sā dvidhā // Ckc_7.24 //
analyzed: parivṛttiḥ iyam proktā mukhyā gauṇī iti sā dvidhā
vyatyayavatī mukhyā yathā

original: sujanamayati lakṣṇīrdurjanānujjhati śrīḥ vrajati layamadharmo vardhate dharmamārgaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣṇīḥ durjana anujjhati śrīḥ vrajati layam adharmaḥ vardhate dharma mārgaḥ
avitari maṇigarbhām acyutasya avatāre śrita budha paricarye siṅga bhūpāla varye
atra nāyaka rājye su jana durjanayoḥ lakṣmī parivṛttiḥ

original: dharmādharmayorlayaparivṛttiśca mukhyata eva pratīṃyata iti vyatyavatī mukhyā nāma parivṛttiriyam /
analyzed: dharma adharmayoḥ laya parivṛttiḥ ca mukhyatas eva iti vyatyavatī mukhyā nāma parivṛttiḥ iyam
vyatyayavatī gauṇī yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpa yaśasā yat

original: bhavati hi tadeva lakṣyaṃ vimatakṣitipālavadanakamaleṣu // Ckc_7.*45 //
analyzed: bhavati hi tat eva lakṣyam vimata kṣitipāla vadana kamaleṣu

original: atra nāyakayaśasāpākṛtasya candrakalaṅkasya virodhinaranāthavadaneṣu lakṣyamāṇatvaṃ tadidamanupapadyamānatayā na mukhyamiti gauṇīyaṃ vyatyayavatī  #
analyzed: atra nāyaka yaśasā apākṛtasya candra kalaṅkasya virodhi naranātha vadaneṣu lakṣyamāṇa tvam tat idam anupapadyamāna tayā na mukhyam iti gauṇī iyam vyatyayavatī  /
parivṛttiḥ
mukhyāḥ vinimayāḥ yathā

original: śrī siṅgakṣitipālajaitrapaṭahadhvānānu sandhāyino dhāvanto nijarūpagopanakṛte pratyarthipṛthvībhujaḥ /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipāla jaitra paṭaha dhvāna anu sandhāyinaḥ dhāvantaḥ nija rūpa gopana kṛte pratyarthi pṛthvībhujaḥ

original: dattvā vyādhakulāya maṇḍanabharaṃ keyūrahārādikaṃ guñjābījavibhūṣaṇāni vinayātkrīṇanti hīnānyapi // Ckc_7.*46 //
analyzed: dattvā vyādha kulāya maṇḍana bharam keyūra hāra ādikam guñjā bīja vibhūṣaṇāni vinayāt krīṇanti hīnāni api

original: atra maṇiguñjāvibhūṣaṇayorvinimayayoḥ mukhyatayaiva saṃbhavatīti vinimayavatīyaṃ mukhyā nāma parivṛttiḥ /
analyzed: atra maṇi guñjā vibhūṣaṇayoḥ vinimayayoḥ mukhya tayā eva saṃbhavati iti vinimayavatī iyam mukhyā nāma parivṛttiḥ
sā eva gauṇī yathā
vakretara abhivyavahāra dakṣā śrī siṅga bhūpāla tava asi dhārā
pradāya kampam ripu bhūpatīnām sapta aṅga rājya śriyam ādadati

original: atra nāyakakhaḍge ripubhūpatīṃnāṃ svakampapradānaṃ tebhyaḥ saptāṅgarājyaśriyāmādānaṃ ca mukhyā vṛttyā na saṃbhavatīti gauṇavinimayā nāma parivṛttiḥ
analyzed: atra nāyaka khaḍge ripu bhūpatīṃnām sva kampa pradānam tebhyaḥ sapta aṅga rājya śriyām ādānam ca mukhyā vṛttyā na saṃbhavati iti gauṇavinimayā nāma parivṛttiḥ

original: dṛṣṭāntaḥ proktasiddhayai yaḥ siddher'the sā nidarśanā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntaḥ prokta siddhayai yaḥ siddhā arthe sā nidarśanā
pūrva uttara sama tvena tridhā iyam manyate budhaiḥ
tatra pūrvā nidarśanā yathā
param kurvanti pāruṣyam durjanāḥ rāja vallabhāḥ
śrī siṅga bhūpa khaḍgaḥ yam para marma eva kṛntati

original: atra rājavallabhakrūrajanadṛṣṭāntasya pūrvamuktatvāt pūrvā nāma nidarśanā /
analyzed: atra rāja vallabha krūra jana dṛṣṭāntasya pūrvam ukta tvāt pūrvā nāma nidarśanā
uttarā yathā
śrī siṅgabhūpa cāpam vidadhāti virodhi jīva droham
namatām api vakrāṇām para santāpāya rāja karṇa āsaktiḥ
atra rāja samīpa varti kuṭila jana vṛttāntasya paścāt ukta tvāt uttarā iyam nidarśanā
samāḥ yathā
medinyām gagana aṅganā aṅgananataḥ mandākinī veṇikām veṇītaḥ jala jāta saṃbhava sabhā saugandham ārohati

original: śrī siṅgakṣitipālakīrtilatikā tatsaṃśrayāṇāṃ nṛṇāṃ śaṃsatyadbhatamuttarottaratayā jātānubandhodayām // Ckc_7.*50 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipāla kīrti latikā tad saṃśrayāṇām nṛṇām
atra nāyaka parigraheṇa uttarottara udayavataḥ kīrti dṛṣṭāntasya nāyaka āśrita jana uttarottara aunnatya lakṣaṇa dārṣṭāntikasya

original: ca śaṃsantīti vartamānalakṣaṇaśatra samakālamevoktatvādiyaṃ samā nāma nidarśanā /
analyzed: ca śaṃsanti iti sama kālam eva ukta tvāt iyam samā nāma nidarśanā

original: kathite vā pratīte vā sādṛśye vastunor dvayoḥ /
analyzed: kathite vā pratīte vā sādṛśye vastunoḥ dvayoḥ
bheda abhidhānam bhedaḥ syāt ādi vatirekaḥ ca saṃsmṛtaḥ
sādṛśya sva jātīya vyatirekaḥ yathā

original: śrī siṅgabhūmipatinā na tulāṃ prayānti viśrāṇanakratubhuvo 'pi pare narendrāḥ /
analyzed: śrī siṅgabhūmi patinā na tulām prayānti pare narendrāḥ

original: nandanti tehi viduṣāṃ kavitāvilāsaiḥ so 'yaṃ pratinandayati ca prakāmam // Ckc_7.*51 //
analyzed: nandanti te hi viduṣām kavi tā vilāsaiḥ saḥ yam pratinandayati ca prakāmam

original: atra nāyakasya sajātīyaiḥ narendraissaha vitaraṇe sādṛśyamabhidhāya pratiprīṇanahetubhūtakavitāvilāsaviśeṣakathanādayaṃ yathektaḥ /
analyzed: atra nāyakasya sajātīyaiḥ narendraiḥ saha vitaraṇe sādṛśyam abhidhāya pratiprīṇana hetu bhūta kavi tā vilāsa viśeṣa kathanāt ayam yathā iktaḥ
saḥ eva pratīta sādṛśye yathā

original: śrī siṅgabhūpa bhavadīyaparigraheṇa dharmāya yadbalavate kavireṣa bhītaḥ /
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpa bhavadīya parigraheṇa dharmāya yat balavate kaviḥ eṣa bhītaḥ

original: krītādibandhumuṣitā ca dadāti bhāgau tatte tulāṃ na dadhate prathame narendrāḥ // Ckc_7.*52 //
analyzed: krīta ādi bandhu muṣitā ca dadāti bhāgau tat te tulām na dadhate prathame narendrāḥ
atra raka tvena
tretā dvāpara mahīnātha jāti sāmye pratīte nāyakasya tad rājya corita dhama bhāva pratyarpaṇa pārabhūta paripālana viśeṣa bheda kathanāt ayam pratīta sādṛśya sajātīya vyatirekaḥ
kathita sādṛśye sva vyakti vyatirekaḥ yathā

original: śrī siṅgabhūpāla bhavān doṣā bhāve bhavāniva /
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpāla bhavān doṣāḥ bhāve bhavān iva
śriyā apunar tvad anyaḥ tvam pratyaham

original: atra nāyakasya doṣābhāve svenaiva tulyatāmabhidhāya pratyahaṃ vardhamānayā turagādisaṃpadā svasyaiva svato pratidināpekṣayā viśeṣakathanādayaṃ  #
analyzed: atra nāyakasya doṣa abhāve svena eva tulya tām abhidhāya pratyaham vardhamānayā turaga ādi saṃpadā svasya eva prati dina apekṣayā viśeṣa kathanāt ayam
kathita sādṛśye sva vyakti vyatirekaḥ

original: yadi pratīyamānasādṛśye svavyaktivyatirekasyodāharaṇaṃ saṃbhavati cārutāṃ puṣṇāti vā tadapi nirūpaṇīyam /
analyzed: yadi pratīyamāna sādṛśye sva vyakti vyatirekasya udāharaṇam saṃbhavati cāru tām puṣṇāti vā tat api nirūpaṇīyam
kathita sādṛśthe eka vyatirekaḥ yathā
anudātā katham tulyaḥ tava jīmūtavāhanaḥ
atra karuṇā nidhi tvena kathita sādṛśyayoḥ nāyaka vidyādhara nāyakayoḥ uttaratra eva bhedaka dharma kathanāt ayam yathā uktaḥ
tatra eva ubhaya vyatirekaḥ yathā nāyakasya eva vaṃśāvalyām

original: saudaryo balabhadramūrtiraniśaṃ devī priyā rukmiṇī pradyumrastanayo 'pi pautranivaho yasyāniruddhādayaḥ /
analyzed: saudaryaḥ balabhadra mūrtiḥ aniśam devī priyā rukmiṇī pradyumraḥ tanayaḥ pi pautra nivahaḥ yasya aniruddha ādayaḥ

original: soyaṃ śrīpatirannavotanṛpatiḥ kiṃ tvānanāmbhoruhe dhatte cāru sudarśanaśriyamasau sarvātma hastāmbuje // Ckc_7.*55 //
analyzed: saḥ uyam śrīpatiḥ kim tu ānana ambhoruhe dhatte cāru sudarśana śriyam asau sarva ātma hasta ambuje
atra balabhadra saudarya tva ādibhiḥ abhihita sādṛśyayoḥ nāyaka rusmiṇī nāyakayoḥ sudarśana mukha tvam
sudarśana kara tvam ced ubhaya gata bhedaka dharma kathanāt ayam kathita sādṛśyaḥ ubhaya vyatirekaḥ
pratīta sādṛśye eka vyatirekaḥ yathā
mitram amitram kurvan arvāk aga dvija rājaka balana vyagraḥ
rāhuḥ katham upamānam śrī siṅga nṛpāla khaḍga dhārāyāḥ
atra vivaṇā tvena
pratīta sāmyayoḥ saihikeyaka kaukṣeyakayoḥ pūrvatra eva bhedaka dharma kathanāt ayam yathā uktaḥ
tatra eva ubhaya vyatirekaḥ yathā
atra jagat trāṇa dīkṣita tvena pratīyamāna sādṛśyayoḥ nārāyaṇa nāyakayoḥ ubhaya gata bhedaka dharma kathanāt ayam pratīyamāna sādṛśyaḥ ubhaya vyatirekaḥ
kathita sādṛśyena sadṛśa vyatirekaḥ yathā

original: ayaṃ śrī siṅgabhūpena rājate na tu vajriṇā // Ckc_7.*58 //
analyzed: ayam śrī siṅga bhūpena rājate na tu vajriṇā

original: atra kathitasāmyayoḥ śailayoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyābhyāmeva nāyakatridivanāyakābhyāṃ bhedakathanādayaṃ tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: atra kathita sāmyayoḥ śailayoḥ pratīyamāna sādṛśyābhyām eva nāyaka tridiva nāyakābhyām bheda kathanāt ayam tathā uktaḥ
tatra eva visadṛśa vyatirekaḥ yathā
digdantīnām siṅga mahīpateḥ ca samudbhavāt loka hitāya kāmam
mātaṅga tāyām api te mada andhāḥ vaṃśa unnatau api ayam asta garvaḥ

original: atra lokahitatvena dikkuñjarāṇāṃ nāyakakuñjarasya ca sāmyamabhidhāya sadṛśābhyomeva
analyzed: atra loka hita tvena diś kuñjarāṇām nāyaka kuñjarasya ca sāmyam abhidhāya
mātaṅga tva vaṃśa unnatibhyām mada andha tva nirgarva tvābhyām ca bheda kathanāt ayam kathita sādṛśyaḥ
visadṛśa vyatirekaḥ
pratīta sādṛśye sadṛśa vyatirekaḥ yathā
ratvaiḥ ayatna vimalaiḥ vibhāti payasām prabhuḥ
ayam śrī siṅga bhūpālaḥ guṇa enairmalya miśritaiḥ

original: atra gambhīratvādinā pratītasāmyayornāyakanadīnāyakayoḥ kathitasādṛśyai reva ratnairguṇaiśca bhedakathanādayaṃ tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: atra gambhīra tva ādinā pratīta sāmyayoḥ nāyaka nadīnāyakayoḥ kathita sādṛśyaiḥ ratnaiḥ guṇaiḥ ca bheda kathanāt ayam tathā uktaḥ
tatra eva visadṛśa vyatirekaḥ yathā

original: nidrālau śrutivarjite viṣamukhe vakrāṃ dadhāne satīṃ śeṣe nūnamapāyaśaṅkihṛdayā sthātuṃ samudveginīm /
analyzed: nidrālau śruti varjite viṣa mukhe vakrām dadhāne satīm śeṣe nūnam apāya śaṅki hṛdayā sthātum samudveginīm

original: nistandre viśadaśrutau suvadane vakretarādhvakrame śrī siṅgakṣitipālake vasumatī yāti pratiṣṭhā parām // Ckc_7.*61 //
analyzed: nistandre viśada śrutau su vadane vakretara adhva krame śrī siṅga kṣitipālake vasumatī yāti pratiṣṭhā parām
atra vidyā parijñāna mahībharaṇa ādinā apratīta sāmyayoḥ śeṣa nāyaka viśeṣayoḥ visadṛśa nidrālu nistandra tva ādi bhedaka dharma kathanāt ayam pratīyamāna sādṛśye
visadṛśa vyatirekaḥ
evam hi vyatirekasya bhedāḥ kecid nidarśitāḥ
anena eva pathā anyaḥ svayam ūhyāḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
kiñcid ārabhyamāṇena kāryam tad sahakāriṇaḥ
ākasmikasya saṃprāṣteḥ samāhitam iti īhitam
daivikam samāhitam yathā

original: śrī siṅgakṣitipālasainikabhiyā bhūbhṛdguhāgāhināṃ kāntāreṣu cikīṣaṃtā nijapadaprastārasaṃmārjanām /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipāla sainika bhiyā bhūbhṛt guhā gāhinām kāntāreṣu nija pada prastāra saṃmārjanām

original: nirvyūḍhā sahakāritā vidhivaśādasmākamākasmikaiḥ kulyākṣāsalitakandarā parisaraprāraṃbhamaṃbhodharaiḥ // Ckc_7.*62 //
analyzed: nirvyūḍhā sahakāri tā vidhi vaśāt asmākam ākasmikaiḥ kulyā akṣa āsalita kandarā parisara prāraṃbham aṃbhodharaiḥ

original: atra palāyamānamārgeṣu nijapadapaṅktimārjanacikīrṣūṇāṃ nāyakavirodhināmākasmikavarṣeṇa tatsuniṣpannamiti daivikaṃ samāhitam /
analyzed: atra palāyamāna mārgeṣu nija pada paṅkti mārjana cikīrṣūṇām nāyaka virodhinām ākasmika varṣeṇa tat su niṣpannam iti daivikam samāhitam
aḍhaivikam yathā
varṣa ādi prathama prabodha samaya ācāreṇa padmālayāḥ vyājāt anidrā tyajaḥ

original: daityārerupakārakāraṇatayā jāgarti jāgraddhiyā śrī siṅgasya vibho rdigantavijayaprasthānabherīdhvaniḥ // Ckc_7.*63 //
analyzed: daityāreḥ upakāra kāraṇa tayā jāgarti jāgrat dhiyā śrī siṅgasya vibhoḥ diś anta vijaya prasthāna bherī dhvaniḥ

original: atra nidrāvyājena lakṣmīgāḍhāliṅganasya śaithilyaṃ cikīrṣatā bhagavatā lavdhasya
analyzed: atra nidrā vyājena lakṣmī gāḍha āliṅganasya śaithilyam cikīrṣatā bhagavatā labdhasya

original: padmālayātaṅkahetutayā sahakāriṇo nāyakasannāhanissāṇarāṇasya pauruṣeyatayā tadidamadaivikaṃ samāhitam /
analyzed: padmālaya ātaṅka hetu tayā sahakāriṇaḥ nāyaka sannāha nissāṇa rāṇasya pauruṣeya tayā tat idam adaivikam samāhitam
bhrāntiḥ viparyaya jñānam vā
ālambavatī anālambavatī ca ityādi sā dvidhā
ālambanavatī yathā

original: autsukyādanavotasiṅganṛpaterākāramālikhya sā nirvarṇyāyamasau mama priya iti premābhiyogabhramāt /
analyzed: autsukyāt anavota siṅga nṛpateḥ ākāram ālikhya sā nirvarṇya ayam asau mama priyaḥ iti prema abhiyoga bhramāt

original: āśuddhāya tatopasṛtya tarasā kiñcidvivṛttānanā sānūnaṃ sadarasmitaṃ sacakitaṃ sākāṅkṣamālokate // Ckc_7.*64 //
analyzed: āśuddhāya tata upasṛtya tarasā kiñcid vivṛtta ānanā sā anūnam sa dara smitam sa cakitam sa ākāṅkṣam ālokate

original: atra nāyakānuraktāyāḥ kasyāścinnāyakacitre ayaṃ sākṣānnāyaka iti pratīteḥ seyaṃ satatanāyakānudhyānavāsanābalena
analyzed: atra nāyaka anuraktāyāḥ kasyāścid nāyaka citre ayam sākṣāt nāyakaḥ iti pratīteḥ sā iyam satata nāyaka anudhyāna vāsanā balena

original: citrastha nāyakākāramālambya jāyata iti saṃskārajā sālambā nāmabhrāntiriyam /
analyzed: citra stha nāyaka ākāram ālambya jāyate iti saṃskāra jā sa ālambā nāma bhrāntiḥ iyam
nirālambā yathā

original: prācaṇḍyaṃ pratigaṇḍabhairavavibhoralokya yuddhāṅgaṇe dāvanto girikandarāparisaraṃ pratyarthipṛthvībhujaḥ /
analyzed: prācaṇḍyam pratigaṇḍa bhairava vibhoḥ a lokya yuddha aṅgaṇe dāvantaḥ giri kandarā parisaram pratyarthi pṛthvībhujaḥ

original: doruddhūtakarālakhaḍgalatikāvyagraṃ tamevāntike prartyādra pratipādapaṃ pratidiśaṃ paśyanti paryākulāḥ // Ckc_7.*65 //
analyzed: dos uddhūta karāla khaḍga latikā vyagram tam eva antike prati pādapam pratidiśam paśyanti paryākulāḥ

original: atra raṇamukhe tādṛśapracaṇḍimānusandhāyakaṃ nāyakaṃ sākṣātkṛtavatāṃ dviṣatā mavigatena
analyzed: atra raṇa mukhe tādṛśa pracaṇḍima anusandhāyakam nāyakam sākṣātkṛtavatām dviṣatā ma vigatena

original: vāsanābalena nāyakasādṛśyālambanaṃ vināpi śailādiṣu yā nayakādipratītiḥ seyaṃ nirālaṃbanā
analyzed: vāsanā balena nāyaka sādṛśya ālambanam vinā api śaila ādiṣu yā nayaka ādi pratītiḥ sā iyam nirālaṃbanā
nāma saṃskārataḥ bhrāntiḥ
dvitīyā ca parijñeyā dvi prakārā manīṣibhiḥ

original: atattave tattvarūpā ca tattve cātattvarūpiṇī // Ckc_7.30 //
analyzed: a tattave tattva rūpā ca tattve ca a tattva rūpiṇī
ādyāḥ yathā

original: nartuṃ vāñchati dhūrjaṭiḥ phaṇadharāstiṣṭhanti paryantataḥ pratyuttiṣṭhati jāhnavī na sahate mānāgrahaṃ māninī /
analyzed: na ṛtum vāñchati dhūrjaṭiḥ phaṇa dharāḥ tiṣṭhanti paryantataḥ pratyuttiṣṭhati jāhnavī na sahate māna āgraham māninī

original: serṣyaṃ paśyati pārvatī kamalabhūrāliṅgituṃ ceṣṭate śrī siṅgakṣitināthakīrtimahimanyāścaryadhuryodaye // Ckc_7.*66 //
analyzed: sa īrṣyam paśyati pārvatī kamala bhūḥ āliṅgitum ceṣṭate śrī siṅga kṣitinātha kīrti mahimanya āścarya dhurya udaye

original: atra sadṛśadhāvalyena yatprāleyaśailādirūpe nāyakayaśasi tattadrūpatayā pratibhānaṃ seyamatattve tattvarūpā bhrāntiḥ /
analyzed: atra sadṛśa dhāvalyena yat prāleya śaila ādi rūpe nāyaka yaśasi tad tad rūpa tayā pratibhānam sā iyam atattve tattva rūpā bhrāntiḥ
dvitīyā yathā

original: tṛṣṇākrāntā jalamiti dhiyā saṃplave bhānubhāsāṃ dhāvaṃ dhāvaṃ dhavaladhavalaṃ dhānvinīṣu sthalīṣu /
analyzed: tṛṣṇā ākrāntāḥ jalam iti dhiyā saṃplave bhānu bhāsām dhāvam dhāvam dhavala dhavalam dhānvinīṣu sthalīṣu

original: kṣāmakṣāmā ripunṛpatayaḥ siṅgabhūpāladhāṭyāṃ satyākārānapi na payasāṃ viśvasanti sma kūpān // Ckc_7.*67 //
analyzed: kṣāma kṣāmāḥ ripu nṛpatayaḥ siṅga bhūpāla dhāṭyām satya ākārān api na payasām viśvasanti sma kūpān

original: atra bahuśo mṛgatṛṣṇikāpratāritānāṃ nāyakaparipanthināṃ pāramārthikeṣvapi jaleṣu na jalānīti yā pratipattiḥ seyaṃ tattvepyatattvarūpā bhrāntiḥ  #
analyzed: atra bahuśas mṛgatṛṣṇikā pratāritānām nāyaka paripanthinām pāramārthikeṣu api jaleṣu na jalāni iti yā pratipattiḥ sā iyam tattve pi atattva rūpā bhrāntiḥ
sādaśya janitā bhrāntiḥ

original: bhrānteḥ paraṃparā bhrānteḥṛ śruṅkhalā ityubhe ime /
analyzed: bhrānteḥ paraṃparā śruṅkhalā iti ubhe ime

original: bhrānteḥ pṛthagiti jñānaṃ bhrāntireveti me matam // Ckc_7.31 //
analyzed: bhrānteḥ pṛthak iti jñānam bhrāntiḥ evā iti me matam
atra bhrānti paramparā yathā

original: śākhāsu prasavāśayā kṣitiruhāṃ karpūrakhaṃḍāśayā peṭīkāmudareṣu mohanavidherante duklāśayā /
analyzed: śākhāsu prasava āśayā kṣitiruhām karpūrakhaṃḍa āśayā peṭīkām udareṣu mohana vidheḥ ante dukla āśayā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitināyakendra bhavato gṛhṇanti siddhāṅganāḥ lokālokadarīparīsahabhuvāmākalpakalpaṃ yaśaḥ // Ckc_7.*68 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣiti nāyaka indra bhavataḥ gṛhṇanti siddha aṅganāḥ yaśaḥ

original: atra siddhāṅganānāṃ bahuśo mālākrameṇa nāyakayaśasi jāyamānā prasavādibhrāntireva brāntiparaṃparetyucyate /
analyzed: atra siddha aṅganānām bahuśas mālā krameṇa nāyaka yaśasi jāyamānā prasava ādi bhrāntiḥ eva brānti paraṃparā iti ucyate
bhrāntiśṛṅkhalā yathā

original: brahmā haṃsadhiyānurajyati nabhogaṅgādhiyā te khagāḥ kṣīrāṃbhodhidhiyā ca sā taṭavatī jyotsnādhiyā cāmbudhiḥ /
analyzed: brahmā haṃsa dhiyā anurajyati nabhaḥ gaṅgā dhiyā te khagāḥ kṣīra aṃbhodhi dhiyā ca sā taṭavatī jyotsnā dhiyā ca ambudhiḥ

original: sā kāntiḥ śaradindumaṇḍaladhiyā tvatkīrtimavyāhatāṃ śrī siṅgakṣitinātha sādhujanatāsaṃkalpakalpadruma // Ckc_7.*69 //
analyzed: sā kāntiḥ śarad indu maṇḍala dhiyā tvad kīrtim avyāhatām śrī siṅga kṣitinātha sādhu jana tā saṃkalpa kalpadruma

original: atra bhrāntīnāmuttarottaraṃ śṛṅkhalānyāyeṃna saṃkalanādiyaṃ bhrāntiḥ śṛṅkhalā nāma bhrāntereva bhedaḥ /
analyzed: atra bhrāntīnām uttarottaram śṛṅkhalā nyāyeṃna saṃkalanāt iyam bhrāntiḥ śṛṅkhalā nāma bhrānteḥ eva bhedaḥ

original: ūhā vitarkaḥ sa dvedhā nirṇayānirṇayāvadhiḥ // Ckc_7.32 //
analyzed: ūhā vitarkaḥ sa dvedhā nirṇaya anirṇaya avadhiḥ
atra nirṇaya antaḥ yathā

original: asau kiṃ kandarpaḥ kimayamamareśānatanayaḥ kimeṣaḥ śrīrāmaḥ kimayamalakānāyakasutaḥ /
analyzed: asau kim kandarpaḥ kim ayam amara īśāna tanayaḥ kim eṣaḥ śrī rāmaḥ kim ayam alakā nāyaka sutaḥ

original: sakhi jñātaṃ so 'yaṃ yuvatinayanotpādakaphalaṃ nidhānaṃ bhāgyānāṃ jayati khalu siṅgakṣitipatiḥ // Ckc_7.*70 //
analyzed: sakhi jñātam saḥ yam yuvati nayana utpādaka phalam nidhānam bhāgyānām jayati khalu siṅga kṣitipatiḥ

original: atra kandarpādivitarkānantaraṃ so 'yaṃ nāyaka iti nirṇayakathanādayaṃ tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: atra kandarpa ādi vitarka anantaram saḥ yam nāyakaḥ iti nirṇaya kathanāt ayam tathā uktaḥ
a nirṇaya antaḥ yathā

original: saṃvartapāvakaśikhā kimi kinnu jihvā mṛtyoriyaṃ kimu yugāntakṛtāntadaṃṣṭrā /
analyzed: saṃvarta pāvaka śikhā kimi kinnu jihvā mṛtyoḥ iyam kimu yugānta kṛtānta daṃṣṭrā

original: ityūhyate samarasīmani vairisainyaiḥ śrī siṅgabhūpakarakampitakhaḍgarekhā // Ckc_7.*71 //
analyzed: iti ūhyate samara sīmani vairi sainyaiḥ śrī siṅga bhūpa kara kampita khaḍga rekhā

original: atra kimidaṃ kimidamiti vitarkayatā vimatasainyena seyaṃ nāyakakhaḍgadhāreti nirṇayākathanādayaṃ tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: atra kim idam kim idam iti vitarkayatā vimata sainyena sā iyam nāyaka khaḍga dhārā iti nirṇaya a kathanāt ayam tathā uktaḥ

original: vastvantareṇa sthaganaṃ vastuno mīlitaṃ matam // Ckc_7.33 //
analyzed: vastu antareṇa sthaganam vastunaḥ mīlitam matam
yathā

original: nityaṃ śrīanavotasiṅganṛpateraśrāntaviśrāṇana- ślāghāślokakṛtā ca dānarasike nākaukasāṃ nāyake /
analyzed: nityam śrī anavota siṅga nṛpateḥ aśrānta viśrāṇana ślāghā śloka kṛtā ca dāna rasike nāka okasām nāyake

original: svardhenorvadane nisarganamanāllajjānatirgopyate mandārasya ca bāṣpa vindupaṭalaṃ ścyotanmadhūlīkaṇaiḥ // Ckc_7.*72 //
analyzed: svardhenoḥ vadane nisarga namanāt lajjā natiḥ gopyate mandārasya ca bāṣpa vindu paṭalam ścyotat madhūlī kaṇaiḥ

original: atra nāyakavitaraṇaślāghayāḥ parābhūtayoḥ kāmadhenukalpavṛkṣayor jāyamānalajjānatibāṣpapūrāḥ svabhāvamukhāvanatipuṣparasābhyāṃ sthagitamiti  #
analyzed: atra nāyaka vitaraṇa ślāghayā parābhūtayoḥ kāmadhenu kalpavṛkṣayoḥ jāyamāna lajjā nati bāṣpa pūrāḥ svabhāva mukha avanati puṣpa rasābhyām sthagitam iti
mīlitam idam
tad bhedāḥ sāmi apihita tad guṇa a tad ṇau api
tatra sāmānyam yathā

original: raicarlīyakulāvataṃsa nṛpate haṃsāḥ praśaṃsānidhe śliṣṭadravyavivekino vijahati prāvīṇyagarvaṃ nijam /
analyzed: raicarlīya kula avataṃsa nṛpate haṃsāḥ praśaṃsā nidhe śliṣṭa dravya vivekinaḥ vijahati prāvīṇya garvam nijam

original: vaktrāntādgalitānmṛṇālakabalān kīlau tava brāhnaṇī prāptādvaitakathānmanāgapi paricchettuṃ cirādakṣamāḥ // Ckc_7.*73 //
analyzed: vaktra antāt galitān mṛṇālaka balān kīlau tava brāhnaṇī prāpta advaita kathān manāk api paricchettum cirāt akṣamāḥ

original: atra kīrtimṛṇālayorekatvarūpaṃ sāmānyamapi sadṛśena sadṛśasthaganamiti mīritameva /
analyzed: atra kīrti mṛṇālayoḥ eka tva rūpam sāmānyam api sadṛśena sadṛśa sthaganam iti mīritam eva
pihitam yathā

original: kasyāśicitkuca maṇḍale navavayomattebhakumbhadvaye dṛṣṭiṃ rāgataraṅgitāṃ vidadhatā śrīsiṅgabhūmībhujā /
analyzed: maṇḍale nava vayaḥ matta ibha kumbha dvaye dṛṣṭim rāga taraṅgi tām vidadhatā śrī siṅga bhūmībhujā

original: dākṣiṇyavratabhaṅgabhīrumanasā devena vāmabhruvā- manyāsāmapi sā tathaiva kṛtinā netrendriyeṇārpitā // Ckc_7.*74 //

original: atra vākyadvayaikatāpattikāmanayā kartuḥ karmaṇo 'dhikaraṇāccopamānāt pṛthak pṛthag dyotakaśabdaḥ kṛta iti seyamanekadyotakā nāma vākyārthasāmyavatī  #
analyzed: atra vākya dvaya eka tā āpatti kāmanayā kartuḥ karmaṇaḥ dhi karaṇāt ca upamānāt pṛthak pṛthak dyotaka śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ iti sā iyam aneka dyotakā nāma vākya artha sāmyavatī  /
vākya upamā
dyotaka hīnā yathā

original: devānāṃ divi rakṣaṇāya maghavā jāgarti daṃbholinā sādhūnāṃ bhūvi siṅgabhūpatirayaṃ khaḍgena śātāsriṇā /
analyzed: devānām divi rakṣaṇāya maghavā jāgarti daṃbholinā sādhūnām siṅga bhūpatiḥ ayam khaḍgena śāta asriṇā

original: ratnādau prathamo mudā viharate rambhādibhirvaibhavā- drājādrāvitaro 'pi ropitayaśāśśuddhāntakāntājanaiḥ // Ckc_8.*13 //
analyzed: ratna ādau prathamaḥ mudā viharate rambhā ādibhiḥ vaibhavāḥ ropita yaśāḥ śuddhānta kāntā janaiḥ

original: atra suranāyakayoḥ svarlokabhūlokayoḥ devabhūdevānāṃ dambholikaravālayośca tulyaikaśriyā

nāma vākya artha sāmyavatī vākya upamā
vaidharmyavatī yathā

original: avivekī na surabhivaccintāmaṇiriva na yāti kāṭhinyam /

original: atropamānopameyadyotakeṣu stsu yoyamaviveko nāma dharmaḥ so 'yamupamāna eva kavinā niyamyata itīyaṃ vaidharmyavatī nāma vākyopamā /
analyzed: atra upamāna upameya dyotakeṣu yaḥ yam avivekaḥ nāma dharmaḥ saḥ yam upamāne eva kavinā niyamyate iti iyam vaidharmyavatī nāma vākyopamā
yatra ukti bhaṅgyā vākya arthe sādṛśyam avagamyate
vākya arthayoḥ vistarataḥ sā prapañcopamā yathā

original: seyaṃ dvedhā hi rūpeṇa prakṛtāprakṛteti ca /
analyzed: sā iyam dvedhā hi rūpeṇa prakṛtā aprakṛtā iti ca
tayoḥ yāt caturdhā sakala upamā

original: ekadeśopamā cānye mālikā mekhaleti ca // Ckc_8.16 //
analyzed: eka deśa upamā ca anye mālikā mekhalā iti ca
tatra sakala upamā yathā
maināka pramukhaiḥ iva kṣitidharaiḥ udbhrānta dantāvalaiḥ kallolaiḥ iva ghoṭakaiḥ bhaṭa varaiḥ mātaṅga nakraiḥ iva

original: raicarlīyakulendunā svapatinā daityāriṇeva sphuṭaṃ senā sindhuriva prayāti nitarāṃ kenāpi durlaṅghatām // Ckc_8.*15 //

atra sindhoḥ senāyāḥ ca durlaṅgha tayā abhidhīyamāna sādṛśyayoḥ upamāna upameya bhāva vivakṣāyām

original: yathā mainākādiśailānāṃ mātaṅgādīnāṃ samudrasenādharmāṇāṃ pratītasādṛśyānāṃ pṛthak
analyzed: yathā maināka ādi śailānām mātaṅga ādīnām samudra senā dharmāṇām pratīta sādṛśyānām pṛthak
pṛthak dyotaka śabda yogāt ati vistareṇa avayavinoḥ avayavānām ca yathocitam sākalyena vākya arthayoḥ aupamye

original: bhaṅgiḥ seyaṃ sākalyavatī nāma prakṛtirūpā prapañcoktiḥ /
analyzed: bhaṅgiḥ sā iyam sākalyavatī nāma prakṛti rūpā prapañca uktiḥ
eka deśavatī yathā

kusumaiḥ iva nakha rucibhiḥ rviṭapa yugalena iva bāhu yugalena

original: atra kalpavṛkṣanāyakayorupamānopameyabhāve vaktavye kalpavṛkṣalakṣaṇamupamānaṃ parityajya tadekadeśena sahopameyaikadeśo bāhuyugalāśaṃsāvayavaiḥ
analyzed: atra kalpavṛkṣa nāyakayoḥ upamāna upameya bhāve vaktavye kalpavṛkṣa lakṣaṇam upamānam parityajya tad eka deśena saha upameya eka deśaḥ bāhu yugala āśaṃsā avayavaiḥ

original: kisalayakusumaissaha bhujayugāṅgānyaṅgulyaḥ nakharucayaśca pṛthak pṛthag dyotakaśabdaprayogādvistareṇopamitānītīyamekadeśavatī nāma prakṛtarūpā  #
analyzed: kisalaya kusumaiḥ saha bhuja yuga aṅgāni aṅgulyaḥ nakha rucayaḥ ca pṛthak pṛthak dyotaka śabda prayogāt vistareṇa upamitāni iti iyam eka deśavatī nāma prakṛta rūpā  /

mālikā yathā

original: śrīgandhairiva śāradairiva ganaiḥ śītāṃśubiṃbairiva vyāptaṃ siṅganarendrakīrtivibhavaiḥ trailokyamālokyate // Ckc_8.*17 //

original: atra nāyakakīrtirekaikaprakarṣapratītaye mālikāprakāreṇa karpūrādibhirupamīyata itīyaṃ mālikā nāma prakṛtarūpā prapañcopamā /

mekhalā yathā

original: prajñeva kīrtiramalā tava siṅgabhūpa prajñāpi khaḍga iva tīvratarā vibhāti /
analyzed: prajñā iva kīrtiḥ amalā tava siṅga bhūpa prajñā api khaḍgaḥ iva tīvratarā vibhāti

original: khaḍgaḥ pratāpa iva śātravacittadāhī prāntān diśāṃ bhajati kīrtiriva pratāpaḥ // Ckc_8.*18 //
analyzed: khaḍgaḥ pratāpaḥ iva śātrava citta dāhī prāntān diśām bhajati kīrtiḥ iva pratāpaḥ

original: atrābhidhīyamānasādṛsyānāṃ prajñādīnāṃ raśanānyāyena saṃkalayya saprapañcatayā kathanātseyaṃ mekhalā nāma prakṛtarūpā prapañcopamā /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyamāna sādṛsyānām prajñā ādīnām raśanā nyāyena saṃkalayya sa prapañca tayā kathanāt sā iyam mekhalā nāma prakṛta rūpā prapañca upamā

original: uktā vikṛta rūpeti yānyā sāpi caturvidhā /
analyzed: uktā vikṛta rūpā iti yā anyā sā api caturvidhā
viparyāsa ubhaya utpādya ananvaya ākhyābhiḥ aṅkitā

original: koṇe kutracidāsatāṃ kariṇiki kroḍādayaḥ kecana prācīnāstadupāśrayānvayamamī doṣānna bhāṣāmahe /
analyzed: koṇe kutracid āsatām kariṇiki kroḍa ādayaḥ kecana prācīnāḥ tad upāśrayān vayam amī doṣān na bhāṣāmahe

original: keyūraṃ smaragasmarasya śayanaṃ śaurergirāṃ śāsitā śrīsiṅgakṣitināyakena samatāṃ śeṣāhirevārhati // Ckc_8.*19 //
analyzed: keyūram smaraga smarasya śayanam śaureḥ girām śāsitā śrī siṅga kṣiti nāyakena sama tām śeṣa ahiḥ evā arhati

ubhaya upamā yathā

anīkinī sindhuḥ iva anurundhe durlaṃghya tām sindhuḥ anīkinī iva

utpādya upamānaḥ yathā

original: kālāpāṃ yadakalpapādapamahāśākhā samālaṃbate śrīsiṅgakṣitipālabāhuranayā tulyaḥ kṛpāṇojjvalaḥ /

original: hemādrerupari sthite yadi vidhau pāścātyagaurāndhatā tacchatraṃ kṛtaśātakumbhakalaśaṃ jātopamānaṃ bhavet // Ckc_8.*21 //
analyzed: hemādreḥ upari sthite yadi vidhau pāścātya gaura andha tā tat chatram kṛta śātakumbha kalaśam jāta upamānam bhavet

original: atra kalpapādapaśākhāyāḥ kālāhisaṃkalpamutpādyānayā sakṛpāṇo nāyakapāṇirupamīyata iti seyamutpādyopamā nāma vikṛtarūpā prapañcopamā /

evam uttara ardhe yojanīyam
ananvaya upamā yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpatiḥ iva bhāti śrī siṅga bhūpatiḥ

original: atropamānopameyabhāva ekasyaivānanvita itīyamananvayā nāma vikṛtā prapañcopamā /

upameya tayā yasmin upacāra prayogataḥ
upamānam virudhya uta rūpakam tat nirūpitam
prādhānyāt tat idam tredhā śabda artha ubhaya saṃbhavāt

original: śabdapradhānaṃ prakṛtaṃ vikṛtaṃ ceti tad dvidhā // Ckc_8.19 //

ādi anta vikṛtaiḥ śabdaiḥ grathitam tat caturvidham
samastam vyastam ubhayam sa viśeṣaṇam iti api
tatra samāsa vat rūpakam yathā
dhārā siṅga mahīpāla karavāla payomucaḥ
nirvāpayati vīrāṇām pratāpa dava pāvakam

original: atra sādṛśyādi vivakṣāyāmabhedopacāreṇopameyasya karavālasya payomugiva payomugiti
analyzed: atra sādṛśya ādi vivakṣāyām abheda upacāreṇa upameyasya karavālasya payomuc iva payomuc iti
payomuc payoda nirūpaṇīya tve sāmānyā iva adya prayogāt upamā arthaḥ tirobhūtaḥ samāsaḥ ca kṛta
iti tat idam samastam nāma prakṛti śabda pradhāna rūpakam
vyastam yathā

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitināyakasya yaśasāṃ candreṇa sāndrā ruciḥ yatprāptā tapanaṃ pratāmapabhito loke tadatyadbhutam /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣiti nāyakasya yaśasām candreṇa sāndrā ruciḥ yat prāptā tapanam loke tat ati adbhutam

original: evaṃ nāticamatkṛtaṃ tadanayoratyantamāśliṣyator āpatyātithayo bhavanti yadamī pratyarthipṛthvībhūjaḥ // Ckc_8.*24 //
analyzed: evam na ati camatkṛtam tat anayoḥ atyantam āśliṣyatoḥ āpatya atithayaḥ bhavanti yat amī pratyarthi pṛthvī bhūjaḥ

original: atra yaśaso candreṇa pratāpaṃ tapanamiti dvayorupamānayorupameyaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyādupamānārthastirohitaḥ samāsaśca kṛta iti samastaṃ nāma  #
analyzed: atra candreṇa pratāpam tapanam iti dvayoḥ upamānayoḥ upameya śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyāt upamāna arthaḥ tirohitaḥ samāsaḥ ca kṛtaḥ iti samastam nāma  /
prakṛta śabda pradhānam rūpakam
samāsa asamāsa rūpam ubhayam yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpāla bhavat kṛpāṇaḥ daṃṣṭrā bhujādaṇḍa bhujaṅgamasya
virodhi rājanyakam indu bimbam hīnam yaśaḥ candrikam āvidhatte

original: atra bhujābhujaṅgamasya samastatvaṃ daṃṣṭretyasamastamiti tadidamubhayaṃ nāma prakṛtiśabdapradhānaṃ rūpakam /
analyzed: atra bhujābhujaṅgamasya samasta tvam daṃṣṭrā iti asamastam iti tat idam ubhayam nāma prakṛti śabda pradhānam rūpakam
sa viśeṣaṇam yathā
bhavati dviṣatām sainyam pīyūṣam adhana aṃbhudhiḥ

original: atra nāyakamandarakṣubhitaviśeṣaṇamiva viśiṣṭaireva vāhinīnāthavairivāhinyo rūpaṇamiti saviśeṣaṇaṃ nāmedaṃ prakṛtiśabdapradhānarūpakam /
analyzed: atra nāyaka mandara kṣubhita viśeṣaṇam iva viśiṣṭaiḥ eva vāhinī nātha vairi vāhinyaḥ rūpaṇam iti sa viśeṣaṇam nāma idam prakṛti śabda pradhāna rūpakam
atra paramparā yathā
tava siṅga mahīpate yaśaḥ su jana aṃbhonidhi pūrva candramāḥ
atra guṇānām ketu tayā rūpaṇam prathamam
tad saṃbandhi tayā dukūla paṭṭikā dvitīyam
tasyāḥ yaśasā tṛtīyam
iti sā iyam paraṃparā nāma vikṛta śabda pradhāna rūpakam
tat idam vaidharmyeṇa api saṃbhavati
yathā
vidanta giri kuliśa dhārā kali malada dahana nava payodhara dhārā

original: vilasati kaṭākṣarekhā tava siṅgakṣitipa kalpavṛkṣasurekhā // Ckc_8.*28 //
analyzed: vilasati kaṭākṣa rekhā tava siṅga kṣitipa kalpavṛkṣa su rekhā
etat eva rupakasya rupaka hetutayā rūpaka hedu rupakam iti kecid ācakṣate
tat api nāma vaikṛtam eva
mekhalā yathā

original: rāja kumāra dviradairdviradaṃ śilābhiśśilā śikhā saudhaiḥ /
analyzed: rāja kumāra dviradaiḥ dviradam śilābhiḥ śilā śikhā saudhaiḥ

original: atra rājakumāradviradādīnāṃ rūpakāṇāṃ raśanā nyāyāduttarottarasaṃkalanyā rūpitatvādiyaṃ mekhalā nāma vikṛtaśabdapradhānaṃ rūpakam /
analyzed: atra rāja kumāra dvirada ādīnām rūpakāṇām raśanā nyāyāt uttarottara saṃkalanyā rūpita tvāt iyam mekhalā nāma vikṛta śabda pradhānam rūpakam
tat idam śṛṅkhalā iti kecid ācakṣate
tat nāma bhe mātram
mālikā yathā

original: cūḍāratnaṃ nṛpaṣariṣadāmarthināṃ pārijāto rakṣālāsaḥ sucaritavatāṃ bhāgyarāśernidhānam /
analyzed: cūḍāratnam nṛpa ṣariṣadām arthinām pārijātaḥ rakṣā ālāsaḥ su caritavatām bhāgya rāśeḥ nidhānam

original: galā durnayānāṃ siṅgakṣoṇītalapatirayaṃ rājate rājaśaile // Ckc_8.*30 //
analyzed: galāḥ durnayānām siṅga kṣoṇī tala patiḥ ayam rājate rāja śaile

original: atra ekasminnava nāyake mālikāprakāreṇa rūpakāṇāṃ nirūpaṇādidaṃ mālikā nāma vikṛtaśabda pradhānaṃ rupakam /
analyzed: atra ekasmin nava nāyake mālikā prakāreṇa rūpakāṇām nirūpaṇāt idam mālikā nāma vikṛta śabda pradhānam rupakam
rūpaka rūpakam yathā
śrī siṅga dharaṇībhujaḥ
aśeṣam vairi rāja ratna indu maṇḍalam

original: atra vallītvenāropitasya kṛpāṇasya bhujagatayā rūpaṇādidaṃ rūpakarūpakaṃ nāma vikṛtaśabdapradhānarūpakam /
analyzed: atra vallī tvena āropitasya kṛpāṇasya bhujaga tayā rūpaṇāt idam rūpaka rūpakam nāma vikṛta śabda pradhāna rūpakam
tat etat catuṣṭayam api paraṃparā ādi vaikṛtena nibaddham iti vikṛtam iti ucyate
artha pradhānam prādhānyāt aṅginaḥ ṅgasya ca dvidhā
caturdhā aṅgi pradhānasya rūpaka ādyaiḥ nirūpitam
sakalam vikalam yuktam ayuktam iti bhedataḥ
tatra sakalam yathā
nisyandamāna sa rasa ukti maranda sāram vistāri locana palāśa viśeṣa ramyam

original: śrīsiṅgabhūpa bhavadīyamukhāravinda- madhyāsyate kamalayā paramādareṇa // Ckc_8.*32 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpa bhavadīya mukha aravinda madhyāsyate kamalayā parama ādareṇa
atra nāyaka mukha aravinda avayavinā upamāna upameyau kathita sādṛśyaiḥ sarasa ukti maranda locana palāśaiḥ
sva avayavaiḥ saha yathā vivakṣitam sākalyena rūpitau iti tad yogya vastu ādhāra tva kathanāt asya eva

original: prādhānyamiti ca tadidaṃ sakalaṃ nāmāṅgipradhānamarthapradhānaṃ rupakam /
analyzed: prādhānyam iti ca tat idam sakalam nāma aṅgi pradhānam artha pradhānam rupakam
vikalam yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpāla mukam smita jyotsrā manoharam
bhujyan na an anusaṃdhatte vikasat nayana utpalān

original: atra smitajyotsnayoravayavayoḥ nirūpaṇaṃ nirūpyāvayavena pūrṇendulakṣaṇasyopamānasyānabhidhānāt tadidaṃ vikalaṃ nāmāṅgipradhānaṃ rūpakam /
analyzed: atra smita jyotsnayoḥ avayavayoḥ nirūpaṇam nirūpya avayavena pūrṇa indu lakṣaṇasya upamānasya anabhidhānāt tat idam vikalam nāma aṅgi pradhānam rūpakam
rājahaṃsa upasevyena rāja kīrti bisa śriyā
padma ākareṇa bhavatā bhūyate siṅgabhūpate
atra āropyamāṇayoḥ paraspara saṃgateḥ yogya tvāt idam nāma āṅgipraghānam rūpakam

original: atra yadyapi padmākara iti gauṇavṛttirvyapāśrayata iti śadba eva viśeṣaṇairalaṅkiyate
analyzed: atra yadi api padma ākaraḥ iti gauṇa vṛttiḥ vyapāśrayate iti śadbaḥ eva viśeṣaṇaiḥ alaṅkiyate

original: tathāpi padmāyā ākara iti śleṣasāmarthyena mukhyasyeva bhavati śadbhārthasya prādhānyamavagamyata
analyzed: tathā api padmāyāḥ ākaraḥ iti śleṣa sāmarthyena mukhyasya iva bhavati prādhānyam avagamyata
iti artha pradhānam eva etat
ayuktam yathā

original: kīrtyamṛtaṃ śuci dadhatī dhārāgaralena vidadhatī bhītim /
analyzed: kīrti amṛtam śuci dadhatī dhārā garalena vidadhatī bhītim
śrī siṅga bhūpa vilasati tāvaka karavāla kālindī

original: atrāropyamāṇayoḥ sudhāgaralayoḥ svabhāva viruddhatvena parasparasaṃgatyayogatvādayukttaṃ nāmāṅgipradhānaṃ rupakam /
analyzed: atra āropyamāṇayoḥ sudhā garalayoḥ svabhāva viruddha tvena paraspara saṃgati ayoga tvāt nāma aṅgi pradhānam rupakam
bhedāḥ aṅga pradhānasya caturaḥ caturā viduḥ
sahaja āhārya tad yoga tad vaiṣamyaiḥ upādhibhiḥ
tatra sahaja aṅga pradhānam yathā
ārūḍa stana mañjarī parikarāḥ hāsa prasūna ācitāḥ rāga añcat sukumāra bāhu latikāḥ tāmra adhara agra chadāḥ

original: sāmantakṣitipairupāyanatayā sevāturairarpitāḥ śrīsiṅgakṣitipālamādaramayaṃ kurvanti kanyālatāḥ // Ckc_8.*36 //
analyzed: sāmanta kṣitipaiḥ upāyana tayā sevā āturaiḥ arpitāḥ śrī siṅga kṣitipālam ādara mayam kurvanti kanyā latāḥ

original: atra kanyāpakṣe payodhara mandasmitabhujādaralakṣaṇānāṃ latāpakṣe mañjarīprasūnadvirephapatrlavarūpāṇāṃ cāvayavānāṃ nāyakotsukīkaraṇe prādhānyamiti  #
analyzed: atra kanyā pakṣe payodhara manda smita bhuja ādara lakṣaṇānām latā pakṣe mañjarī prasūna dvirepha patra lava rūpāṇām ca avayavānām nāyaka utsukīkaraṇe prādhānyam iti
sahaja aṅga pradhāna rūpakam idam
āhārya pradhānam yathā
āśā prāntapa celimam prasaraṇa prauḍha pratāpa ātapa sphāyat bāndhava puṇaḍarīka parita ullāsa anukūla udayaḥ
uddaṇḍa pratigaṇḍa bhairava jana prasthāna darpa atyayaḥ vairi kṣmāpati kīrti ketaka dala drohāya saṃnahyate
atra nāyaka vijaya yātrā pakṣe pratāpa bandhu vairi kīrti lakṣaṇānām śarad pakṣe ātapa puṇḍarīka ketaka prasūnānām

original: cāvayavatayā kalpitatvādāhāryāṇāṃ saṃnahane prādhānyamityāhāryāṅgapradhānaṃ rūpakamitīdamubhaya prādhānyam /
analyzed: ca avayava tayā kalpita tvāt āhāryāṇām saṃnahane prādhānyam iti āhārya aṅga pradhānam rūpakam iti idam ubhaya prādhānyam
tad yogaḥ yathā
diś koṭī puṭa rūḍha vaiśikha mukha jvāla jvalat prasphuṭam pratyarthi kṣiti nātha sainya gahanāt gochāya
saṃlakṣyate
atra nāyaka pratāpa pakṣe kṛpāṇa krodha viśikha mukha lakṣaṇānām āhāryāṇām anala pakṣe dhūma sphuliṅga śikhānām

original: sahajānāṃ cāvayavānāṃ rupakāṇāṃ vairirājanyakṣobhakaraṇe prādhānyamiti sahajāhāryāṅgapradhānaṃ rūpakamidam /
analyzed: sahajānām ca avayavānām rupakāṇām vairi rājanya kṣobha karaṇe prādhānyam iti sahaja āhārya aṅga pradhānam rūpakam idam
vaiṣamyavān yathā
śrī siṅga kṣitinātha bāhu bhujage tāmra aṅga gulī pallave gāḍha skandha nirūḍha maṃju madhure kalya āpaṇa rekhā ujjvale
dūra prasṛta duṣṭa śikṣaka pura amātya abhiṣiktta uddhuraḥ skandha āvāsa sukham cara sthitimatī viśvaṃbharā jṛmbhate

original: atra bhujāvayavino bhujagatayā rūpaṇe kṛte tadavayavānāmaṅgulīnāṃ patrlavatārūpayā
analyzed: atra bhuja avayavinaḥ bhuja gatayā rūpaṇe kṛte tad avayavānām aṅgulīnām patrlava tā rūpayā

original: rūpaṇayā padāntarāṇāṃ skandhaśubharekhāṇāṃ rūpaṇaṃ ceti sarvato vaiṣamyāt tāmrāṅgutryādīnāṃ
analyzed: rūpaṇayā pada antarāṇām skandha śubha rekhāṇām rūpaṇam ca iti sarvatas vaiṣamyāt tāmra aṅgu tri ādīnām

original: bhāgyadvārā dharaṇībharaṇasthairye prādhānyācca tadidaṃ viṣamāṅgapradhānaṃ rūpakam /
analyzed: bhāgya dvārā dharaṇī bharaṇa sthairye prādhānyāt ca tat idam viṣama aṅga pradhānam rūpakam

original: dvidhā śabhdārthamukhyassyāt kevalaṃ vyatireki ca // Ckc_8.24 //
analyzed: dvidhā śabhda artha mukhyaḥ syāt kevalam vyatireki ca
kevalam yathā
kurvan kuvalaya ullāsam śyāmā rañjana lālasaḥ
śrī siṅga bhūpāla induḥ prakāśatām

original: atra nāyakāvayavinaḥ kuvalayasya candratayā rūpaṇena śabdaprādhānyamuktaśliṣṭaviśeṣaṇa viśeṣādarthasya prādhānyamiti kevalā nāmedamubhayapradhānaṃ  #
analyzed: atra nāyaka avayavinaḥ kuvalayasya candra tayā rūpaṇena śabda prādhānyam ukta śliṣṭa viśeṣaṇa viśeṣāt arthasya prādhānyam iti kevalā nāma idam ubhaya pradhānam
rūpakam
vyatirekikam yathā

original: abhaṅgo vārāśiḥ vigalitakalaṅko himarucir vivekī hemādriḥ kalitanijamūrtī ratipatiḥ /
anindyo devendraḥ kuṭilagatihīno bhujagarāḍ janānāṃ bhāgyena kṣitimavati siṅgakṣitipatiḥ // Ckc_8.*41 //
analyzed: anindyaḥ deva indraḥ kuṭila gati hīnaḥ bhujaga rāj janānām bhāgyena kṣitimavati siṅga kṣitipatiḥ

original: atra vārāśiprabhṛtīnāmabhaṅgādiviśeṣaṇāṅkuritavyatirekāṇāṃ nāyakasāmānādhikaraṇyena kathanādarthata śśabdataḥ prādhānyamavadhāryata iti vyatirekavannāmobhayapradhānaṃ  #
analyzed: atra vārāśi prabhṛtīnām abhaṅga ādi viśeṣaṇa aṅkurita vyatirekāṇām nāyaka sāmānādhikaraṇyena kathanāt arthataḥ śabdataḥ prādhānyam avadhāryate iti vyatirekavat nāma ubhaya pradhānam
rūpakam
iti aṣṭādaśadhā rūpam rūpakasya nirūpitam
sahkīrṇam miśra rūpa tvāt saṅkarāt na atiricyate
vidyādharasya vyasta ādi rūpakeṣu acamatkriyām
vadataḥ lakṣya nirmāṇa kātaryam mūla kāraṇam
ubhayoḥ ukti cāturyāt aupamyam yatra gamyate
upamā rūpaka anyatve sā hi sāmyam ahaṅkiyā
sā iyam prapañca dṛpṭānta prativastu uktibhiḥ tridhā
atra sāmyavatī prapañca uktiḥ yathā

original: svaraṃ vīṇākvāṇairlalitamupadhā vārasudṛśāṃ jigīṣā yātrāyāṃ bharitadiśi siṅgakṣitipatiḥ // Ckc_8.*42 //
analyzed: svaram vīṇā kvāṇaiḥ lalitam upadhā vārasudṛśām jigīṣā yātrāyām bharita diśi siṅga kṣitipatiḥ
atra kula giri drākṣā phala vipañcī kvāṇānām upamānānām matta ibha sāhitya gāyikā svarāṇām upameyānām
tulādhṛta vat sāmyam iti ityādi dyotakam antareṇa api catura ukti bhaṅgyā pratīyate iti sā iyam
sā iyam vikṛtā api saṃbhavati
yathā

original: mimīte mattebhaiḥ kulagirikulaṃ tuṅgaśikharaṃ phalāni drākṣāṇāṃ vacanaparipākaiḥ kṛtadhiyām /
analyzed: mimīte matta ibhaiḥ kula giri kulam tuṅga śikharam phalāni drākṣāṇām vacana paripākaiḥ kṛta dhiyām

original: vipañcīnikvāṇaṃ śrutibhirupadhā vārasudṛsāṃ jigoṣā yātrāyāṃ bharitadiśi siṅgakṣitipatiḥ // Ckc_8.*43 //
analyzed: vipañcī nikvāṇam śrutibhiḥ upadhā vārasudṛsām jigoṣā yātrāyām bharita diśi siṅga kṣitipatiḥ

original: atra kulaśailādīnāmupameyatvaṃ mattebhānāmupamānatvaṃ ca prasiddhavaiparīṃtyena kalpitamiti seyaṃ vikṛtaprapañcoktirnāma sāmyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: atra kula śaila ādīnām upameya tvam matta ibhānām upamāna tvam ca prasiddha vaiparīṃtyena kalpitam iti sā iyam vikṛta prapañcoktiḥ nāma sāmya bhedaḥ
prakṛtā evā utkarṣeṇa yathā

original: mā garvīyata medini sumanaso recarlavaṃśāgraṇīḥ śrīsiṅgakṣitipālako vitaraṇairmuṣṇāti tṛṣṇāmiti /
analyzed: mā medini sumanasaḥ śrīsiṅga kṣiti pālakaḥ vitaraṇaiḥ muṣṇāti tṛṣṇām iti
santi evaṃvidha karmaṭhāḥ suragavī kalpadru cintāmaṇi śreṇī siddha rasa ajayaḥ ghana dayā skandha anusaṃdhāyinaḥ

original: atra bhobho viśvaṃbharāmarāḥ kimanenaiva vitaraṇaśālinā nāyakena garvāyadhve /
analyzed: atra bho bho viśvaṃbhara amarāḥ kim anena eva vitaraṇa śālinā nāyakena garvāyadhve

original: diviṣadāṃ punaranekasantatikalpavṛkṣādayo dātāra ityupamānotkarṣādiyamutkarṣavatī prapañcoktirnāma sāmyabhaktiḥ /
analyzed: diviṣadām punar aneka santati kalpavṛkṣa ādayaḥ dātāraḥ iti upamāna utkarṣāt iyam utkarṣavatī prapañcoktiḥ nāma sāmya bhaktiḥ
sā eva apakarṣeṇa yathā

original: kurvanmārjitamambare jalanidhau saṃkṣālayan gharṣayan dehaṃ meruśilāsu candraki javaṃ nakttaṃ divaṃ bhrāmyase /
analyzed: kurvan mārjitam ambare jalanidhau saṃkṣālayan gharṣayan deham meru śilāsu candraki javam nakttam divam bhrāmyase

original: kiṃ kṛtvā hṛdi siṅgabhūpatiyaśo rājāsi kiṃ bhrūmahe satyaṃ śakyamapohituṃ nahi nahi svābhāvikī śyāmikā // Ckc_8.*45 //
analyzed: kim kṛtvā hṛdi siṅga bhūpati yaśaḥ rājā asi kim bhrūmahe satyam śakyam apohitum nahi nahi svābhāvikī śyāmikā
atra upameyāt nāyaka yaśaḥ vilāsāt upamānasya candrasya apakarṣaḥ iti apakarṣavatī nāma prapañca uktiḥ
anayā eva bhaṅgyā vikṛtiḥ api lakṣaṇīyā
saddhiḥ dyetaka sadbhāve dṛṣṭānta uktiḥ iti īritā
miśrita amiśritaiḥ sā iyam kriyā ādyaiḥ bahudhā bhavet
atra miśra kriyayā yathā
nivartamānām vinivartamānām kṛta prasārām racita prasārām
śrī siṅga bhūpāla kaṭākṣa rekhām chāyā iva lakṣmīḥ anubhāti nityam

original: atra kevalanivartanādikriyāyogajanitaṃ sāmyaṃ vā dṛṣṭāntapūrvamiti seyaṃ kevalakriyāyogavatī dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ /
analyzed: atra kevala nivartana ādi kriyā yoga janitam sāmyam vā dṛṣṭānta pūrvam iti sā iyam kevala kriyā yogavatī dṛṣṭānta uktiḥ

original: miśrakriyāyogavatī saiva yathā atraiva dvitīyapādasthāne kṛtaprasādāṃ racitaprasādetipāṭhe nivartanakriyā prasādaguṇanimittasāmyā miśrakriyāyogavatīyaṃ  #
analyzed: miśra kriyā yogavatī sā eva yathā atra eva dvitīya pāda sthāne kṛta prasādām racita prasādā iti pāṭhe nivartana kriyā prasāda guṇa nimitta sāmyā miśra kriyā yogavatī iyam
evam miśra amiśra jāti guṇa dravya yoga nimittāḥ dṛṣṭānta uktayaḥ draṣṭavyāḥ

original: nanu dṛṣṭāntoktteḥ dṛṣṭāntālaṅkārasya vā ko viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: nanu dṛṣṭānta uktteḥ dṛṣṭānta alaṅkārasya vā kaḥ viśeṣaḥ
śrūyatām

original: laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminnarthe bṛddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta ityarthaṃ prati na kaścidbhedaḥ /
analyzed: laukika parīkṣakāṇām yasmin arthe bṛddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti artham prati na kaścid bhedaḥ
ukti bhaṅgim uddiśya punar anekaḥ vidyate
yathā hi sādhya siddhi prayojanaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
dṛṣṭānte dyotaka gandhaḥ na anusandhīyate
iha tu dyotaka prayogasya adhikāraḥ ityādi atas eva iyam ubhaya alaṅkriyā
vastu kiñcid upanyasya vinyāsāt tad sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
sāmyam gamyate iti eṣā prativastūktiḥ ūcyate
dṛṣṭānta ukti prapañca ukti chāyayā sā dvidhā matā
chāyā prativastu uktiḥ yathā

original: mattebhāsurabhāsurājinapaṭe sphūrjatkaṭe dhūrjaṭe- rāśaṅkyeta yataḥ kutaścana mṛge nyakkāraḍhakkāravaḥ /
analyzed: matta ibhāsura bhāsura ajina paṭe sphūrjat kaṭe dhūrjaṭe yatas kutaścana mṛge nyakkāra ḍhakkāravaḥ

original: yadyanyairanavadyapadyayaśasaḥ śrīsiṅgabhūśārṅiṇo bhūpālairabhilakṣyate raṇamukhe bhrūbhaṅgabhīmaṃ mukham // Ckc_8.*47 //
analyzed: yadi anyaiḥ anavadya padya yaśasaḥ śrī siṅga bhūśārṅiṇaḥ bhūpālaiḥ abhilakṣyate raṇa mukhe bhrū bhaṅga bhīmam mukham
atra dṛṣṭānta rūpam vastu prathamam upanyastam

original: dārṣṭāntikaṃ prativastu paścāditi dṛṭāntoktichāyāvatīyaṃ prativastūktirnāma sāmyabhaktiḥ /
analyzed: dārṣṭāntikam prativastu paścāt iti dṛṭānta ukti chāyāvatī iyam prativastūktiḥ nāma sāmya bhaktiḥ

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitipāśrayā yadi kathā merorna me rocate tadvaktrasya vilokanaṃ yadi vṛthā candrasya saṃdarśanam /
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipa āśrayā yadi kathā meroḥ na me rocate tad vaktrasya vilokanam yadi vṛthā candrasya saṃdarśanam

original: tadgoṣṭhī yadi pṛṣṭhato na viśate sā mādhavī mādhurī tatsevā yadi siddhameva sudhiyāmavyājabhavyārjanam // Ckc_8.*48 //
analyzed: tad goṣṭhī yadi pṛṣṭhatas na viśate sā mādhavī mādhurī tad sevā yadi siddham eva sudhiyām avyāja bhavya arjanam

original: atropamānāpakarṣastriṣvartheṣu caturthe tu samatvamiti prapañcoktichāyāvatī prativastūktiḥ /
analyzed: atra upamāna apakarṣaḥ triṣu artheṣu caturthe tu sama tvam iti prapañca ukti chāyāvatī prativastūktiḥ
evam sāmānyatas sāmyam alaṅkāraḥ nirūpitaḥ
viśeṣaḥ tu viśeṣa jñaiḥ lakṣyatām lakṣya vistare
yatra dolāyate cittam arthayoḥ ati sāmyataḥ
syāt eka aneka viṣyā saṃśayoktiḥ matā hi sā
syāt eka viṣaya anekam yatra ekatra
sā aneka viṣayā smṛtā
eka viṣayā yathā

original: śākāhāraparigraho giridarīṣvekāntacintā ratiḥ śayyā sthaṇḍila eva bhūtidhavalā mūrtirjaṭālaṃ śiraḥ /
analyzed: śāka āhāra parigrahaḥ giri darīṣu ekānta cintā ratiḥ śayyā sthaṇḍile eva bhūti dhavalā mūrtiḥ jaṭālam śiraḥ

original: aṅgānyasthimayāni hanta sutarāṃ kiṃ vā tapasvī bhavā- nuddaṇḍapratigaṇḍabhairavavibhoḥ kiṃ vā virodhī nṛpaḥ // Ckc_8.*49 //
analyzed: aṅgāni asthi mayāni hanta sutarām kim vā tapasvī bhavā kim vā virodhī nṛpaḥ
atra ekasmin eva puruṣa lakṣaṇe vastuni tapasmitva nāyaka virodhitva lakṣaṇayoḥ vastutoḥ abhidhīyamāna sāmānya pratīteḥ viśeṣa adarśanāt ubhaya gata viśeṣa smaraṇāt ca
vimarśaḥ iti jñeyam ekayiṣayā nāma saṃśayoktiḥ
aneka viṣayā yathā

original: dvau netrānandakandau jagati kuvalayaprīṇane jāgarūkau sanmārgaikapradārapravaṇanijamatī pūryamāṇau kalābhiḥ /
analyzed: dvau netra ānanda kandau jagati kuvalaya prīṇane jāgarūkau sat mārga eka pradāra pravaṇa nija matī pūryamāṇau kalābhiḥ

original: tatkovā siṅgapṛthvītilakaḥ konu rākāmṛgāṅkaḥ kā jyotsnā kā ca kīrtiściramati vimṛśan naiva nājāmi tattvam // Ckc_8.*50 //
analyzed: tat ko vā siṅga pṛthvī tilakaḥ kaḥ nu rākāmṛgāṅkaḥ kā jyotsnā kā ca kīrtiḥ ciram ati vimṛśan nā eva na ajāmi tattvam
atra abhidhīyamāna sādṛśyayoḥ nāyaka tārakā nāyakayoḥ pratyekam ubhayam ā śaṅkyate iti sā iyam

original: iyaṃ pratīta sāmyāpi saṃbhavati yathā atraiva kā ñcotsnā kā ca kīrtiriti jyotsnāpratīta dhāvalyādisāmyayoḥ pratyekamubhayamāśaṅkyata iti seyaṃ  #
analyzed: iyam sāmyā api saṃbhavati yathā atra eva kā ñcotsnā kā ca kīrtiḥ iti jyotsnā pratīta dhāvalī ādi sāmyayoḥ pratyekam ubhayam āśaṅkyate iti sā iyam
evam eka viṣayā api lakṣaṇīyā
nanu vitarka saṃśaya alaṅkārayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ
śrūyatām
nyakkṛta eka koṭiḥ tu vitarkaḥ
kiñcid nirṇaya āmannaḥ vitarkaḥ
vitarka āsannaḥ saṃśayaḥ

original: tathā hi saṃdihāno vitarkakoṭimāruhya tarkakakṣyāṃ parityajya tattvamevābhiniviśate /
analyzed: tathā hi saṃdihānaḥ vitarka koṭim āruhya tarka kakṣyām parityajya tattvam eva abhiniviśate
vastu kiñcid apahnutya sadṛśa asadṛśasya vā

original: anyasya vastuno nyāso yatra sāpaṅnutirmatā // Ckc_8.35 //
analyzed: anyasya vastunaḥ nyāsaḥ yatra sā āpaṅnutiḥ matā
sadṛśa vastu nyāsavatī apahnutiḥ yathā

original: neyaṃ śāradakaumudī sakhi yaśaḥ śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpateḥ naitaccañcalacañcarīkapaṭalaṃ taddveṣiṇāṃ duryaśaḥ /
analyzed: nā iyam śārada kaumudī sakhi yaśaḥ śrī siṅga pṛthvīpateḥ nā etat cañcala cañcarīka paṭalam tad dveṣiṇām duryaśaḥ

original: nedaṃ kokilakūjitaṃ mṛgadṛśāṃ tatkīrtisaṃgītami- tyālāpānanusaṃdadhāti sudṛśo dūrapriyāyāḥ sakhi // Ckc_8.*51 //
analyzed: na idam kokila kūjitam mṛga dṛśām tad kīrti saṃgītam iti ālāpān anusaṃdadhāti sudṛśaḥ dūra priyāyāḥ sakhi
atra satya rūpā api candrikā cañcarīka kokila kūjitāni vacanāt apahnutya pratīya mana sādṛśyāni
nāyaka kīrti tad paripandhi duṣkīrti gāyikā svara lakṣaṇāni anyāni vastūni upanyastāni iti sā iyam
sādṛśyavatī apahnutiḥ
asādṛśyavatī yathā

original: netraṃ hanta vataṃsaguccharajasā bāṣpāyate dūṣitaṃ gātraṃ spṛṭamanena mandamarutā romāñcamālaṃbate /
analyzed: netram hanta vataṃsa guccha rajasā bāṣpāyate dūṣitam gātram spṛṭam anena manda marutā romāñcam ālaṃbate

original: nānyatkāraṇamityudīritavatī kāciddhṛdīcchāgate śrīsiṅgakṣitipālake nijasakhī mandasmitairlajjate // Ckc_8.*52 //
analyzed: na anyat kāraṇam iti udīritavatī kācid hṛdi icchā gate śrī siṅga kṣitipālake nija sakhī manda smitaiḥ lajjate
atra lajjā śīlayā kayā

original: cajidānaṃdabāṣparomāñcakāraṇaṃ nāyakaviṣayamanurāgamapahnutya visadṛśavirāgapavanalakṣaṇakāraṇopanyāsaḥ kalpita iti seyamasādṛśyavatī nāmāpahnutiḥ
analyzed: cajit ānaṃda bāṣpa romāñca kāraṇam nāyaka viṣayam anurāgam apahnutya visadṛśa virāga pavana lakṣaṇa kāraṇa upanyāsaḥ kalpitaḥ iti sā iyam asādṛśyavatī nāma apahnutiḥ
samādhi uktiḥ mataḥ nyasmin anya dharma adhiropaṇam

original: anyasyānyadharmasya tadubhayasya ceti vyutpattyā dharmiṇoradhyāse dharmasyādhyāse dharmadharmiṇoradhyāse ca trividhaḥ samādhiḥ /
analyzed: anyasya anya dharmasya tad ubhayasya ca iti vyutpattyā dharmiṇoḥ adhyāse dharmasya adhyāse dharma dharmiṇoḥ adhyāse ca trividhaḥ samādhiḥ
tatra kevala dharmiṇoḥ adhyāse yathā

original: pakṣāṇāṃ kurute sa tatkṣaṇamayaṃ yutpakṣarakṣāmaṇiḥ durgāpāśrayaṇaṃ tvabhīrumanasornaivāsya saṃbhāvyate /
analyzed: pakṣāṇām kurute sa tad kṣaṇam ayam yudh pakṣa rakṣā maṇiḥ durga apāśrayaṇam tu abhīru manasoḥ nā eva asya saṃbhāvyate

original: itthaṃ cintayatāmiva kṣitijaye śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate tvayyāsannacare kulakṣitibhṛtāṃ labghodayā stabdhatā // Ckc_8.*53 //
analyzed: ittham cintayatām iva kṣiti jaye śrī siṅga pṛthvīpate tvayi āsanna care kula kṣitibhṛtām labgha udayā stabdha tā

original: atra pakṣaparirakṣaṇādi dharmāropamapahāya nāyake taddharmavataḥ parvataśāsanasyaivādhyāsādayaṃ dharmisamādhiḥ /
analyzed: atra pakṣa parirakṣaṇa ādi dharma āropam apahāya nāyake tad dharmavataḥ parvata śāsanasya eva adhyāsāt ayam dharmi samādhiḥ
dharma samādhiḥ yathā

original: śrīsiṅgabhūpāla tava pratāpe jitvā pradīpte tapanapratāpam /
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpāla tava pratāpe jitvā pradīpte tapana pratāpam
diśām taṭe korakita antaraṅgā nikāmam āliṅgita kīrtiḥ eṣā
atra nāyaka pratāpa nāyaka kīrtī diś taṭeṣu acetanāsu yathākramam bhaṭa pratibhaṭa tad salakṣaṇa dharme
samārepam apahāya jaya parājaya harṣa āliṅgana taraṅga ullāsa rūpa tad dharmā eva samāropitā
iti sā iyam dharma samādhiḥ
tad dharmeṇa tad dharmiṇām ca adhyāse yathā

original: prāk saṃbhūta bhiyābhibhūtaraśanāpṛṣṭhe kṛtāhaṃ kitāṃ daṃṣṭrāgreṇa vikampitā paraśatairākramya nītāṃghriṇā /
analyzed: prāk saṃbhūta bhiyā abhibhūta raśanā pṛṣṭhe kṛtā aham kitām daṃṣṭra agreṇa vikampitā para śataiḥ ākramya nīta aṃghriṇā
raktteḥ kardamitā ujjhitā pitṛ girā na iti kṛṣṇā iti kim

original: raicarlīyakulodbhavena bhavatā seyaṃ sthirā manyate // Ckc_8.*55 //
analyzed: raicarlīya kula udbhavena bhavatā sā iyam sthirā manyate

original: atra nāyake nārāyaṇasya dharmiṇāṃ taddhardhāṇāṃ matsyādibalabhadrāntāvatārakalpitānāṃ jaldhisaṃkṣobhaṇā diraśanāsamāropaṇādayamubhayasamādhiḥ
analyzed: atra nāyake nārāyaṇasya dharmiṇām tad hardhāṇām matsya ādi balabhadra anta avatāra kalpitānām jaldhi saṃkṣobhaṇā ādi raśanā samāropaṇāt ayam ubhaya samādhiḥ
yatra upamānāt kathitāt upameyam pratīyate
ati prasiddheḥ tām āhuḥ samāsoktim manīṣiṇaḥ

original: ślāghāṃ garhāmupālaṃbhaṃ prāpteyaṃ trividhā bhavet // Ckc_8.38 //
analyzed: ślāghām garhām upālaṃbham prāptā iyam trividhā bhavet
ślāghāvatī yathā
pathika vraṇa bandhunā
prāpyate janma sāphalyam adhunā dhanvi sindhunā
atra pathika jana prāṇa rakṣaṇa maru deśa samādhinā upamānena pratīyamānayā ca pathika jana rakṣaṇa lakṣaṇa sādhāraṇa dharmasya
kali doṣa kaluṣībhūta rāja loka bhū loka eka parāyaṇasya siṅga bhūpālasya ukti siddhau tad chāyā eva

original: ślāghā pratīyata iti seyaṃ ślāghāvatī samāsoktiḥ /
analyzed: ślāghā pratīyate iti sā iyam ślāghāvatī samāsoktiḥ
sā eva garhāvatī yathā

original: ekā daityagurorubhe murabhidastisraḥ paśūnāṃ prabhor aṣṭau dvādaśa padmagarbhaguhayorlaṅkāpaterviśatiḥ /
analyzed: ekā daitya guroḥ ubhe murabhidaḥ tisraḥ paśūnām prabhoḥ aṣṭau dvādaśa padmagarbha guhayoḥ laṅkāpateḥ viśatiḥ

original: asmākaṃ tu dṛśaḥ sahasramiti mā garvīya vāstoṣpate mākrodhītarāgatismaraṇatokta lajjā nu ...... tebhavet (?) // Ckc_8.*57 //
analyzed: asmākam tu dṛśaḥ sahasram iti mā vāstoṣpate lajjā nu te bhavet
atra ahalyā abhisaraṇa doṣa nimitta siddha locana sahasreṇa tad ādhikyāt eva bhārgava ādi viśiṣṭa jana tiraskāriṇā
duścyavanena eva upamānena pratīyamāna sāmānyasya a nyāya upārjita samṛddheḥ nyāya mārga pravaṇa
siṅga bhūpāla ādi prabhu varga vibhāṣeṇa kasya cid bhūpāla adhamasya upameyasya ukti siddhau upamāna
dvāreṇa eva upameya nindā vivakṣitā iti garhāvatī iyam samāsoktiḥ
upālaṃbhavatī yathā

original: api mṛdulairapi pravālairapi kusumairapi tiktatāṃ viditvā /
analyzed: api mṛdulaiḥ api pravālaiḥ api kusumaiḥ api tikta tām viditvā

original: upavasasi sakhe palāśayā kiṃ pariṇatavānapi tikta eva nimbaḥ // Ckc_8.*58 //
analyzed: upavasasi sakhe palāśayā kim pariṇatavān api tiktaḥ eva nimbaḥ

original: atra tiktatā mūrdhābhiṣikttena nijenaivopamānena pratīyamānasādṛsyasyaiva niṣkamparase
analyzed: atra tikta tā mūrdha abhiṣikttena nijena eva upamānena pratīyamāna sādṛsyasya eva niṣkampa rase
guṇa hīnasya kasyacid avarṇanīyasya ukti siddhau pariṇatavān api tiktaḥ evā iti upālaṃbha uktiḥ upamāna jāt upameyam avalaṃbata
iti iyam upālaṃbhavatī samāsoktiḥ
abhidhīyamāna sādṛśyā ślāghāvatī yathā

original: dhṛterādhārasya sphuṭaraṭita śuddhaiḥ kṛtamudā sarasvatyā nityaṃ prakaṭitasuvahṇaprasarayā /
analyzed: dhṛteḥ ādhārasya śuddhaiḥ kṛta mudā sarasvatyā nityam prakaṭita suvahṇa prasarayā

original: sudharmātambānāmiha sumanasāmekavasate- ssuvarṇādreḥ kṣoṇībharaṇamucitaṃ netaragireḥ // Ckc_8.*59 //
analyzed: sudharma ātambānām iha sumanasām eka vasate ssuvarṇa adreḥ kṣoṇī bharaṇam ucitam na itara gireḥ
atra suvarṇagiriṇā eva upamānena dhṛti ādhāra tva ādibhiḥ abhidhīyamāna sādṛśyasya siṅga bhūpālasya upameyasya ukti siddhau upamāna mukhāt iva upameyasya ślāghā  /
pratīyate iti sā iyam yathā uktā
sā eva garhāvatī yathā

original: itthaṃ viddhamupāsya tairthikajana grāsādudagrātmane māyāmāṃsalaśiṃśumāra bhavate dūreṇa baddhāñjaliḥ // Ckc_8.*60 //
analyzed: ittham viddham upāsya tairthika jana grāsāt udagra ātmane māyā māṃsala śiṃśumāra bhavate dūreṇa baddhāñjaliḥ
atra śiṃśumāreṇa upamānena abhidhīyamāna sādṛsyasya kasyacid dvāravartinaḥ dāṃbhikasya upameyasya ukti siddhāt upamāna mukhāt upameyasya
garhā pratīyate iti sā iyam abhidhīyamāna sādṛśya garhāvatī samāsoktiḥ
sā eva upālaṃbhavatī yathā
vārāṃnidheḥ budha manoratha siddhi hetoḥ maryādayā kṛta ruceḥ bahu jīvanasya

original: jātaśriyo himakarasphuraṇeddhakānter jāḍyaṃ na cediha tulāmupayāti ko 'nyaḥ // Ckc_8.*61 //
analyzed: jāta śriyaḥ himakara sphuraṇa iddha kānteḥ jāḍyam na ced iha tulām upayāti kaḥ nyaḥ

original: atrāṃbudherevopamānasyopālaṃbhāt tadupameyasyābhidhīyamānasādṛśyasya kasyacidguṇavato 'pi vilambakāriṇe upālaṃbhaḥ pratīyata iti seyamabhidhīyamānasādṛśyopālaṃbhavatī  #
analyzed: atra aṃbudheḥ eva upamānasya upālaṃbhāt tad upameyasya abhidhīyamāna sādṛśyasya kasyacid guṇavataḥ pi vilamba kāriṇe upālaṃbhaḥ pratīyate iti sā iyam abhidhīyamāna sādṛśya upālaṃbhavatī
samāsoktiḥ
anena ślāghā ādi saṃkaravatī api vyākhyātā
atra ślāghā garhaṇa saṃkaravatī yathā

original: vārādhārāḥ kati na suvate duryaśorāśihetor antarjantuvyatikaravasālaṃbitān kṣudraśaṃkhān /
analyzed: vārādhārāḥ kati na suvate duryaśaḥ rāśi hetoḥ antar jantu vyatikara vasā ālaṃbitān kṣudra śaṃkhān

original: so 'yaṃ bhūmnāmāvādharudadhiryatra bhāgyāvadhīnāṃ saubhāgyānāṃ janiruditavān dakṣiṇāvartaśaṅkhaḥ // Ckc_8.*62 //
analyzed: saḥ yam bhūmnām āvādhar udadhiḥ yatra bhāgya avadhīnām saubhāgyānām janiḥ uditavān dakṣiṇa āvarta śaṅkhaḥ
atra prathama ardhe kṣudra śaṅkha samutpatti sthāna jalāśayānām upamāna a kathanāt eva tad upameyānām
pratīyamāna sādṛsyānām kṣudra kṣudra kṣatriya utpatti sthānānām anya narapāla vaṃśānām uktteḥ
siddhau upamāna dvāreṇa eva upameya garhā pratīyate
uttara ardhe ca dakṣimaṇa āvarta śaṅkha janaka kṣīrasāgareṇa eva upamānena kathita sādṛśyasya

original: nāyakāva taramapariṇatabhāgadheyasya recarlavaṃśasyoktisiddhā vupamānamukhenaivopameyasya ślāghā pratīyate /
analyzed: nāyaka ava taram apariṇata bhāgadheyasya reca ṛla vaṃśasya ukti siddhau upamāna mukhena eva upameyasya ślāghā pratīyate

analyzed: atra varṇanīyasya nāyakasya samucitāyām mupameya tāyām viparyāsa upamā nyāyena upamānīkṛtasya

original: upameye upamānāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ upamāne upameyadharmādhyāsaḥ samāsoktiḥ iti vyakta evānayorbhedaḥ /

atra śamayitum iva iti kriyā phala tvam
