śrī siṅga śārṅga dhanuṣā ati vadānya tāyām spardhā aparādha karaṇāt iva kopitena

original: āmūlavellitalatāvalayāpadeśā- tkalpadrumā nigalitāḥ prabhuṇā prajānām // Ckc_8.*73 //
analyzed: ā mūla vellita latā valaya apadeśāt kalpadrumāḥ nigalitāḥ prabhuṇā prajānām
atra aparādha karaṇasya kriyā tvam hetu tvam ca iti tathā uktā
upalakṣaṇam iti etat sajāteḥ api evam eva draṣṭavyam
evam prakārāḥ katicid utprekṣāyām nirūpitāḥ
uttare catura ukteṣu lakṣaṇīyāḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
a prastuta praśaṃsā syāt a stotvyasya yā stutiḥ
yathā

original: dhanyāste girayo jayanti yadamī śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpater- yātavyā nahibhūbhṛto 'pyalamayaṃ rājāpi candrassakhī /
analyzed: dhanyāḥ te girayaḥ jayanti yat amī śrī siṅga pṛthvīpateḥ yātavyāḥ pi alam ayam rājā api candraḥ sakhī

original: tatra śrībharitānyapi kṣitiruhāṃ bṛndāni bhāgyādhikā- nyuddaṇḍīkṛtapuṇḍarīkamahimāpyekaṃ kṛtārtha saraḥ // Ckc_8.*74 //
analyzed: tatra śrī bharitāni api kṣitiruhām bṛndāni bhāgya adhikā nyuddaṇḍīkṛta puṇḍarīka mahimā api ekam kṛtārtha saraḥ

original: atrāpi jigīṣornāyakasya yātavyapakṣasthitermūrdhābhiṣikttairātmanindāyāṃ prastutāyāmaprastutānāṃ giricandrasarasāṃ praśaṃsanaṃ vihitamiti seyamaprastutapraśaṃsā
analyzed: atrā api jigīṣoḥ nāyakasya yātavya pakṣa sthiteḥ mūrdhābhiṣikt taiḥ ātma nindāyām prastutāyām aprastutānām giri candra sarasām praśaṃsanam vihitam iti sā iyam aprastuta praśaṃsā
ekasya stuti nindā artham vipakṣita guṇa uttaraiḥ

original: yatsamīkṛtya kathanaṃ sā matā tulyayogitā // Ckc_8.44 //
analyzed: yat samīkṛtya kathanam sā matā tulya yogitā
tulya yogitā yathā

original: rādheyaṃ rajanīkaraṃ ratipatiṃ ratnākaraṃ rāghavam ratnaṃ vaidharaṇīdharaṃ rasanidhiṃ rantiṃ rasālaṃ ravim /
analyzed: rādheyam rajanīkaram ratipatim ratnākaram rāghavam ratnam vaidharaṇīdharam rasanidhim rantim rasālam ravim

original: raicarlīyakulodvahaṃ ca sṛjatā lokopakārakriyā- hetorlokapitāmahena karuṇāsarvasvamāviṣkṛtam // Ckc_8.*75 //
analyzed: raicarlīya kula udvaham ca sṛjatā loka upakāra kriyā hetoḥ loka pitāmahena karuṇā sarvasvam āviṣkṛtam

original: atra lokopakāraparāyaṇatvalabdhastutīnāṃ karṇādīnāṃ tulyayogena nāyakastutervihitatvādiyaṃ stutyarthā tulyayogitā /
analyzed: atra loka upakāra parāyaṇa tva labdha stutīnām karṇa ādīnām tulya yogena nāyaka stuteḥ vihita tvāt iyam stuti arthā tulya yogitā
nindā arthāḥ yathā
manda ādi dhātu dhamanāt grahaṇāt ahīnāḥ manya upatāpa karaṇāt pramadā adhikārāt

original: śrīsiṅgabhūparaṇaṇānyanapāśrayācca vāñchanti jīvitamaho viṣamā manuṣyāḥ // Ckc_8.*76 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhū paraṇaṇāni anapāśrayāt ca vāñchanti jīvitam aho viṣamāḥ manuṣyāḥ

original: atra kevalavadhūpātānapariṇāmatvena labhdagarhāṇāṃ dhātuvādādīnāṃ tulyakakṣyānikṣepānnāyaketararājāśrayaṇasya sāmyaṃ nindārthaṃ pratīyata iti  #
analyzed: atra kevala vadhū pātāna pariṇāma tvena dhātuvāda ādīnām tulya kakṣyā nikṣepāt nāyaka itara rāja āśrayaṇasya sāmyam nindā artham pratīyate iti
sā iyam tathā uktā

original: doṣasya yo guṇībhāvo doṣībhāvo guṇasya yaḥ /
analyzed: doṣasya yaḥ guṇībhāvaḥ doṣībhāvaḥ guṇasya yaḥ
sa leśa syāt tatas nā anyā vyājastutiḥ iti smṛtā
atra doṣasya guṇībhāve yathā
kūṭa upāya nikuṭṭita pratibhaṭa kṣmāpāla mauli vrajāt ākṛṣṭaiḥ sva suhṛd kara praṇihitaiḥ śasta upadhāḥ vastubhiḥ

original: tvāmārādhayatāṃ yaśodhananidhe śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate sākṣāt sevitumicchato 'vanipatīn manyasva mānyottamān // Ckc_8.*77 //
analyzed: tvām ārādhayatām yaśaḥ dhana nidhe śrī siṅga pṛthvīpate sākṣāt sevitum icchataḥ vanipatīn manyasva mānya uttamān
atra yā iyam upa gautamī taṭam paryaṭatām āṭavika mahīpatīnām kuṭila upāya pāṭava stutiḥ sā iyam anuprāṇita rājamārga praṇayinaḥ

original: nāyakasya manasi doṣatayā pratibhāsyata ityabhiprāyeṇa caturamatibhiramātyaiḥ pramukhanaiṣṭhuryaparijihīrṣayā
analyzed: nāyakasya manasi doṣa tayā pratibhāsyate iti abhiprāyeṇa catura matibhiḥ amātyaiḥ pramukha naiṣṭhurya parijihīrṣayā
kūṭa upāya prayoga rūpaḥ doṣaḥ pi nāyaka caraṇa senā sādhana dhana arjana lakṣaṇa guṇatayā nirūpita

original: iti so 'yaṃ doṣasya guṇībhāvo nāma leśataḥ śanairananyaviditamucyata iti leśaḥ /
analyzed: iti saḥ yam doṣasya guṇībhāvaḥ nāma leśataḥ śanais ananya viditam ucyate iti leśaḥ
guṇasya doṣībhāvaḥ yathā

original: etāvtyapi vipriye priyasakhi prāṇeṣu kā prārthanā kiṃ vā tena śaṭhena nirdayahṛdā recarlavaṃśendunā /
analyzed: vipriye priya sakhi prāṇeṣu kā prārthanā kim vā tena śaṭhena nirdaya hṛdā reca la vaṃśa indunā

original: yasyāgaḥ parimārjanāya kṛtināmagresarasya sphuṭaṃ sāmnāṃ sāradhumādhure sahabhuvāṃ śikṣeva nityavratam // Ckc_8.*78 //
analyzed: yasya āgaḥ parimārjanāya kṛtinām agresarasya sphuṭam sāmnām sāradhu mādhure saha bhuvām śikṣā iva nitya vratam

original: atra kācidanatidhīrā nāyakā mānāgraha parigrahānuguṇamarthaṃ sakhīnāyakāgrataḥ pratijñāya
analyzed: atra kācid anatidhīrā nāyakā māna āgraha parigraha anuguṇam artham sakhī nāyaka agratas pratijñāya
pada nirvāham āśaṅkamānā sakhī jana parihāsa parijihīrṣayā cāṭu vāda ādi lakṣaṇam a stosam māna pratyūha kāraṇam

original: nāyakaguṇagrāmaṃ doṣībhāvena samupanyasyatīti so 'yaṃ guṇasya doṣībhāvo nāma leśaḥ /
analyzed: nāyaka guṇa grāmam doṣībhāvena samupanyasyati iti saḥ yam guṇasya doṣībhāvaḥ nāma leśaḥ
yathā ca

original: chāyāpahāre racite 'ravindaiḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpāla na modase tvam /
analyzed: chāyā apahāre racite ravindaiḥ śrī siṅga bhūpāla na modase tvam

original: chāyāpahāreṇa sahādirāja- ślokāpahāraṃ kuruṣe kimetat // Ckc_8.*79 //
analyzed: chāyā apahāreṇa saha ādi rāja śloka apahāram kuruṣe kim etat

original: atra rājakīrtyapahāralakṣaṇasya nāyakaguṇasya śabdaśaktyā camatkārāya doṣatayā kathanād vyājastutirapi sa eva /
analyzed: atra rāja kīrti apahāra lakṣaṇasya nāyaka guṇasya śabda śaktyā camatkārāya doṣa tayā kathanāt vyāja stutiḥ api saḥ eva
kārakāṇām samāveśaḥ saha anyaiḥ yat kriyā ādibhiḥ
sā sahoktiḥ asādṛśyāt sāhaśyāt ca dvidhā bhavet
asādṛśyavatī yathā
sākam tvad kīrti vistāraiḥ śrī siṅgadharaṇī pate
digantarāṇi dhāvanti sāmanta nṛpa paṅktayaḥ

original: atra śatrulakṣakatvapadārtho visadṛśaiḥ nāyaka kīrtivistāraiḥ kathitā pratītasādṛśyaiḥ saha deśāntaradhāvanakriyāyāṃ samāviṣṭa iti seyaṃ tathoktā
analyzed: atra śatru lakṣaka tva padārthaḥ visadṛśaiḥ nāyaka kīrti vistāraiḥ kathitā pratīta sādṛśyaiḥ saha deśa antara dhāvana kriyāyām samāviṣṭaḥ iti sā iyam tathā uktā
sādṛśyavatī yathā

original: kṣoṇībhṛtkaṭakoparodhanapaṭuḥ vyāpārabhavyodayā- māśāpūraṇa kāraṇaśriyamiva prāpnoti kīrtiśriyam /
analyzed: kṣoṇībhṛt kaṭaka uparodhana paṭuḥ vyāpāra bhavya udayā māśā pūraṇa kāraṇa śriyam iva prāpnoti kīrti śriyam

original: śrīsiṅgakṣitipālamaṇḍanamaṇe recarlavaṃśāgraṇī- rānandānanusandadhāti viduṣāṃ dravyaiḥ svakāvyairiva // Ckc_8.*81 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga kṣitipāla maṇḍana maṇe recarla vaṃśa agraṇī rānandān anusandadhāti viduṣām dravyaiḥ sva kāvyaiḥ iva

original: atra śabdaśaktyābhidhīyamānasamānadharmayoḥ lakṣmīkīrtyoḥ sādṛśyapratīyamānaspṛhaṇīyatvādinā dharmayoḥ dravyakāvyāyośva sādṛsyamivena dyotyate
analyzed: atra śabda śaktyā abhidhīyamāna samāna dharmayoḥ lakṣmī kīrtyoḥ sādṛśya pratīyamāna spṛhaṇīya tva ādinā dharmayoḥ dravya kāvya āyoḥ ca sādṛsyam ivena dyotyate
labhyate
na ca atra upamāna śahkā kāryā
upamāyām upameyasya eva kriyā samāveśaḥ
upamānasya upameya mukhena sākṣāt

original: iha tu dvayossamaprādhānyena karmakaraṇabhāvādivivakṣāyāṃ prāptyānandā nusaṃdhānādikriyāsamāveśa iti śleṣodbhāvitopamānachāyā itīyaṃ sādṛśyavatī  #
analyzed: iha tu dvayoḥ sama prādhānyena karma karaṇa bhāva ādi vivakṣāyām prāpti ānanda anusaṃdhāna ādi kriyā samāveśaḥ iti śleṣa udbhāvita upamāna chāyā iti iyam sādṛśyavatī
samāsoktiḥ

original: evaṃ viviktādi bhedena kartrādīnāṃ prāyopamānānāṃ bhedāssvayamupagantavyāḥ /
analyzed: evam vivikta ādi bhedena kartṛ ādīnām prāya upamānānām bhedāḥ svayam upagantavyāḥ
dravya ādīnām anekeṣām dravya ādau viniveśanam
samuccayaḥ syāt anye ca arthāḥ tasya eva bhaktayaḥ
sa tāvat caturdhā
dvi pada āśrayaḥ bahu pada āśrayaḥ ubhaya varga āśrayaḥ nubhaya āśrayaḥ ca iti
tatra dvipada āśrayaḥ dvidhā pratipada dyotakaḥ uttara pada dyotakaḥ ca iti
tatra ādyaḥ yathā
loka uttaram śuddhi guṇam dadhānā rāja adhikām kāntim udañcayantī

original: śrīsiṅgabhūpāla bhuvi tbadīyā mūrtiśva kīrtiśva mudaṃ tanoti // Ckc_8.*82 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpāla bhuvi mudam tanoti

original: atra mūrtiḥ kīrtiriti dve vastunī pratipadaṃ dyotakena cakāreṇa ekasyāṃ tanotīti kriyāyāṃ samuccitya niveśite /
analyzed: atra mūrtiḥ kīrtiḥ iti dve vastunī pratipadam dyotakena cakāreṇa ekasyām tanoti iti kriyāyām samuccitya niveśite

original: tena tanuta iti dvivacanaṃ cārthe dvandvasamāsaśva bhavatīti so 'yaṃ kriyāyāṃ dravyasamuccayo nāma pratipadadyotako dvipadāśrayassamuccayabhedaḥ
analyzed: tena tanute iti dvivacanam ca arthe dvandva samāsaḥ ca bhavati iti saḥ yam kriyāyām dravya samuccayaḥ nāma pratipada dyotakaḥ dvipada āśrayaḥ samuccaya bhedaḥ
saḥ eva uttara pada āśraya dyotakaḥ yathā
madāndha vyāpāra prakaṭita sadā andhaḥ parikaraḥ prati syāt vyāmiśra sphuṭa paṭaha jhāṅkāra paṭimā

original: jikīṣā saṃraṃbhastava sapadi siṅgakṣitipate vipakṣāṇāṃ lakṣṇī calayati samutkaṇṭhayati ca // Ckc_8.*83 //
analyzed: jikīṣā saṃraṃbhaḥ tava sapadi siṅga kṣitipate vipakṣāṇām lakṣṇī calayati samutkaṇṭhayati ca

original: atra calanotkaṇṭhālakṣaṇe dve vastunī uttarapadavartinā dyotakenaikasminneva vipakṣalakṣmīlakṣaṇe
analyzed: atra calana utkaṇṭhā lakṣaṇe dve vastunī uttara pada vartinā dyotakena ekasmin eva vipakṣa lakṣmī lakṣaṇe

original: dharmabhūte dvavye samuccayenaikakālameva niveśita iti so 'yamuttarapadagatadyotako
analyzed: dharma bhūte dvavye samuccayena eka kālam eva niveśitaḥ iti saḥ yam uttara pada gata dyotakaḥ
bahu pada āśrayaḥ pūrva pad dvidhā
tatra ādyaḥ yathā

original: nyāyakramaśca bhujadaṇḍaparākramaśca kālajñatā ca karuṇā ca kṛtajñatā ca /
analyzed: nyāya kramaḥ ca bhuja daṇḍa parākramaḥ ca kāla jña tā ca karuṇā ca kṛtajña tā ca

original: kāvyajñatā ca kavitā ca vadānyatā ca tvāṃ siṅgabhūpa......prapariṣkaroti // Ckc_8.*84 //
analyzed: kāvya jña tā ca kavi tā ca vadānya tā ca tvām siṅgabhūpa prapariṣkaroti

original: atra nyayaparākramādayaḥ pratipadāśrayadyotakenaikasyāṃ pariṣkaraṇakriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśyante /
analyzed: atra nyaya parākrama ādayaḥ pratipad āśraya dyotakena ekasyām pariṣkaraṇa kriyāyām samuccayena niveśyante

original: tena pariṣkurvantīti bahuvacanaṃ dvandvasamāsaśca na bhavitīti so 'yaṃ pratipadagatadyotakonāma bahupadāśrayasamuccayabhedaḥ /
analyzed: tena pariṣkurvanti iti bahuvacanam dvandva samāsaḥ ca na saḥ yam pratipada gata dyotakaḥ nāma bahu pada āśraya samuccaya bhedaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ ca kāraṇabāhulyena purāṇachāyāṃ smṛtipathamavatāraya nnātīva camatkārakārītyasmākaṃ matam /
analyzed: saḥ yam ca kāraṇa bāhulyena purāṇa chāyām smṛtipatham avatāraya na atīva camatkāra kārī iti asmākam matam
tathā api purātana gatānugatika aśraddhayā samudāhṛtam tat idam sarasa sāhitya siddhānta marma jñaiḥ tititikṣatavyam
dvitīyaḥ yathā
ananta bhoga āśrayaṇam vibhu tvam cakra priyattvam ghana sattva tā ca
śrī siṅgabhūpe śrita pārijāte pratyakṣa nārāyaṇa tām vyanakti
atra ananta bhoga āśraya ādīni vastūni uttara pada vartinā cakāreṇa vyanakti iti ekasyām kriyāyām

original: samuccīyante na vyañjayantīti bahuvacanaṃ samāsaśca na bhavatīti so 'yamuttarapadagatadyotako
analyzed: samuccīyante na vyañjayanti iti bahuvacanam samāsaḥ ca na bhavati iti saḥ yam uttara pada gata dyotakaḥ
ubhaya varga āśrayaḥ punar uttara pada varti dyotakaḥ eva
yathā ca
śrī siṅga bhūpāla kavi īśvarāṇām puṇya atirekāt idam āvirāsīt

original: kāvyaṃ praśastaṃ tava kagīrtanaṃ ca satāṃ śriyāṃ sajjanarañjanaṃ ca // Ckc_8.*86 //
analyzed: kāvyam praśastam tava ca satām śriyām sat jana rañjanam ca

original: atra kāvyaṃ kīrtanaṃ ceti dve kriye /
analyzed: atra kāvyam kīrtanam ca iti dve kriye
śrī sadbhāvaḥ sat jana anurañjanañca iti dvau guṇau

original: evaṃ bahūnyapi vastūni dvandvaśa uttarapadavartinā dyotakenāvirāsīdityekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ niveśyante /
analyzed: evam bahūni api vastūni dvandvaśas uttara pada vartinā dyotakena āvirāsīt iti ekasyām kriyāyām niveśyante

original: tena santīti bahuvacanaṃ dvandvasamāsaśca na syāditi so 'yamubhyavargāśrayassamuccayaḥ /
analyzed: tena santi iti bahuvacanam dvandva samāsaḥ ca na syāt iti saḥ yam ubhya varga āśrayaḥ samuccayaḥ
anubhaya āśrayaḥ punar avidyamāna dyotaka tvāt anvācayasya iva asya viṣayaḥ dīpakena āhṛtaḥ na udāhriyate
itaretara yogaḥ pi dvipada āśraya ādi bhedena caturvidhaḥ
tatra uttara pada varti dyotakaḥ dvi pada āśrayaḥ itaretara yogaḥ yathā
śrī siṅga bhūpati maṇeḥ dyumaṇeḥ ca nityam paśya dvayoḥ udayatoḥ hi mahā udaya śrīḥ
kalyāṇa dāna ratayoḥ śaraṇa āgatānām ārūḍha viṣṇu pada sevanayā nikāmam

original: atra nāyakaprabhānāyakau dve dravye paśyetyekasmin guṇapade yaditaretarayogena niveśite
analyzed: atra nāyaka prabhā nāyakau dve dravye paśya iti ekasmin guṇa pade yat itaretara yogena niveśite

original: taddvayorityatra tadviśeṣaṇayośca dvivacanavikṣāyāṃ samāsaśca bhavatīti so 'yaṃ tathokta
analyzed: tat dvayoḥ iti atra tad viśeṣaṇayoḥ ca dvivacana vikṣāyām samāsaḥ ca bhavati iti saḥ yam tathā ukta
eva
evam itaretara yoge pi dyotaka yogāḥ udāhartavyāḥ
saḥ eva anubhaya āśrayaḥ yathā
niṣpanda mugdham avalokita masta lajjā ceṣṭā kapola tala kandalitā smita śrīḥ

original: śrīsiṅgabhūmiramaṇe taruṇījanānāṃ bhāvasthitiṃ piśunayanti sakhījanāya // Ckc_8.*88 //
analyzed: śrī siṅgabhūmi ramaṇe taruṇī janānām bhāva sthitim piśunayanti sakhī janāya

original: atrāvalokitaceṣṭāsmitamiti vastvanitaretarayogena taruṇījanānurāga nivedanakriyāyāṃ niveśyata iti so 'yamanubhayāśrayetaretarayogassamuccaya  #
analyzed: atra avalokita ceṣṭā smitam iti vastu anitara itara yogena taruṇī jana anurāga nivedana kriyāyām niveśyate iti saḥ yam anubhaya āśraya itaretara yogaḥ samuccaya
eva
samāhāraḥ pi pūrvavat caturvidhaḥ
tatra anubhaya āśrayaḥ yathā

original: saundaryaṃ madane sukhaṃ surapatau bhāgyaṃ nidhīnāṃ prabhau kāruṇyaṃ raghunāyake caturimā cāṇūramalladviṣi /
analyzed: saundaryam madane sukham surapatau bhāgyam nidhīnām prabhau kāruṇyam raghunāyake catur imā cāṇūra malla dviṣi

original: dharmo dharmatanūbhave vitaraṇaṃ vidyādharādhīśvare tatsarvaṃ śritavatsale vilasati śrīsiṅgabhūmīśvare // Ckc_8.*89 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ dharma tanūbhave vitaraṇam vidyādhara adhīśvare tat sarvam śrita vatsale vilasati śrī siṅgabhūmīśvare

original: atra sarvaṃ tadityanena saundaryādīnāṃ samudāya evānusandhīyate /
analyzed: atra sarvam tat iti anena saundarya ādīnām samudāyaḥ eva anusandhīyate
tasya ca tirobhūta avayava bheda tve samāhāraḥ

original: sa ceha tadityekavacanāntena napuṃsakena ca kathyate /
analyzed: sa ca iha tat iti ekavacana antena napuṃsakena ca kathyate
na ca iha kvacid api cakāra ādiḥ vidyate

original: dyotaka iti so 'yamunabhayāśrayaḥ samahāraḥ samuccaya eva /
analyzed: dyotakaḥ iti saḥ yamunā bhaya āśrayaḥ samahāraḥ samuccayaḥ eva
itare dyotakavantaḥ samāhārāḥ svayam ūhyāḥ
anvācayaḥ tu kriyā viṣayaḥ eva
tatra dyotakaḥ tu uttara pada āśrayaḥ eva
yathā
uddaṇḍa pratigaṇḍa bhaira vibho saṃkalpa kalpadruma śrī siṅga kṣitipāla śekhara yaśaḥ viktāra nistāraka

original: sādhūnāṃ parirakṣaṇāya dharaṇīṃ jitvā bhajethāḥ śriyaṃ paṅktiñca pratiyāyināṃ punarapi sve sve pade sthāpitā // Ckc_8.*90 //
analyzed: sādhūnām parirakṣaṇāya dharaṇīm jitvā bhajethāḥ śriyam paṅktim ca pratiyāyinām punar api sve sve pade sthāpitā

original: atra bhajethā iti nāyakakartṛkāṃ śrīkarmakatvena kriyāmupanyasya tatkartṛkameva pratipālanakarmasaṃsthāpanakriyāṃ
analyzed: atra bhajethāḥ iti nāyaka kartṛkām śrī karmaka tvena kriyām upanyasya tad kartṛkam eva pratipālana karma saṃsthāpana kriyām

original: tva nvācayena niveśitamiti so 'yamanvācayo 'pi samuccayabheda eva /
analyzed: niveśitam iti saḥ samuccaya bhedaḥ eva
pratiṣedhaḥ ūkriḥ ākṣepaḥ vidheḥ vā atha niṣedhataḥ
vidhinā ākṣepaḥ yathā

original: kāntārakṣitivāsakhinnamanasā kānta tvayā sevituṃ śrīsiṅgakṣitināthamandhranagarī gamyeti ced gamyatām /
analyzed: kāntāra kṣiti vāsa khinna manasā kānta tvayā sevitum śrī siṅga kṣitinātha mandhra nagarī gamyā iti ced gamyatām
panthānaḥ prabhavantu te śivatamāḥ sītā bhūyāt
prasannaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: yaṃ deśaṃ pradadhāti te sukṛtadhīstatraiva janmāstu me // Ckc_8.*91 //
analyzed: yam deśam pradadhāti te sukṛta dhīḥ tatra eva janma astu me

original: atra gamyatāmiti kathitasya vidhivākyasyaivānukūlayaiva janmāntarāśiṣā maraṇasūcanāniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti so 'yaṃ vidhyākṣepaḥ /
analyzed: atra gamyatām iti kathitasya vidhi vākyasya eva anukūlayā eva janmāntara āśiṣā maraṇa sūcanā niṣedhaḥ kriyate iti saḥ yam vidhi ākṣepaḥ
niṣedha ākṣepaḥ yathā

original: na hi vayaṃ kavayaḥ kavayastu ye nagariguṇānasato 'pi vivṛṇvate /
analyzed: na hi vayam kavayaḥ kavayaḥ tu ye vivṛṇvate

original: nigadituṃ na hi siṅgavasundharābhuji santo 'pi guṇānvayamīśmahe // Ckc_8.*92 //
analyzed: nigaditum na hi siṅga vasundharā bhuji santaḥ pi guṇān vayam īśmahe

original: atra neśmahe iti niṣedhena kavitvalakṣaṇasyāropitaguṇavarṇanasya niṣedhaḥ dharmata iti so 'yaṃ vidhyākṣepaḥ (niṣedhākṣepaḥ?) /
analyzed: atra neśmahe iti niṣedhena kavi tva lakṣaṇasya āropita guṇa varṇanasya niṣedhaḥ dharmataḥ iti saḥ yam vidhi ākṣepaḥ niṣedha ākṣepaḥ
jñeyaḥ saḥ ṛtha antaranyāsaḥ vastu prastutya kiñcana
nyāsaḥ vaktu anya vastunaḥ
yathā

original: siṅgakṣoṇīramaṇasaraṇiṃ mānamunmānadhītvaṃ yadyad dravyaṃ karayasi paraṃ pratyahopārjanena /
analyzed: siṅga kṣoṇī ramaṇa saraṇim mānam unmāna dhī tvam yat yat dravyam karayasi param pratyaha upārjanena

original: tattatpātre nihitamasakṛdvismarasyeva citte kāryasyānte ka iva hi bhavet kāṅkṣaṇā yaḥ prabhūṇām // Ckc_8.*93 //
analyzed: tat tat pātre nihitam asakṛt vismarasi eva citte kāryasya ante kaḥ iva hi bhavet kāṅkṣaṇā yaḥ prabhūṇām

original: atra nāyakasya pātradattadharmadravyānanuśocanalakṣaṇaṃ vastu prastutya tatsādhanasamarthaṃprabhusvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ vastvantaramupanyastamiti  #
analyzed: atra nāyakasya pātra datta dharma dravya ananuśocana lakṣaṇam vastu prastutya tad sādhana samartham prabhu svabhāva lakṣaṇam vastu antaram upanyastam iti
sāhasam ṣaṅguṇam hi
atra kīrteḥ sapta arṇava laṅghanam upanyasya tad sādhana samarthasya ṣaḍguṇaḥ trisāhasa vastu antarasya upanyāsāt ayam tathā uktaḥ
yatra dravya ādi vaikalya darśanam stutya vastunaḥ
viśeṣa pratibhānāya sā viśeṣoktiḥ iṣyate
yathā

original: na yānaṃ prasunaṃ na ca surabhaigandhi praharaṇaṃ na maurvī vācāṭī na ca dhanurayatnātimadhuram /
analyzed: na yānam prasunam na ca sura bhaigandhi praharaṇam na maurvī vācāṭī na ca dhanuḥ ayatna ati madhuram

original: tathāpi śrīsiṅgakṣitipatirayaṃ cañcaladṛśāṃ vidhatte saṃmohaṃ manasi nitarāṃ manmatha iva // Ckc_8.*94 //
analyzed: tathā api śrī siṅga kṣitipatiḥ ayam cañcala dṛśām vidhatte saṃmoham manasi nitarām manmathaḥ iva

original: atra puṣparathādidravyāsaṃbhave 'pi nāyakena yadidaṃ mattakāśī cittasaṃmohanakaraṇaṃ tena rūpādiśaviśeṣakāraṇaṃ pratīyata iti seyaṃ pratīyamānaheturviśeṣoktiḥ
analyzed: atra puṣparatha ādi dravya asaṃbhave nāyakena yat idam mattakāśī citta saṃmohana karaṇam tena rūpa ādi śa viśeṣa kāraṇam pratīyate iti sā iyam pratīyamāna hetuḥ viśeṣoktiḥ
evam abhidhīyamāna hetuḥ api draṣṭavyā
upaskāraḥ parikaraḥ kriyā ādīnām viśeṣaṇaiḥ
āśvasta mūla kacchapam ullasita girīndram utsuka anantaḥ

original: atrāśvastetyādiviśeṣaṇairmahī vahanakriyāyā ananyasādhāraṇalakṣaṇa upaskāra iti so 'yaṃ kriyāparikaraḥ /
analyzed: atra āśvastā ityādi viśeṣaṇaiḥ mahī vahana kriyāyāḥ ananya sādhāraṇa lakṣaṇaḥ upaskāraḥ iti saḥ yam kriyā parikaraḥ
evam kāraka parikara ādayaḥ pi svayam unneyāḥ
eka āvalī parikarāt na binnā iti matiḥ mama
yathā
avaneṣu araṇe vibhave kramaṇe sukṛta avdhani siṅga mahīpatinā

original: dharaṇī kuśalaṃ gamitā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā // Ckc_8.*96 //
analyzed: dharaṇī kuśalam gamitā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā

original: atra hariṇā hariṇā ityādi śabdaikāvalyā vibhinnārthayā nāyakalakṣaṇaṃ kartṛkārakamupaskriyata iti so 'yaṃ śabdaikāvalī kārakaparikarabheda
analyzed: atra hariṇā hariṇā ityādi śabda ekāvalyā vibhinna arthayā nāyaka lakṣaṇam kartṛ kārakam upaskriyate iti sā u yam śabda ekāvalī kāraka parikara bheda
evam artha ekāvalī ubhaya ekāvalyau ṭraṣṭavyau
kriyā jāti guṇa dravya vācinā ekatravartinā
vākya antara upakāraḥ ced dīpakam tat udāhṛtam
artha āvṛtti pada āvṛtti saṃpuja ādyāḥ tu tad bhidāḥ
tatra kriyā dīpakam yathā

original: ārūḍhāni yaśāṃsi tetribhuvanaṃ śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate gotragrāvamahāguhāḥ kṣitibhujāṃ bṛndāni mandaujasām /
analyzed: ārūḍhāni yaśāṃsi te tribhuvanam śrī siṅga pṛthvīpate gotra grāva mahā guhāḥ kṣitibhujām bṛndāni manda ojasām

original: tallakṣmīlalitāni lālitagirāṃ vidvajjanānāṃ gṛhān tadvākyāni ca tāvastutikathāślokyāni karṇau satām // Ckc_8.*97 //
analyzed: tad lakṣmī lalitāni lālita girām vidvas janānām gṛhān tad vākyāni ca tau astuti kathā ślokyāni karṇau satām

original: atra kriyāvācinā gūḍhānītīvapadena prathamapādādivartinā sarvavākyāni dīpyanta iti tadidamādidīpakam /
analyzed: atra kriyā vācinā gūḍhāni iti iva padena prathama pāda ādi vartinā sarva vākyāni dīpyante iti tat idam ādi dīpakam
evam madhya antya kriyā dīpakam jāti dīpaka ādayaḥ pi bhedāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ
dīpaka bhedheṣu artha āvṛttiḥ yathā
krīḍanti sarpa pati kānti kumudvatībhiḥ khelanti dikka raṭi mauktika tārakābhiḥ

original: dīvyanti divyavanitāsmitacandrikābhiḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpa tava kīrtivilāsacandrāḥ // Ckc_8.*98 //
analyzed: dīvyanti divya vanitā smita candrikābhiḥ śrī siṅga bhūpa tava kīrti vilāsa candrāḥ

original: atra krīḍārtha eva pādādikriyāsvāvartamānaḥ sarvavākyāni dīpayatīti seyamarthāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
analyzed: atra krīḍā arthaḥ eva pāda ādi kriyāsu āvartamānaḥ sarva vākyāni dīpayati iti sā iyam artha āvṛttiḥ api dīpakam eva
pada āvṛttiḥ yathā
rājā recarla vaṃśyaḥ yam kumudam kurutetarām
samudañcati rājā api kumudam sindhusaṃbhavaḥ

original: tatra prajāsantoṣaḥ kairavaścetyarthayorāvartamānaṃ kumudamiti padaṃ dve vā dīpayati padāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
analyzed: tatra prajā santoṣaḥ kairavaḥ ca iti arthayoḥ āvartamānam kumudam iti padam dve vā dīpayati pada āvṛttiḥ api dīpakam eva
ābhyām eva tad ubhaya āvṛttiḥ api vyākhyātā

original: yathātraiva rājetyarthaḥ śabdaścāvartamānavākyadvayamuttejayata iti seyamubhayāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
analyzed: yathā atra eva rājā iti arthaḥ śabdaḥ ca āvartamāna vākya dvayam uttejayataḥ iti sā iyam ubhaya āvṛttiḥ api dīpakam eva
tricatura pada āvṛtti rūpaḥ saṃpuṭaḥ yathā

original: kīrtiḥ krīḍati siṅgabhūpa talapaterniryatnaratnāṅkuraṃ pātālo phaṇilokapuṅgavaphaṇāprāsādamāseduṣī /
analyzed: kīrtiḥ krīḍati siṅga bhūpa tala pateḥ niryatna ratna aṅkuram phaṇi loka puṅgava phaṇā prāsādam āseduṣī
lakṣmī janma bhupaḥ nu viddha laharī ḍolāsu vārāṃnidheḥ svarge divya vadhū vilāsa hasitaiḥ gaṇḍa sthalī maṇḍalaiḥ

original: atra kriyākartṛkasaṃbandhapadāni prativākyāmāvṛttāni saṃpuṭatayā dīpayantīti saṃpuṭāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
analyzed: atra kriyā kartṛka saṃbandha padāni prativākyām āvṛttāni saṃpuṭa tayā dīpayanti iti saṃpuṭa āvṛttiḥ api dīpakam eva
evam bheda antarāṇi yathāsaṃbhavam anugantavyāni

original: paripāṭhyā tu bhaṇanaṃ śabdasyārthasya vā kramaḥ // Ckc_8.55 //
analyzed: paripāṭhyā tu bhaṇanam śabdasya arthasya vā kramaḥ
atra śabdānām kramaḥ tridhā samastānām asamastānām ubhayeṣām ca iti
tatra samasta śabda kramaḥ yathā
tulām saṃdadhate bhānu hima bhānu kṛśānavaḥ

original: atra samāsaparipatitānāṃ guṇānāñca krameṇa pratyekaṃ yojanamiti samastaśabdakramo 'yam /
analyzed: atra samāsa paripatitānām guṇānām ca krameṇa pratyekam yojanam iti samasta śabda kramaḥ yam
asamasta śabda kramaḥ yathā
namaskāram puraskāram tiraskāram karoti ayam
śrī siṅgadharaṇī pālaḥ pūrveṣām viduṣām dviṣām

original: atra pūrvādīnāṃ namaskārādīnāṃ samāsarahitādīnāṃ yathākramamananvayo vivakṣita iti so 'yamasamastaśabdakramaḥ /
analyzed: atra pūrva ādīnām namaskāra ādīnām samāsa rahita ādīnām yathākramam ananvayaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti saḥ yama samasta śabda kramaḥ

original: samastāsamastaśabdakramarupa ubhayakramo yathā hariśvandro rakṣākaraṇarucisatyeṣviti pūrvodāhṛtam //
analyzed: samasta asamasta śabda krama rupaḥ ubhaya kramaḥ yathā rakṣā karaṇa ruci satyeṣu iti pūrva udāhṛtam

original: atra prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pādayoḥ samastānāṃ rakṣākaraṇādīnāñca guṇānāmasamaktānāṃ tadguṇakatāṃ
analyzed: atra prathama tṛtīyayoḥ pādayoḥ samastānām rakṣā karaṇa ādīnām ca guṇānām asamaktānām tad guṇaka tām
hariśvandraḥ gāṅgaiyam iti ca ubhayatra pada śleṣa sāmarthya kathitānām hariśvandra hariśvandrānām

original: gāṅgeyagāṅgeyānāṃ ca kramasamanvayo na vivakṣita hati so 'yamubhayakramaḥ /
analyzed: gāṅgeya gāṅgeyānām ca krama samanvayaḥ na saḥ yam ubhaya kramaḥ
vākya kramaḥ tu svayam unneyaḥ
artha kramaḥ dvividhaḥ
deśataḥ kālataḥ ca
tatra ādyaḥ yathā
śrī siṅga kṣitipāla tāvaka camū dhāṭīva nāṭī bhava dvairi strīṣu hṛta āśukāsu śabaraiḥ tvad kīrti visphūrtayaḥ

original: paśvārdhe paridhānatāṃ hi dadhate saṃvyānatāṃ vakṣasi prāyo mūdhnyavaguṭhanatvamadhare...dasāṃ vā stumaḥ // Ckc_8.*103 //
analyzed: paśu ardhe paridhāna tām hi dadhate saṃvyāna tām vakṣasi prāyas mūdhni avaguṭhana tvam adharedasām vā stumaḥ

original: atra vardhamanāyāḥ nāyakakorteḥ pratināyakaśuddhāntakāntāśarīrapradeśeṣu kramasaṃkrāntyā yo 'yaṃ paridhānādaupamyalābhaḥ /
analyzed: atra vardhamanāyāḥ nāyaka korteḥ pratināyaka śuddhānta kāntā śarīra pradeśeṣu krama saṃkrāntyā yaḥ yam paridhānāt aupamya lābhaḥ
evam deśa tortha kramaḥ
kālataḥ yathā

original: apāṃ śoṣoddhārā vipatanabhiyā haṃsagilanā- ttuṣāraissītārtī virahijanaśayyādikatayā /
analyzed: apām śoṣa uddhārā vipatana bhiyā haṃsa gilanā t tuṣāraiḥ sītā ārtī virahi jana śayyā ādika tayā

original: vidhitvā sāpāyaṃ jalaruhakulaṃ tadvijahatī sthitiṃ dhatte siḍgakṣitipatirapāye tvayi ramā // Ckc_8.*104 //
analyzed: vidhitvā sa apāyam jalaruha kulam tat vijahatī sthitim dhatte siḍga kṣitipatiḥ apāye tvayi ramā

original: atra jalaśoṣādīnāṃ jalajāpāyahetūnāṃ grīṣmādivasantāvadhi kālakrameṇa bhaṇanāt kālator'thakramo 'yam /
analyzed: atra jala śoṣa ādīnām jala ja apāya hetūnām grīṣma ādi vasanta avadhi kāla krameṇa bhaṇanāt kālatortha kramaḥ yam

original: miṣato vākrapravṛttiryā sa paryāya itīryate // Ckc_8.56 //
analyzed: miṣataḥ vākra pravṛttiḥ yā sa paryāyaḥ iti īryate
yathā

original: hanta krośati śārikānavarataṃ mṛdhnāti līlāmṛgaḥ śrāntāḥ kelicaṇautikāra vikaṭairbāhye sthitā vallakī /
analyzed: hanta krośati śārikā anavaratam mṛdhnāti līlāmṛgaḥ śrāntāḥ keli caṇautikāra vikaṭaiḥ bāhye sthitā vallakī

original: ityālāpini nirgate priyasakhīvarge navoḍhā priyā bhūpālena sakhījanānusaraṇaṃ sparśena vistāritā // Ckc_8.*105 //
analyzed: iti ālāpini nirgate priya sakhī varge na voḍhā priyā bhūpālena sakhī jana anusaraṇam sparśena vistāritā

original: atra rahobhaṅgabhīruṇā vidagdhasakhīvargeṇākrośanākarṇanādimiṣātsukhena nirgamopāyo 'bhihita iti so 'yaṃ paryāyaḥ /
analyzed: atra rahaḥ bhaṅga bhīruṇā vidagdha sakhī vargeṇa ākrośana ākarṇana ādi miṣāt sukhena nirgama upāyaḥ bhihitaḥ iti saḥ yam paryāyaḥ

original: evaṃ kāryamiṣataḥ kāraṇokte ravivakṣādayo 'sya bhedāḥ svayamunneyāḥ /
analyzed: evam kārya miṣataḥ kāraṇa ukte bhedāḥ svayam unneyāḥ
yā vivakṣā viśeṣasya na ati udvega pradāyinī
asau atiśayoktiḥ syāt sarva alaṅkāra jīvitam
guṇa kriyā gocarā iyam na jāti dravya gāminī

original: na hi dravyasya jātervā sākṣādatiśayaḥ vkacit // Ckc_8.58 //
analyzed: na hi dravyasya jāteḥ vā sākṣāt atiśayaḥ
tatra guṇa atiśaya bhedeṣu dhairya atiśayaḥ yathā

original: rūkṣāhaṃkṛtayo na santi lalita bhedaṃ gatena bhruvau dṛkkoṇo 'pi na rāgameti hasitaṃ mandaṃ ca nāntarhitam /
analyzed: rūkṣa ahaṃkṛtayaḥ na santi bhedam gatena bhruvau na rāgam eti hasitam mandam ca na antarhitam

original: dṛṣṭvāpi pratigarjatāṃ kṣitibhujāṃ saṃraṃbhagarbhaśriyā mūrtirdāruṇaceṣṭayāpyavikṛtā śrīsiṅgapṛṣvīpateḥ // Ckc_8.*106 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā api pratigarjatām kṣitibhujām saṃraṃbha garbha śriyā mūrtiḥ dāruṇa ceṣṭayā api avikṛtā śrī siṅga pṛṣvīpateḥ

original: atra mahāraṇasaṃhaṃbhe nāyakasya bhrūbhedādivikārābhāvakathanāddhairyaviśeṣo vivakṣita iti seyaṃ guṇātiśayoktiḥ /
analyzed: atra mahā raṇa saṃhaṃbhe nāyakasya bhrū bheda ādi vikāra abhāva kathanāt dhairya viśeṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti sā iyam guṇa atiśayoktiḥ
kriyā atiśayaḥ yathā

original: śrīsiṅgabhūpa bhavatīyaparigraheṇa dharmāya yad balavate kavireṣa bhītaḥ /
analyzed: śrī siṅgabhūpa bhavatīya parigraheṇa dharmāya yat balavate kaviḥ eṣa bhītaḥ

original: tretādibandhumuṣitau tu dadhāti bhāgau tatte tulāṃ na dadhate prathame narendrāḥ // Ckc_8.*107 //
analyzed: tretā ādi bandhu muṣitau tu dadhāti bhāgau tat te tulām na dadhate prathame narendrāḥ

original: atra nāyakagatadharmaparipālanakriyāviśeṣo vivakṣita iti seyaṃ kriyātiśayokriḥ /
analyzed: atra nāyaka gata dharma paripālana kriyā viśeṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti sā iyam kriyā atiśaya ukriḥ
śleṣaḥ neka artha kathanam padena ekena saṃmataḥ
yathā
khyātān mahā āśaya tayā kṛta gotra rakṣā na ārūḍha bhū parisarā pratikūla vṛttīn

original: śrīsiṅgabhūpatiyasāṃsi nirūḍhasattvā- nullaṅghayanti viṣamānapi vāhinīśān // Ckc_8.*108 //
analyzed: śrī siṅga bhūpati yasāṃsi nirūḍha sattvāḥ n ullaṅghayanti viṣamān api vāhinī īśān

original: atra vāhinīśapadena samudrasāmantarājalakṣaṇamarthadvayaṃ tadviśeṣaṇe tu tadanukūlārthadvayaṃ ca śliṣṭamiti so 'yaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: atra vāhinī śa padena samudrasāmanta rāja lakṣaṇam artha dvayam tad viśeṣaṇe tu tad anukūla artha dvayam ca śliṣṭam iti saḥ yam śleṣa alaṅkāraḥ

original: udbhedā yatra bhāvasya bāvanā seyamīritā // Ckc_8.60 //
analyzed: udbhedāḥ yatra bhāvasya bāvanā sā iyam īritā
yathā
jāti prasūna puṭake sva sakhī kareṇa śrī siṅga bhūpa tilakāya samarpaṇīye

original: ardhīkṛtālakakucāphaṇi kahkaṇena mudrā kṛtā smarajitā likhitena tanvyā // Ckc_8.*109 //
analyzed: kahkaṇena mudrā kṛtā smarajitā likhitena tanvyā

original: atra vidagdhayā kayāpi kāminyā priyayogyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ puṣpaśarapuṣpaṃdhayagandhavahābhimarśaḥ
analyzed: atra vidagdhayā kayā api kāminyā priya yogyānām puṣpāṇām puṣpa śara puṣpaṃdhaya gandhavaha abhimarśaḥ
śaṅkyate saḥ yam bhāvaḥ puṣpaṃdhaya ādi pratibhaṭa tayā rakṣā hetubhiḥ alaka phaṇi smara jit padaiḥ uddhidyate
sūcyate iti sā iyam bhāvanā
alaṅkāra prapañcasya śabda artha ubhaya vartinaḥ
anyonya yogaḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ iti prājñaiḥ udīryate
atra kevala śabda alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ śabdālaṅkāraḥ
kevala artha alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ ūrthālaṅkāraḥ
ubhaya alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ ubhaya alaṅkāraḥ

original: śabdārthālaṅkārayoḥ śabdobhayālaṅkārayorarthobhayālaṅkārayośva saṅkara ubhayālaṅkāra eva svārthālaṅkāravaśāt saṅkarasyobhayāśritatvasiddheḥ  #
analyzed: śabda artha alaṅkārayoḥ śabda ubhaya alaṅkārayoḥ artha ubhaya alaṅkārayoḥ ca saṅkaraḥ ubhaya alaṅkāraḥ eva svārtha alaṅkāra vaśāt saṅkarasya ubhaya āśrita tva siddheḥ  /
saṃbhāvyamāna tvāt
kevala śabda alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ yathā
sādhva saṃmati vidhvaṃsi kṛtvā siṅka niṣevaṇam
sādhvasam mati vidhvaṃsi būpaiḥ nija gṛha sthitaiḥ

original: atra sādhūnāmasaṃmatimasaṃbhāvanāṃ vindato 'labhyamānān sā dhvaṃsayati nāśayatīti sādhvasaṃmatividhvasi durjanatarjanamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atra sādhūnām asaṃmatim asaṃbhāvanām vindataḥ labhyamānān sā dhvaṃsayati nāśayati iti sādhu asaṃmati vidhvasi durjana tarjanam iti arthaḥ

original: tādṛśaṃ siṅgabhūpālasevanaṃ kṛtvā nijagṛhe svagṛhe sthitairbhūpairmatividhvaṃsi sādhvasamiti yojanā /
analyzed: tādṛśam siṅga bhūpāla sevanam kṛtvā nija gṛhe sva gṛhe sthitaiḥ bhūpaiḥ mati vidhvaṃsi sādhvasam iti yojanā

original: atra nijagṛhe nigṛhītamiti kriyāpadaṃ nijagṛha iti saptamyā gūḍhamiti kriyāgūḍhalakṣaṇo viṣayapadāvṛttiyamakalakṣaṇasva śabdālaṅkārau saṃkīrṇāviti  #
analyzed: atra nija gṛhe nigṛhītam iti kriyā padam nija gṛhe iti saptamyā gūḍham iti kriyā gūḍha lakṣaṇaḥ śabda alaṅkārau saṃkīrṇau iti
kevala śabda alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ yam
kevala artha alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ yathā
siṅga bhūpa vidadhāti tāvakaḥ

original: kānane nagaravartino ripūna tatpure vipinavāsino mṛgān // Ckc_8.*111 //
analyzed: kānane nagara vartinaḥ ripūn tad pure vipina vāsinaḥ mṛgān
atra anaṃbṛdāśaniḥ iti vibhāvanā
uttara ardhe parivṛttiḥ iti dvayoḥ rartha alaṅkārayoḥ saṃkaraḥ
kevalaḥ ubhayā alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ yathā
lakṣmībhiḥ iva devībhiḥ vinayaiḥ iva sūribhiḥ
nayaiḥ iva mahā amātyaiḥ ssevyate siṅga bhūpatiḥ

original: atrevaśabdena sahārtha iva saṃbhāvamārtho 'pi dyotyata iti ekavācakānupraveśena sahokterutprekṣāyāśva saṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: atra ivaśabdena saha arthaḥ iva dyotyate iti ekavācaka anupraveśena sahokteḥ utprekṣāyāḥ va saṅkaraḥ
sabdārtha alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ yathā

original: tvayā dīnāriṇā rājan kṛtā dīnāriṇo mama /
analyzed: tvayā dīnāriṇā rājan kṛtāḥ dīnāriṇaḥ mama
asamagrām avṛttāḥ he samagrām avatā mahīm

original: atra prathamārdhe dīnāriṇā dīnārīti dvitīyapādamadhyayamakasyottarārdhe samagrāmavatā kṛteti virodhābhāsasya dvayossaṃkaraḥ /
analyzed: atra prathama ardhe dīnāriṇā dīnārī iti dvitīya pāda madhya yamakasya uttara ardhe samagra āmavatā kṛtā iti virodha ābhāsasya dvayoḥ saṃkaraḥ
śabda ubhaya alaṅkāra saṃkaraḥ yathā
tārābhiḥ induḥ iva yābhiḥ upāsyate yam śrī siṅga bhūmipati randhra vilāsinībhiḥ

original: citraṃ janasya valayā valayā nitāntaṃ tāsāṃ sitāyatadṛśāmudare kare ca // Ckc_8.*114 //
analyzed: citram janasya valayā valayā nitāntam tāsām sita āyata dṛśām udare kare ca
atra udare valaya āvali rekhāḥ citram

original: avalayan acalayan kare valayaḥ kaṭakamavalayamiti kartṛkriyāpadayorekavacanabahuvacane
analyzed: avalayan acalayan kare valayaḥ kaṭakam avalayam iti kartṛ kriyā padayoḥ ekavacana bahuvacane

original: śliṣṭe iti vacanaśleṣasya tārābhirindurivetyupamāyāśva viveko dṛsyata iti śabdobhayālaṅkārasaṅkaro 'yam /
analyzed: śliṣṭe iti vacana śleṣasya tārābhiḥ induḥ iva iti upamāyāḥ aśva vivekaḥ iti śabda ubhaya alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ yam
yathā ca
māṇikyaiḥ iva gāṇikyaiḥ syandanaiḥ iva candanaiḥ
saujanyaiḥ iva rājanyaiḥ modate siṅga bhūpatiḥ
atra anuprāsa upamā utprekṣāṇām saṅkaraḥ
artha ubhaya alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ yathā

original: santrāsaudviṣatāṃ...pratidiśaṃ tvatkīrtirādhāyate tvatkītau paridhāvanaṃ pratipadaṃ gāyanti vairistriyaḥ /
analyzed: santrāsaḥ dviṣatām pratidiśam tvad kīrtiḥ ādhāyate tvad kītau paridhāvanam pratipadam gāyanti vairi striyaḥ

original: glānirvairibahadhūlatāsu dharaṇī viśrāmyati tvadbhuje viśrāmo bhuvi siṅgabhūpatimaṇeṃ nidrāṃnti vairistriyaḥ // Ckc_8.*116 //
analyzed: glāniḥ vairi baha dhū latāsu dharaṇī viśrāmyati tvad bhuje viśrāmaḥ bhuvi nidrāṃnti vairi striyaḥ
atra anāgata citra hetu alaṅkārasya upamāyāḥ aśva saṅkaraḥ
śabda artha ubhaya alaṅkāra saṃkaraḥ yathā

original: śrīsiḍgakṣoṇibhartre diśi diśi sumanomānasollāsa kartre sāndrāmindro vibhūtiṃ śuciratiśucitāṃ dharmarājo 'ti dharmam /
analyzed: śrī siḍga kṣoṇi bhartre diśi diśi sumanaḥ mānasa ullāsa kartre sāndrām indraḥ vibhūtim śuciḥ ati śuci tām dharmarājaḥ dharmam

original: rakṣāṃ rakṣo 'dhināthaḥ kuṭilavighaṭanodyogicetaḥ pracetā vāyussaṃpūrṇamāyurdhanamapi dhanadaśśaṃṅkaraḥ śaṃ karotu // Ckc_8.*117 //
analyzed: rakṣām rakṣaḥ dhināthaḥ kuṭila vighaṭana udyogi cetaḥ pracetāḥ vāyuḥ saṃpūrṇam āyuḥ dhanam api dhanadaḥ śaṃṅkaraḥ śam karotu

original: atra diśi diśīti sumomānaseti śaṅkaraḥ śaṃ kotviti rakṣāṃ rakṣo iti vat chekānuprāsasya sāndrāmidra ityādāvanuprāsasya sumanaśśleṣaḥ pratiśabdotthāpitena  #
analyzed: atra diśi diśi iti sumomānasa iti śaṅkaraḥ śam kotu iti rakṣām rakṣaḥ iti vat cheka anuprāsasya sāndra amidraḥ ityādau anuprāsasya sumanaḥ śleṣaḥ pratiśabda utthāpitena
dikpāla rūpa madhyama
ma lokapālasya ca anyonya pratīkāra lakṣaṇena anyonya artha alaṅkāreṇa pūrva dikpāla paripāṭī kathana lakṣaṇena

original: kramanāmnobhayālaṅkāreṇa saha saṃniveśaḥ prakāśata iti so 'yaṃ trividhālaṅkāra ...
analyzed: krama nāmnā ubhaya alaṅkāreṇa saha saṃniveśaḥ prakāśate iti saḥ yam
pṛthak prayatna nirvartyāḥ yadi api ete guṇa ādayaḥ
sidhyeyuḥ eka yatnena kāvye puṇyavataḥ kaveḥ
saṅkaraḥ pi guṇa ādīnām alaṅkāra tayā uditaḥ
bhoja ādibhiḥ dhāyibhiḥ
tatra guṇa alaṅkāra saṅkaraḥ yathā
viśveśa kalpita camatkṛti siṅgayaśasā samam āvirāstām
ā candram ā tapanam ā dharaṇīdhara indra mātāram ā gaganam ā girijā
prathama ardhe saha uktiḥ
uttara ardhe śeṣa kīrti mā eteṣām saṅkaraḥ kāvya camatkāram akalaṅkam aṅkurayati
evam saṅkara antarāṇi yathāsaṃbhavam mahā kavi prabandheṣu rasa jñaiḥ anusandheyāni
evam nidarśitam saṃpradāyāt ālocya lakṣaṇam
kalpanā kalpitam kāvyam ācandrārkam prakāśate
lakṣya lakṣaṇa nirmāṇa vijñāna kṛtabuddhibhiḥ
parikṣyatām ayam granthaḥ sayā

original: iti sakalamapi kalyāṇam iti sarasasāhityacāturīdhurīṇaviśveśvarakavicandrapraṇītāyāṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpālakīrtisudhāsāra śītalāyāṃ camatkāracandrikāyāmaṣṭamo  #
analyzed: iti sakalam api kalyāṇam iti sarasa sāhitya cāturī dhurīṇa viśveśvara kavi candra praṇītāyām śrī siṅga bhūpāla kīrti sudhā sāra śītalāyām camatkāracandrikāyām aṣṭamaḥ
vilāsaḥ
samāptaḥ yam granthaḥ
